name: ★ MAUI BEACH LOFT- Kihei, HI ★
summary: Our craftsman loft condo is conveniently located a minute walk from Waiohuli beach which is a quiet local beach; perfect for sunrise/sunset views. It has two levels with a private bedroom located on the first floor & a large loft-style bedroom on the second floor. Located in walking distance to multiple shopping centers & popular restaurants. A local brewery & golf course is also located a short distance away. We'll provide you a list of our personal recommendations of our favorite local spots.
space: The resort also features a large swimming pool, hot tub, BBQ pavilion, and lush tropical gardens perfect for lounging outside. This vacation home is ideal for travelers who want both convenience and tranquility. Perfect for a relaxing getaway! AIR Conditioning system in all living space and bedrooms for maximum comfort -Upstairs Loft -Downstairs living room -Downstairs bedroom The condo is fully furnished with everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing stay:  UPSTAIRS LOFT: -King Size Bed -Couch facing balcony with views of Haleakala Mountain -Office desk & chair -Full bathroom with shower DOWNSTAIRS/MAIN SPACE: -Queen size bed in bedroom -Ultra Plush Memory Foam Queen Sofa Sleeper in living room -Full bathroom with shower -Fully-equipped kitchen -Breakfast bar & dining space -Flat screen television with cable in living room THE OVERALL SPACE: -Wireless broadband internet -Private lanai/veranda to admire the lush tropical garden and palm trees -Free parking -Coin operated laund

notes: The Hawaiian Green Sea Turtle, known as “Honu,” symbolizes good luck, endurance and long life. Turtles can show up as a person's guardian spirit, known as “Aumakua.” When lost, turtles are excellent navigators and often find their way home.
transit: The best way to get around the island and to experience Maui is to rent a car which is available at the airport once you arrive or by pre-arranging beforehand. Parking is available on complex and street parking is plentiful. Uber ride share is also available on island should you wish to enjoy a nice evening out.
access: Guests have full access to the Condo and Pavilion with BBQ, Hot Tub and Pool. Coin operated laundry facilities conveniently located in the building.
interaction: We want to ensure that you are having a great time while in Maui and we want to do everything possible to help you achieve that. We are available via AirBnB messaging and phone conversation should you have any questions. :) Our on island representative Sherie can be contacted for immediate concerns.
house_rules: - Check-in is anytime after 3PM - Check out by 11AM - Self check-in with Keypad - No Shoes in the house - Association rule booklet provided in condo - Most Important, have a great vacation

host.host_about:
Aloha! 

We welcome you to stay at our home in Maui while we are with families in California. :) We are college sweethearts and have been together for over 11 years. We enjoy the outdoors and take every opportunity possible to enjoy nature hikes, camping, and backpacking trips. If we are not doing so, we enjoy exploring the world and is always looking for our next adventure together. Aside from traveling, we like to sit back, relax, and enjoy a glass of wine.

While we travel, we hope to open up our Maui home for you to enjoy on your vacation as well! 

Mahalo!

reviews.comments:
This is a nice spacious condo in a pretty complex with a great pool and a barbecue area.  We didn’t meet the hosts but they were very quick to answer our questions and helpful in allowing us to shift check in/out times to fit with our travel plans.
There were a few issues during our stay which the hosts took note of and should be resolved for future guests.

The host were very kind, offering us great tips for things to do during our first trip to Maui.  They also checked to see how we were doing to make sure things were going well.  When we arrived the condo was clean, and is as pictured, with WiFi, many clean nice towels, a coffee maker, dishwasher, plates, cups, and cooking utensils.  The condo is well-maintained with great air conditioning.  It is in a good location within walking distance to the beach, and many great casual restaurants.  Street parking was easy to find just outside.  The pool and jacuzzi are also well-maintained.  The laundry room is just downstairs of the unit.  Overall, we were very happy with our stay, and really liked having 2 separate rooms at a great price.
This is a super convenient location for getting to the beach and is just a short drive to the boat launch for many scuba or other boat trips.

Very clean and spacious, super responsive (all via email, no person on site); location is right in front of beach where you can snorkel and see sea turtles, walking distance from grocery and a short drive into town.
Lilly and Matt were wonderful and easy to communicate with.  Highly recommended!!

Highly recommend. Travelled as a family of 5 and had a wonderful stay here. The apartment was nice and clean, comfortable, and had a kitchen equipped to allow us to cook and eat "at home" as needed. The hosts were ALWAYS responsive and accommodating to our every need. The best part of all is that the apartment really is a 1 minute walk from the beach.
Amazing! I love this place!
the place was nice and clean. very quiet neighborhood. Street parking was very easy and convenient.

This place is the perfect vacation home. Lily and Matt provided great local recommendations, the home is close to the beach, the décor and layout is amazing. They accommodated our early check-in and were easy to reach in case of any questions. I would highly consider staying at this home for your next trip to Maui.

The condo was beautiful and clean. One of our favorite beaches was right across the street! Lily was so helpful with awesome tips, and quick responses every time we had questions. Would stay here again!!

Lily & Matt were super helpful from the very start. Communication was great and the place was perfect - close to the beach and very clean. Everything you'd want is here. Thoroughly recommended. Thanks again for having us. 
Tom & Bente

This has been one of the best places I have stayed in all the years of my travel to Maui. The location is perfect - walking distance to everywhere we wanted to go ...fitness centre, grocery, catholic church, restaurants and the amazingly quiet beach!

Lily and Matt are wonderful host. They communicate quickly and are available to communication. Throughout the trip they were willing to give recommendations on activities and sites to go and see. 

The space: this was located closely to the beach which is a huge plus. Parking was available at no extra cost. The home was clean, and beds were comfortable. The kitchen had plenty of amenities, and made it convenient to cook home meals.

Overall: I would recommend this space without any hesitancy. Looking forward to coming back to this location in the near future!

This is the BEST Airbnb we stayed so far.  

Place is clean, tidy and conveniently located close to water (amazing sunset there) 
Shopping, restaurants, cafes are just around the corner. 

Lily and Matt kept in touch throughout our stay and given us lots of useful tips and information on things to do in Maui.

We loved the place and will definitely be the first on our list of places to stay once we are beck in Maui.

Lily and Matt were fantastic hosts with super fast response times. The condo was ideally situated with a grocery store right behind the estates and the beach across the street. The condo was spotless when we arrived and had everything described in the ad. Overall our group was very pleased with the accommodations and would definitely recommend booking the space to any and all travellers. Cheers!

Staying at Lily & Matt's place was probably the best experience I've ever had with Airbnb. From the great amenities, a beautiful and well located house, the attention with all details, and proactive communication to make sure we had everything we needed, they helped our trip be an amazing one.  

Being an expectant mother, Lily & Matt's had all the comfort I needed, and both my husband and I were super happy with the great support they provided us throughout our whole stay.

Thanks a lot, Lily and Matt! We really appreciate your attention and hospitality.

Lily & Matt’s place turned out to be my dad’s favorite, and he’s a hard man to please. The space is bright, airy and spacious, but felt cozy at the same time. The balcony is a wonderful place to chill and have meals at. The kitchen is fully equipped with what you need to cook for a family. Appreciated the boogie boards, beach chairs and beach towels. It’s so close to a really nice beach and walking distance to great restaurants, coffee shop and a drug store. All in all, a great apartment and we will surely look out for this place again in the future.
Nice place, a block away from the ocean, very clean basic Hawaiian accomodations.
Nice location and parking is very convenient.

The location is right in front of the beach so it’s perfect if you do not want to go miles away from your house. We had everything we needed like towels, aluminum, toilet paper, soap, shampoo and conditioner. The check-in was extremely easy and the house was perfectly cleaned. Matt and Lily have been so helpful, they chatted me everyday to know how my vacation was going on. 
It’s perfect for a family, I highly recommend it.

Lily and Matt’s place is amazing. The space is huge and clean and very comfortable and homey. There are so many convenient aspects to the condo - pool, bbq grills, laundry on site, beaches right across the street, supermarket right around the corner (huge plus if you’re a family with small children) and even easy parking right outside the apartment. They even got a new pack n play for our baby to use when they noticed the one that was in the condo was damaged. Talk about considerate! I would definitely recommend this home and would stay again if we ever make another visit to Maui!

Do you like to spend your days outside, exploring, eating out? Do you have a few active kids?  Well, if you are anything like us, you will love Lily & Matt's place.  It's a great find and here's why:
1 - Location!  Centrally located on the island, you have quick access to the airport, North shore sights and the amazing beaches of West & South Maui.  We love the walking distance to some great restaurants, groceries, shaved ice and pharmacy.  Oh, and we can't forget THE BEACH!  Great for morning runs or evening sunsets.
2 - Spacious, Clean & Affordable!  Roomy for a family of 5, super clean with all the basic necessities.  The pool was great for afternoon swims and you can't beat the value!
3 - Great hosts.  Lily & Matt are super attentive and thoughtful.  They are great about checking in and making sure you and your family are comfortable.

We couldn't have asked for a better home for our family vacation.
Lily & Matt stay in touch the whole time from booking their place to landing in Maui. Everything was as picture and clean.
Wonderful experience!

Great place especially for the location!! Really just a few steps away from the beach! In addition, walking distance from the grocery store, excellent coffee (Akamai), great acai bowls (wow wow) and so much more! Also near a couple of parks along the beach (Kalama Park) that were beautiful for a run.  They also let us check in early which ww were very grateful for after a long flight. In addition, had a good amount of kitchen amenities and beach towels that came in handy. We had a great stay!

The condo was perfect! It was everything my family and I were hoping for during our vacation to Maui. The place was spacious, clean and had all the comforts of home. The pool, hot-tub and bbq area on the grounds were well maintained and easy to access - Plus they were rarely busy, so it was like your own private outdoor space! 
The location was excellent! It was barely a two minute walk to a quiet, beautiful beach that stretches along the coast in both directions! Walking or lounging on the beach we saw breach whales in the distance and turtles sunning themselves on the sand. 
Many amenities were a short walking distance away and if you have a car the condo has a convenient location to venture out and explore other areas on the island. It’s close to the airport and centrally located.
Lily and Matt were excellent hosts and offered many tips about different restaurants and adventures we might like to try during our time in Maui. They responded quickly to any questions and checked-in with is periodically throughout our stay to make sure everything was excellent! 
We really enjoyed our time in Maui, would absolutely recommend Lily and Matt’s place and can’t wait to go back to stay again ourselves!

Matt and Lily are the most responsive Airbnb hosts that we’ve ever encountered and we’ve been to many, many Airbnb places around the world. 

Their place is a second floor unit with a beautiful, large loft bedroom and bathroom in addition to a main floor bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, dining and living room. 

I want to note that the separation of sleeping spaces is excellent with the bedrooms and hideabed far apart which was ideal for us since our daughter had her baby (our granddaughter) with her. 

The location was perfect for us, right across the street from the beach and our extended family!

We also used the pool and the common bbq and eating (Website hidden by Airbnb) was delightful! We highly recommend this condo unit.
It’s so lucky to stay at Lily and Matt’s place during our vacation; we really enjoy the atmosphere here. Hope to come back soon. :)

Very well furnished, really felt like home and not a hotel. Loft space was very cool. Literally 1 minute walk to beach and 1 minute walk to a grocery store. Nice pool/hot tub. Convenient coin laundry below condo. Short drive to nice casual eating/shopping options.

name: O'hana Retreat *We pay your guest service fee*
summary: • Great rental for multi-generational family or two/three couples in safe, friendly Princeville community on Kauai’s spectacular North Shore.• Open concept/living kitchen area that separates the master suite from the other two guest bedrooms • The large lanai looks out over the 6th green of the Woods course and the beautiful Namolokama Mountains and waterfalls. With six sets of sliding glass doors, this home feels like its own nature retreat on the Garden Isle.
space: • House includes an attached garage with ample parking for one car, washer/dryer and contains a wall safe in master suite. • O’hana Retreat is a five minute walk to the Princeville Shopping Center, Princeville library and the community center which always offers a wide variety of fitness and cultural events daily. • This unique home is also located just a 7-10 minute drive from Anini Beach and the Westin Princeville Ocean Resort and a two mile walk along the scenic paved pathway to the world class St. Regis hotel.  Hawaii Tax ID# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rooms and Amenities 	* Property Type: House 	* Beds: 2 king beds, 1 queen bed 	* Bathrooms: 2 bathrooms 	* Rooms: Sleeps 6 	* Floor: Area (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) square feet 	* Pets: No pets allowed. 	* Living: Hairdryer, High Speed Internet, Ironing Board, Linens, Phone, Washer & Dryer, Wireless Internet, Iron, Driveway Parking 	* Business: Nearby ATM, Nearby Bank, Nearby FedEx, Nearby Internet Cafe, Nearby Post Office,

name: 2714 - AB Girona Apartment 41 - Stylish Apartment for up to 7 guests in Eixample with a Balcony
summary: Situated just 600 metres from the famous Passeig de Gràcia, this luxury apartment offers a balcony and air conditioning. It is located just 70 metres from Girona metro station.  The apartment sleeps up to 7 people across two double bedrooms, a single bedroom and a double sofa-bed. The apartment also has a beautiful living area with a sofa, flat screen TV and a dining table, complete with chairs. There is also an elegant kitchen area and two modern bathrooms.  Gaudí’s Sagrada Família is just a 15-minute walk from the apartment, and the Arc de Triomf is just a 10-minute walk. The trendy neighbourhood of Gràcia is less than a 10-minute walk from the apartment and the beach is just 4 stops away on the metro.  Eixample is a great choice for those interested in landmarks, architecture, local culture, and city stays.Please note: There is a parking space available for this building, subject to availability. Please contact us to reserve it in advance. Metro station: Girona (L4)

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: good good good

위치는 셩완역에서 도보 5분정도 걸리고,  트램이나 버스도 많이다녀서 이동이 편했습니다.  
근처에 마트가 있고 주변의 유명 맛집들과 소호거리도 도보로 이동가능한 위치였습니다. 화장실내의 샤워부스가 작아서 좁긴하지만 크게 불편함을 느낄정도는 아니였고, 타월도 다 새거에, 침구류도 보송보송한 향기가났어요.  저희는 네명이 이용했는데 네명이 지내기 딱 적당한 정도였습니다. 
호스트도 연락이 잘되는 편이고 불편함없이 잘 지내다 왔습니다.^^
great location.
位置比较舒服,如果是偏向观光旅游,建议选择这里｡但是希望能提供一次性牙膏牙刷,因为这一点我认为非常重要｡房东能耐心解答所有问题,入住除了空调吵了点这个问题,其他都比较满意｡

If you know Hong Kong well enough, this location is superbly sat in the middle of everything - the hipster / upscale part of central/sheung wan; to the local sai wan. Try travelling on tram, it’s a nice ride that takes you throughout the whole island side. If you’re around long enough, take a 10 minute walk to one of the best government managed swimming pools in Hong Kong, a nice swim is just 17 HKD. The flat is not too spacious - but expected in Hong Kong, yet the three rooms are properly spaced for 3-4 guests. The host is attentive and responsive. In general we had a great time here; would recommend for the location.

GOOD location, close to metro station and ferry port. It's truely a pleasure to stay in the apartment, small but has almost every things you need. House owner is very actively response to any issue you face in the place we reaching the house. The rooms are clean and beds are comfortable. Overall, it's prefect for a small group of 4 or 5 ppls to stay in HK.
Thank you for the other day!
Good location, close to MTR and tram. Basic kitchen facilities, enough for light meal cooking. There are plenty of shops and restourantes around.

I loved the stay in the apartment. It was well suited and great location for our family. Was a little confused on the check in process, especially we had so many bags and kids, trying to find one location for the key then the next location for the apartment, the street names look the same Bonham Strand, Bonham Strand West. We spent an hour working it out. Plus it was late and we had a very long flight from the US. Other apartments have made this process easier.

The location is perfect for traveling. You can easily take subway to get to places for shopping and eating. One thing that we hadn't expected was that, even it located in such a hectic and crowded place, once we were in the house, we couldn't hear any noise and had really good sleep!  As for the size, it's pretty okay for 7 ladies like us, maybe a little bit smaller to accommodate male guests. But it's reasonable since it's in Hong Kong. We enjoyed the stay here for one night!

私が行った時12月5日〜は､ｴﾝﾄﾗﾝｽの内装と外装工事をやっていて､部屋の窓のすぐ外を職人さんが通るのでｶｰﾃﾝは閉めっぱなし､ｴﾝﾄﾗﾝｽは密室でｺﾝｸﾘｰﾄを電動ﾉｺｷﾞﾘで切ったりしているので物凄く埃っぽく子どもたちを連れて行くのはかなり躊躇われました｡ｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰはすぐ閉まるので気をつけて下さい｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの際の鍵の場所は､物件から少し離れていてｷｰﾎﾞｯｸｽを見つけるまで時間がかかりました｡
電子ﾚﾝｼﾞはありません｡ｼｬﾜｰﾙｰﾑと洗面所は黴汚れがあります｡そして窓の目隠しがないので､ｼｬﾜｰ前後の裸が外から見える感じでした｡ｺﾞﾐは毎日外に出すと回収してくれて快適でした｡
MTRもｾﾝﾄﾗﾙ乗り換えが必須であまり便利ではないかな｡
周りは乾物の卸売屋さんが多くて匂いがしますが､香港ぽくて楽しいです｡公園も近いし､公営ﾌﾟｰﾙも近いです｡あと､ｽﾀﾊﾞの方に歩いていくと､朝飲茶の美味しいお店に徒歩4分くらいで行けます｡夜ご飯も近くのﾌｰﾄﾞｺｰﾄがｲﾝﾄﾞｶﾚｰとかｲﾀﾘｱﾝとかあってｵｽｽﾒです｡
路面電車は乗り場がすぐです｡それと､ﾀｸｼｰも大通りに出ればすぐ捕まります｡
we had a wonderful stay! honey is very responsive if you have questions and the place is near to everything. i would totally book this room again

Pleasantly decorated bedrooms and living room. Small but adequate for a short stay. We loved having the common space to be able to have breakfast, sit around and unwind in front of the TV. The bathroom needs major cleaning and updating. Water pressure in shower is low when temperature is turned up. Kitchen equipment/utensils is basic. Location is excellent and very convenient.

Good place, comfortable and has everything you need. Any more than seven people would be a push as it is small. If you’re staying during winter the apartment can get fairly cold at times and it was difficult to get towels to dry. The location is excellent.
The apartment is in a great location, neat and comfortable
Nope.
位置不错,按照导航走,大概5~6分钟能到｡房间在香港已算豪宅,还有客厅｡其他功能一应俱全,不错的一次居住｡就是有间房门锁稍微有点问题,会自动反锁｡差点就要破门而入了,幸好房东及时回复有钥匙,也是一点小插曲｡
适合一家人居住,周围有蓮香居用餐,特别不错
非常棒的小公寓,干净方便,八个人住没有问题｡离公交站地铁站都很近｡房东人很好,回复及时,很感谢
本以为会很破,比预期好,虽然很小很好的利用了房子的每一个空间,家具和用品包括餐具杯子都是宜家的,地铁出来只能从房东提供的那个出口才好找,不然真的不好找,一家六口人住这样的套房算是划算的,也有家的感觉,附近有超市,去香港大学和太平山都很近,出门不到10分钟就能坐巴士和丁丁车,除了不提供拖鞋这件事以外别的都还不错的
잘쉬고 갑니다~!

name: 雙人套房带獨立洗手間- Double room with Private Bathroom
summary: 空調客房可供2位客人入住,設有1張双人床,設有平面電視､免費無綫網絡連接和帶淋浴設施的私人浴室｡ Air-conditioned room for 2 guests featuring a double bed, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom with shower facilities.
description: 空調客房可供2位客人入住,設有1張双人床,設有平面電視､免費無綫網絡連接和帶淋浴設施的私人浴室｡ Air-conditioned room for 2 guests featuring a double bed, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom with shower facilities. 你可以地鐵到旺角地鐵A1出囗,出來后轉左,一直走,你就看到瑞士表行,你再走上一點就到富邦銀行,隔壁那個大廈就是,你上電梯到13樓就是我的賓館! You can get MTR to MongKok A1 exit , then u turn left and walk straight and then you will see Rolex watch sign then walk straight then  you will see the Fubon bank, the next building is our building!No.731 Nathan Road ,Chun Yee Building then you go up 13 floor by lift!
transit: 你可以地鐵到旺角地鐵A1出囗,出來后轉左,一直走,你就看到瑞士表行,你再走上一點就到富邦銀行,隔壁那個大廈就是,你上電梯到13樓就是我的賓館! You can get MTR to MongKok A1 exit , then u turn left and walk straight and then you will see Rolex watch sign then walk straight then  you will see the Fubon bank, the next building is our building!No.731 Nathan Road ,Chun Yee Building then you go up 13 floor by lift!

reviews.comments: 位置离地铁站很近,房东人不错
地段非常好!在旺角,离MRT很近,周边也聚集了很多美食~房间虽然很小,但很干净舒服,价格带独立卫生间很方便,在同区真的是性价比很高的啦~老板人也超级好喔!!有点难过的是我因为生病提前回去就没有好好道别,以后有机会我还会再来玩!!
房源位置非常好,离地铁站很近,去找好吃的非常方便~房间干净睡得也很舒服,房东人非常非常nice,想要再跟您说谢谢!

The place is awesome! I’d highly recommend it. The location was great - near and accessible to every place i wanted to visit in Hongkong - Ladies market, Sneaker Street, Langham Place to name a few. Also near the bus stops and the MTR station so moving around is swift and easy. I got a spacious room for myself. So happy that the bathroom has good working heater . Plus the host was so kind enough to keep my luggage even after check out time since my flight back home is still early at night.
Great place!
便宜实惠,位置好找
不错的哦,交通很方便,房东人很好,值得来
优点:地理位置超级方便,距地铁站很近｡房东很热情,为我们详细讲解了如何入住,公寓价格合适,总体性价比高｡缺点:晚上睡觉窗外会有机器抽风的响声,有点影响睡觉｡
住的地方离地铁站很近 很方便 房主人也很好
nice old classic buildings! but the room abit old fashioned but it can be improved by  brighter painting!
sss

房间的地理位置很好,下楼地铁巴士都很方便｡吃东西购物或者逛街都方便,下楼就什么都有
房间整洁,而且算是清净｡一到了房东会教你怎么样开门锁门,相对也蛮安全
房东回复客人的任何问题都很及时｡房东人其实蛮不错,你一直没到,他会一直询问你怎么样了,是不是找不到,比较负责任｡
总之这次入住算是满意,以后来还是可以住这里｡
房东人很好,民宿位置很好,走几分钟就能到旺角了
老板人很好 房间虽小但是都很到位哦 两个人旅游就够啦 毕竟晚上睡睡觉 平时都出去玩啦!经济实惠的房间 !!出行方便 地铁站就在附近哦 位置很好找!

name: The Kona Coffee Condo
summary: Plan your Big Island Getaway!! My condo is a  top floor unit nestled among the coffee plantations at approximately 1,500 feet in elevation allowing for cool breezes, amazing 180 degree ocean and sunset views.
space: Our condo is perfectly set up for your affordable vacation. It has new furnishings so you will be comfortable. Up out of the commercialized area of Kailua-Kona but within minutes of the beach, shops and dinning. You can feel like you are in your own private Hawaii or you can be in the center of anything Kona has to offer within minutes.
description: Plan your Big Island Getaway!! My condo is a  top floor unit nestled among the coffee plantations at approximately 1,500 feet in elevation allowing for cool breezes, amazing 180 degree ocean and sunset views. Our condo is perfectly set up for your affordable vacation. It has new furnishings so you will be comfortable. Up out of the commercialized area of Kailua-Kona but within minutes of the beach, shops and dinning. You can feel like you are in your own private Hawaii or you can be in the center of anything Kona has to offer within minutes. In addition to having a pool and recreation area on site, our guests are within minutes of the best snorkeling/diving in Hawaii (Two Step) as well as minutes from Capt. Cook and Kailua Village. The perfect location as a starting point for a day up in Wiakola/Kailua Village or a trip to Hilo or Volcano. Our guests can feel free to contact me prior, during or after their stay to express any concerns or ask any questions they may have. We want your fe
neighborhood_overview: The Kona Coffee Condo is located at 1500 feet so the temperatures are comfortably cooler. The immediate area around the complex is residential with no other condo complexes.
notes: We chose to purchase The Kona Coffee Condo because of it location. It is the perfect place to experience the Big Island. You will be away from the crowds but close enough to experience everything in minutes.
transit: You should rent a vehicle during your stay as public transportation is difficult no matter where you stay in the Kona area.
access: In addition to having a pool and recreation area on site, our guests are within minutes of the best snorkeling/diving in Hawaii (Two Step) as well as minutes from Capt. Cook and Kailua Village. The perfect location as a starting point for a day up in Wiakola/Kailua Village or a trip to Hilo or Volcano.
interaction: Our guests can feel free to contact me prior, during or after their stay to express any concerns or ask any questions they may have. We want your feed back to continue to improve our guests experience during their stay
house_rules: There is a seven night minimum stay for all rentals purchased through this and all rental sites.

host.host_about:
My wife and I purchased the "Kona Coffee Condo" a few years ago now! We have learned a lot about how to be hosts in those years. We have perfected our approach and learned that communication is key! We have done our very best to create an affordable, clean and comfortable place for those seeking an alternative to the common and expensive route of the all inclusive resorts of Hawaii's Big Island! 

Our goal? to share our Island home, making the ahh inspiring slender of The Big Island accessible to hard working families. We hope you will have a look and see how affordable Hawaii can be with out giving up anything the Island has to offer. Drop us request! Let's do this!

reviews.comments: Positive experience. Condo convenientlly located to activities: beaches, tours. Only about half an hour or less away from airport.  Awesome view. Yes, the condo is  appropriate for a family of four and a guest.
I had a wonderful stay in this condo! I stayed for 7 nights. We traveled everyday and came back to peace quiet and quickly felt at home! Great breeze at night and wonderful view to start your day.

This was a great experience. Robert, the host, is very attentive and welcoming. The neighbors are nice and the condo is clean and well stocked. We had a great experience with this place and would recommend it to others. It is also in a perfect location just south of Kailua.
We were in a bind and Robert helped us out. The place had beautiful views. 8 miles from Kona. It was great.

The Kona Coffee Condo is a very nice, clean and comfortable apartment equipped with all necessary appliances. The condo complex is very beautiful located in a quiet and peaceful area surrounded by the coffee farms. Robert as a host was very responsive and very helpful from the first contact to the end of our stay. He gave us clear and detailed guidance on how to get to the condo as well as other practical hints regarding the property. 
Thanks, Robert for the great experience :)

Our host Robert is great,  direction how to get there and  to get in are very clear, our questions are responded right away. When I told Robert I will be traveling with my elderly parents, he immediately informed me about the stairs from the parking lot to the unit. The place is good, can fit 4-5 adults comfortably, very clean and have all the conveniences.  It was a short stay for us, so didn't really use the kitchen much except for the coffee maker. Very recommended.
I felt very comfortable in Robert's condo.  The view was spectacular.  Robert was very cooperative if anything was ever wrong.  Thanks for providing this nice vacation spot for me!
Robert is very helpful and easy to reach.

We had a great time in Kona and the Kona Coffee Condo met our needs really well. 

The location is great for exploring both the north and south of the island, and near a really fantastic kids playground. 

You need to rent a car to do anything on the island anyway, so it really didn't bother us that the place wasn't right in town. It is, however, very close to a restaurant (a local favourite) and a gas station for those quick emergency purchases or refilling of the filtered water. 

Fantastic sunset views from the lanai!

If I come back to Kona, I would look this place up again.
This is a fantastic place to stay in Kona. Great view of west sunset over the water. Great central location. Close to the hospital since we went there for work.

Our 9-day stay at Robert's condo at Kona Coffee Villas was a treat. The place is very clean, modern, and has a panoramic view of the ocean. The two bedrooms and two full bathrooms make it perfect for a family of four. It is on the top (third) floor, but because the parking lot and entry are on the uphill side, you only need to climb one flight of stairs. The kitchen works well, and includes a dishwasher. A washer and drier right in the apartment make doing laundry very convenient. The condo seems to be in a safe and friendly neighborhood, and is very quiet at night, apart from the chorus of chirping frogs at dusk. During our stay, we found plenty of beach towels, and a handy ice chest. We liked returning to the cooler higher altitude after a hot day at the beach. There are a lot of good restaurants in the area to discover, and it seems that local organic foods has really caught on in a big way. Robert was very responsive to all of our questions and needs. We definitely would stay here again.
Robert was very responsive and helpful. We loved being up high in the coffee area and away from the busy tourist area. It was close to many great beaches.

Robert sent us all the information we needed for our stay and we had no problems. The condo was very nice and convenient to everything.
The weather was pretty humid but other than that we had s nice time.

Robert was great. He was available to answer questions and provided all required information. The place itself was quite nice and very clean.   The bamboo furniture is cool and the balcony is lovely. Its a great place to stay provided you're not a light sleeper. It's beautiful  location comes with a lot of roosters and tree frogs that make some noise. If you're a light sleeper that wants to sleep in during your vacation, consider another spot.

Robert's place was great. His directions were very clear and made it easy to find the place and get settled in.  The location was perfect.  Far enough away from things that it was peaceful, but close enough that it was easy to get to places. We had lots of space for the 5 of us. He also made great recommendations for things to do in the area.  Highly recommended.

Robert is such a welcoming host! He sent a note just before our departure and then followed up during our stay to ensure everything was as it should be. His directions from the airport were very clear and accurate, as were several tips and suggestions he passed on to us prior to our arrival.

The condo is as represented in the photos and the listing. The location was perfect for us, providing a comfortable base for daytime exploration and a welcome refuge in the evening. We used the kitchen a fair bit for breakfast and most evening meals, so really the full range with oven and refrigerator were truly appreciated. Since we are only two people, we washed our dishes by hand after each meal and didn't use the dishwasher. There are lots of pots and pans, knives, spatulas, etc, in addition to dishes, glassware and cutlery, that we found extremely helpful. 

The bed in the master bedroom has just the right bit of firmness for us. Hot water was always available in both showers.

Having in-suite laundry was such a treat. This meant we could arrive with less luggage and recycle the clothing we did bring. Since we were there almost 2 weeks, we were very happy to find and use the Swiffer mop.

We enjoyed the lanai most morning and evenings. It was so nice to have that extra 'room.'

Having wireless reliable internet access and cable TV was so helpful (we were tracking Storm Juno prior to our return to the East Coast) and highly appreciated. We also were able to keep up with Downton Abbey!

This was our first experience on the Big Island and we hope to return sometime in the future. If & when we do, we hope Robert will welcome us back!
Overall, our experience was wonderful. The condo was roomy and clean with a beautiful view.

Robert's condo was perfect! Myself and 2 other guys stayed here while attending a conference at the Sheraton. It was only a short 5-10 min drive which was perfect. Robert was in constant communication from the initial approval to the day we checked out. He was full of advice and always welcoming to answer any questions we had about what to do, where to eat, and what was available in the condo. When we were at the condo, every time we wondered if something was there it always was. Ice chest-yes, iron-yes, ice trays-yes, snorkel-yes, beach chairs-yes, beach towels-yes. They literally had everything except one (Website hidden by Airbnb) ice cream scoop. So needless to say, Robert's place has everything and it felt so cozy.
Tout était parfait. Une semaine hidyllique dans un cadre paradisiaque.  Nous serions très heureux de pouvoir y retourner.

Robert was a great host.  He was very responsive and took care of getting us a replacement visitor's parking pass.

The place was stocked with everything we needed for snorkeling at the beach.  Thanks, Robert!

Enjoyed my stay at Robert's place. Great view from patio. Condo was clean. About 20 Minutes south of airport. Was here for a running event and had both teammates and family with me during my stay . Robert was very accommodating and responded quickly to any questions I had. Would stay here again.
This is a comfortable condo with a great view of the ocean. Robert is a responsive and competent host. We enjoyed our 4-month stay at this condo.

We stayed at Roberts unit as part of a business trip.  The unit is at a much cooler elevation and has a phenomenal view of the water!  The sunsets were very beautiful. The unit is well equipped with the necessities that you will need for your stay, just pick up the food that you may want to cook!
The place was great for a family vacation! Great location! Robert is very good at communication, directions, expectations.

This house was awesome! It was equipped with everything we needed...comfortable beds, warm showers, washer/dryer, snorkeling equipment, beach chairs, ice chest, crock pot, blender...just to name a few. We were very comfortable there. If fact, a little too comfortable, as it was hard to leave and come home. 

At the end of the day, we loved sitting out on the lanai and watching the sun (Website hidden by Airbnb) was so peaceful and beautiful.

Robert was a great host and a wonderful communicator. Any question I asked, he answered, and in a timely manner. I really appreciated that!

I would highly recommend Robert's place to anyone!

The Kona Coffee Condo is the perfect place to stay if you don't want to be in busy Kailua Kona. The house is perfect and has a beautiful view on the ocean. We stayed here for the Ironman World Championship.

We had a wonderful time in Kona. This was a great centralized location for exploring almost the entire island. Just 20 min to town, and 20 min to great snorkeling areas. Lots of Kona coffee and Macadamia nut farms everywhere. Weekends were great with roadside cooks selling everything from breads to smoked Ahi Tuna and Chicken BBQ's. Great place to visit. Hope to return again someday.

Robert's place is 2-3 miles from Captain Cook, it is very convenient to the center of the city and south part of the Island and the coffee farms. The condo has a spacious living room with a beautiful (full) view of the ocean. Robert was available through email and phone providing me with detailed information. I would stay there again when I visit the Big Island. Robert provides all kinds of surfing and snorkeling gears and baby car seats.  Overall we had a great experience.
Perfectly located on a hilltop with a fresh breeze from the sea. Has all you need onsite. Spacious and very well organized. Would stay again!

We really loved Robert's place! It is a spacious 2 bedroom/2 bath condo on the upper floor with truly amazing view of the sunset! No matter how busy, we watched it every night on the balcony (lanai) with a glass of good wine. The condo is very conveniently located with access to great beaches, shopping, food, Captain Cook Bay, Kona, etc. Also, the condo is located a little higher up the mountain, so it is not as hot as at the beach, which we really loved!

Robert is a great accommodating and flexible host! I was communicating with him by E-mail and always got very quick, almost real-time, answers. I am afraid, I abused his kindness a little by asking too many questions:)

We loved staying at this condo! The location was great – – it was far cooler up here than down by the ocean. It had everything we needed ranging from beach towels, beach chairs, snorkle gear, extra kitchen utensils and more. We also have 20 month old twins, and with the exception of having to keep them out of the kitchen it was very child friendly! Robert is very prompt and helpful, and his hospitality did not go unnoticed.

Extraordinary!!!!
The best place we have stayed on the big island❤️❤️❤️
Amenities galore! My family enjoyed everything about this place. Close to everything and amazing views!
We will be staying here again!

This is a nice find. My friends and I who stayed here really liked it and enjoyed the space. I forgot there were 2 bathrooms (bonus) and a nice space to 'hang out' after exploring the island. It was nice to have a larger TV as well. All pooped out and having access to some TV, downtime was nice. We used our Fire to stream our content and was nice background noise while we played games. The location is nice. The condo (and it is a full condo on the top floor - nice) is a bit higher on the mountain (think it is a mountain) and is much cooler than by the beach. This is good to know since it may seem cloud at the condo but the beach is sunny. LOL. 

We didn't realize how awesome this bnb was until we experienced a different airbnb on Oahu which might have been a little misleading. This is a full condo - no sharing space with the owner. You have space all to yourself.  This was not a house converted into different living space, it is a condo. It is also good that it is on the top floor. We hardly heard the neighbors except for weekends when the neighbors were outside and we had the windows open.

Recommend this place for sure and if and when we come back, we will certainly look this place up.

My sister and I had a fantastic time at this condo.  It was away from the downtown Kona activity and was quite peaceful, but close enough to town so we could easily drive in to shop, go to the sights, and even do day trips to the southern and northern parts of the island.  The beach chairs and cooler, plus the snorkeling gear and beach towels came in handy.  The view from the deck was amazing!    Robert was exceptionally prompt with communications and instructions which we greatly appreciated.

We stayed here in May 2018. Robert was quick to respond, and made sure everything went without a glitch. The location is good too, 10-20 min drive from the town and not too far away from the airport as well as the beaches on the northern part. The many amenities such as beach chair and boogie boards were very useful as well. Good value & location. Thank you Robert for your place!

The view on the shore is  absolutely wonderfull and the hawaiian decoration very friendly. The localisation is perfect to discover both the north and the south of Big Island and very close to Kailua Kona. We were very surprised, when the night comes, to hear so many birds and frogs from the surrounding  : it was as if we were in the jungle... fantastic !! This is a very nice place to stay...

I would recommend this condo and rent there again if I ever get back to Hawaii.  The rates were reasonable, the accommodations were nice and being up on the mountainside made a huge difference in temperature change compared to the hot city.  The maintenance crew does a great job keeping the outside looking nice.
Robert's condo was the perfect fit for our family while staying on the Big Island. His amenities are above and beyond. And the view from the balcony was amazing. We loved to watch the sunset.
Robert's place was great--clean and well cared for, had everything we needed and forgot! Definitely would stay again!

We're sure you will enjoy Robert's place as much as we did.  We were there for four weeks, and it really did feel like home.  We had everything we needed, plus an amazing view.  The location is convenient, and close to downtown Kona.  We had family members join us a couple of weeks, and they were very comfortable too.  We highly recommend it.

The view from the lanai is amazing. The condo was very comfortable and the kitchen was well stocked. It was an easy drive to everywhere, including Kailua-Kona, Holuloa, Ho'okena beach, two step beach and Captain Cook. We also loved the pool area and the very nice BBQs available. Robert was great at communicating and keeping us up-to-date on our trip.

name: İstanbul Birden fazla bölümden oluşan bina
summary: Metro ve metrobuse yakın. Asiri guzel manzarasi var ve cok huzurlu bir ev. Banyoyu tuvaleti ve mutfagi istediginiz gibi kullanabilirsiniz. İki Haliç köprüsünün tam arasinda kaliyor.

Nisantasi, taksim, Karaköy’e 10 dakika uzaklıkta. Merkezi bir yer. Mutfak ve banyoyu kullanabilirsiniz. house_rules: Misafirler bulaşıklarını yıkamalılar ve ayakkabıyla evde dolaşamazlar. Ayrica yuksek ses yasak

name: Hab individual con terrazas y vistas a Barcelona
summary: Mi pareja y yo alquilamos una habitación individual, mucho sol en la casa y dos terrazas para disfrutar  a la hora que quieras... Barrio muy tranquilo con transporte público a 5 minutos de la casa, metros linea 4 y 5... Disfruta de la ciudad y ten tu espacio para descansar en esta casa. Te esperamos!
description: Mi pareja y yo alquilamos una habitación individual, mucho sol en la casa y dos terrazas para disfrutar  a la hora que quieras... name: 旺角市中心地鐵出口,三房兩卫一大廳
summary: 位于繁华的旺角,先迏广場,百老匯,朗豪坊就在付近｡
description: 位于繁华的旺角,先迏广場,百老匯,朗豪坊就在付近｡

reviews.comments: 房屋位置很好,在地铁口,处在旺角最繁华的地段,适合购物人员去借住,房东人很热情,屋里打扫得很干净
房间交通位置不错,离旺角地铁站比较近｡但是房间内有异味,开窗一个下午都没有太大的作用｡房源和照片信息不够准确,描述中有两张双人床,实际上只有一张还不一样的双人床｡房东答应12点以后可以放行李(房源信息中是12点可以入住),实际上12点达到指定地点联系房东的时候,还让我们等了半个小时多才进去房间｡
房子的地理位置很好,在旺角地铁站附近,毗邻朗豪坊｡房子虽小,但床位好多,卫生间也充足,关键是干净卫生又安静｡房东热情,考虑周到,是理想的选择｡
地点很好,在繁忙的旺角,离地铁站很近,要去哪逛就去哪逛｡房屋干净,床位､浴室,都充足｡在香港能够找到这样的住宿真的是很好的了!感谢房东!
地点方便,下来有7-11, 茶餐厅和糖水铺,对面就是女人街,后面几条街就是购物广场,步行5分钟就有地铁站,超方便｡可惜屋子保养缺佳,有点残旧｡

The location is still acceptable as it is consider quite near to MTR. Estimated 8 to 10 minutes of walking depending on on individual. Mong Kok MTR Exit E will be highly suitable for elderly compare with Exit D. The bedrooms are suitable for travelers who are not picky and only use it as a place to sleep. The overall experience with this unit is good.

name: light sunny room 2 min to beach.
summary: Light filled  freshly painted sunny bedroom has a king single bed.   Conveniently located 2 minutes to Bondi Beach and  very close to many of the exciting cafes, bars and restaurants  grocery stores and bakeries in Bondi.  Easy access to bus and trains which are very frequent , 15 minutes to city.
space: The building has 6 apartments .Each apartment has 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, a lounge dining area and a kitchen.  Please note the room advertised  is for a single traveller. There are extra charges for an additional guest.  A double bed can put in if you are booking  1-2 months in advance.   It is 2-3 minutes walk to the beach ,the bus stop great cafés and coastal walks.   Bondi is the cultural Mecca of Sydney .

Conveniently located 2 minutes to Bondi Beach and  very close to many of the exciting cafes, bars and restaurants  grocery stores and bakeries in Bondi. neighborhood_overview: Friendly and pleasant neighbours. Excellent facilities in the neighbourhood;great cafes, bars , pubs and well renowned restaurants to suit your particular dining preference. 2 minutes to  Bondi Beach.  Coastal walks to Tamarama and Bronte Beach or  to  Rose Bay and Watsons Bay , if you prefer the inner Harbour views .
notes: Please note that the security deposit will be higher if you intend to stay for more than a week.  $1200 for month.  Christmas  -New Year period needs a minimum of  6 days stay .
transit: Transport couldn't be more convenient. There's a choice of buses that go into the city. (phone number hidden) and the 333 express bus. They run every 3-5 minutes at peak time  or 10 minutes. there's the  train from Bondi Junction and even the Rose Bay ferry  to take you to   the city if you want to go to Darling Harbour or the Museum and art Gallery.
access: Shared laundry downstairs
interaction: Happy to spend a  morning showing my guest the local area  and giving necessary information about getting around the city.  And at least an evening meal together depending on how long you stay.
house_rules: No smoking and no pets are allowed in the building. I use my space for yoga practice so you need to leave shoes outside the door thanks .   Please leave the  space you use as you found it .   If your stay is more than 3 weeks   a cleaning fee of $80 will be charged. Please provide me Accomodation ID  and reviews before completing the reservation .

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
I am an English teacher who has taught students from many nationalities . I have travelled  countries in Europe and Asia so far and keen to do more.
 My favourite city is Barcelona  and  the village of Roquebrun in France.
 I  love all forms of movement and dance and  theatre and am devoted  to my yoga  practice .Soon  to be  yoga teacher training  in Byron.
 I love living  in the heart of Bondi. There are many activities to enjoy by the beach or if you want some solitude there are beautiful walks along the coast or places to meditate.

reviews.comments:
Karen is a wonderful host.
I really enjoyed her place and her company. Her place is clean comfortable and close to all (2 min walk to the beach)
Karen guided me through all my stay and thanks to her my 4 days visit was a filled up with the right activities.
Thanks you karen for being such a great host I hope one day to come back.

Karen is a great host. She really looked after me throughout my stay and helped me with all manner of things. I felt very welcome in her place .
 I liked that the place was so conveniently located to everything: the  shops, the  great variety of eating places and the lovely waters of Bondi Beach. Transport was very easy to the city or Bondi Junction. The place was clean and the bed very comfortable. I would definitely stay again !  Thank you Karen .

Karen is a lovely host. Her place was tidy, clean and comfortable. I felt very welcome and well looked after during my one week stay.
The place was conveniently located and close to the beach, shops and transport routes. Thank you Karen!

Karen is the perfect flatmate for me. 
Quiet, clean, respectful, nice. I had a great time with her. She is also considerate to her guests, trying to help me to find some shops or stuff like that. 
The bedroom is sunny, clean and cosy. The bed is comfortable and is bigger than he looks on the picture. The Appartement is also more beautiful than on the picture. The kitchen is very well equipped. What else to say. The location of the flat is vey close to the beach not even 5 limited walk.
I had a great time in this Appartement and will definitely come back there if I visit Sydney again.

Karen is a wonderful host and her home is lovely.  She made me feel so welcome and helped me with all my questions about Bondi.  I had a wonderful night’s sleep in Karen’s peaceful home.  Her guest room is very comfortable.  I was also lucky enough to sample Karen’s cooking.  She’s a wonderful cook!  

Karen’s home is in a fantastic location near Bondi Beach.  It was such a treat to be so close.  Just a short stroll and you’re on the sand.  Next time I stay in Bondi, Karen’s place will definitely be my first choice for accommodation, and I would love to see her again.

Had a great week in Karen's lovely apartment. The room was clean, light and spacious. Karen's a great host and went out of her way to make sure I was happy. 
Great location few minutes walk to the beach, restaurants and cafe's and easy access to public transport. Would definitely recommend for anyone visiting Bondi!
Karen is an amazing person! Big heart and a master cook chef, if you like heath food! The bedroom is bigger than in the pictures! Loved my stay!

I was made very welcome by Karen and shown around the apartment which was indeed bright and sunny and perfectly located in Bondi. Easy to walk to the beach and shops and bus and restaurants.thr room was comfy as was the whole apartment. I would stay here again! Thanks Karen

Stayed with Karen for almost 2 weeks. Where do I begin?  To say she was a fabulous host is an understatement. She was very kind, helpful and took time to write places of interest  to visit. I was made to feel very much at home at put at ease. Couldn't have picked a better place to stay.  I have enjoyed doing yoga with her,going for walks,we even found time to go for dinner one evening. 
I would highly recommend this place to stay as it is so close to the beach and public transport. Would definitely come back!

My experience was great! Karen is too hospitality and the best yoga teacher I ever had. The flat clean and ordered, really close to Bondi beach and others points of interest. Surely I'll know where to go when I'll come again in Sydney.
Thank you Karen for the beatiful experience.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Karen's apartment! It is extremely close to Bondi beach, in a clean, safe building.  
The location is also near 4 different buses to the nearest train station.  It was very easy to get around.  Food and shopping are nearby as well. 
The room is very comfortable and clean.  I felt very at home and everything I needed to know was explained the first day.  Wi-fi was also available whenever I needed it.  
Karen was fun to talk to as well. I enjoyed learning more about Aussie life and things to do in Sydney through her.  I hope to see her again the next time I visit!

I have spent one week at Karen’s. Awesome place, pretty close to the beach. She explained everything when I got to her place, like house rules and things to do in the surroundings. The room is exactly as seen in the pictures, pretty clean and organized. Breakfast available. I was able to use the laundry room. Karen was a great host, very easygoing and helpful on answering questions regarding the region and it's culture. Definitely recommended.

I loved staying at Karen's place. She is such a kind person and made me feel like home. The place is very close to the beach and in the perfect location for a stay in Bondi. I highly recommend her place and I'd be happy to stay again.

Had a chance to stay with Karen over the weekends and I'm glad I have chosen her place. It's very near to everything especially to the beach. Place is very cozy and nice. Karen is a super host! She is very hospitable and kind. She even gave me a tour and recommended the best spots to visit in Bondi, and on my last day I was a bit in a hurry to get back to the city and she offered me a ride to the bondi junction.
Karen is one of the best hosts I've ever had the pleasure of staying with. More than a stay, I made a friend in Bondi! Don't hesitate to stay with her.

Karen es como un amigo que espera por tí.  Preocupada de todos los detalles.  La pieza es muy acogedora, extremadamente limpia al igual que todo el depto.   Un lugar muy tranquilo ademas de su excelente ubicación a pocas cuadras de la playa y los lugares de entretención y comercio.  Con locomoción para cualquier lugar de Sydney.  Excelente
My stay at Karen's place went according to plan. Super A+ host and would gladly come back again!

name: Lovely Mezzanine at Porto Historic City Center
summary: Lovely apartment in the historic center of Porto, ideal for the perfect holidays. The building from the 19th century has been totally renovated but retains its original style.  The flat welcomes 2 or 4 guests. It’s perfect for a couple on vacations, but also for a business trip. It is very near to all the main touristic and cultural interest points.  The accommodation is very quiet, without exterior noise, perfect for rest. There are public parking spots around the building and parking areas.
space: T0 Mezzanine, with 2 double beds, 2 wardrobes, sitting room, dining room, equipped kitchenette (with stove, oven, fridge, electric kettle…) and bathroom with shower (provided with shampoo, shower gel, liquid soap) and wall mirror.  Offered TV, Wi-Fi Internet. Located in the heart of historic center city, the apartment has an ideal location, very near to all the main touristic and cultural interest points, such as the “Coliseu”, “Teatro Nacional de São João”, “Rivoli”. It is 3 minutes walk from “Rua de Santa Catarina”, close to all main transports, historical buildings, the nightlife area as well as supermarkets and shopping. Fresh bed sheets and towels are provided.

neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to the main touristic and cultural interest points. Points of interest: •	Biblioteca Pública Municipal – 3 min. •	Rua de Santa Catarina – 5 min. •	Avenida dos Aliados – 10 min. •	Rua das Flores – 11 min. •	Ribeira – 13 min. •	Ponte Luís I – 14 min. •	Galerias Paris – 13 min. •	Torre dos Clérigos – 14 min. •	Livraria Lello – 15 min. •	Fonte dos Leões – 15 min. •	Antiga Cadeia da Relação* – 17 min. * Actually is the Centro Português de Fotografia. Interesting cafes: •	Café “Majestic” – 5 min. •	Café “A Brasileira” – 9 min. •	Café “Guarany” – 10 min. •	“Hard Rock” Café – 12 min. •	“Hard Club” – 19 min. Theaters: •	Coliseu – 3 min. •	Teatro Nacional São João – 7 min. •	Teatro Sá da Bandeira – 7 min. •	Teatro Municipal Rivoli – 8 min. Squares: •	Praça dos Poveiros – 2 min. •	Praça da Batalha – 6 min. •	Praça da Alegria – 8 min. •	Praça de Santa Clara – 10 min. •	Praça da Liberdade – 11 min. •	Praça de Carlos Alberto – 15 min. Churches: •	Igreja de Santo Ildefonso – 4 min. •
notes: At check-out the guests should leave the key on top of the table and NOT inside the door keyhole. If anything breaks or if the guests need any kind of assistance, text me and I'll try to fix it in less than 12 hours. The guests can find me on (Hidden by Airbnb) or on phone.
transit: By metro, you need to enter at Airport Metro Station at the violet line and go until "Campo 24 de Agosto" Metro Station. You need to buy a Z4 metro ticket. It costs 2,00€ plus 0,60€ for the card. This trip should take around 25 minutes. Once you arrive at "Campo 24 de Agosto" Metro Station you need to walk to the apartment address (Rua de Santo Ildefonso, 231). This should take around 6 minutes.
access: The guests have access to everything in the flat and are free to use everything that is in the apartment.
interaction: I'll be in charge of giving the guests the code to the street door and the key to the flat. I'll give the guests my contacts. If they need anything, I'll be in touch.

reviews.comments: Great apartment, in a great place, great contact with Alice, everything is fine.
Lovely flat in the center of Porto. Nice neighbourhood. The flat has been beautifully modernised and has 2 double beds.

Cute apartment in a nice quiet building. Alice was lovely, and checked us in, and left us some local port to enjoy. The air conditioning was super effective and we had everything we needed. We definitely enjoyed our stay!

Petit appartement très sympa en plein cœur du centre historique.
Parking juste à côté .
Merci beaucoup à Alice

The appartment is very small it looks bigger on the photos. We were out all day otherwise it would be to small. 
Great location near the centre.
Good comunication with Alice she is very flexible because we new very late what time we could
check in.

Magnifique séjour dans ce bel appartement propre, calme et super bien situé.  Tout est à proximité et près de l'eau. L'accueil et les petites attentions d'Alice ont été grandement apprécié.  Un coup de coeur!

Alice’s place is a beautifully clean, comfortable, well-equipped apartment. Everything works well and there are lots of useful extras e.g. hairdryer and iron. As a mother and daughter travelling together we found it perfect, providing separate and communal space. Good location for exploring Porto, very convenient for shopping, eating and sightseeing.

Overall ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Pros: location (near great restaurants, shops,  metro) 
, clean beautiful interior, consistent WiFi, comfy beds, great amenities

Perfecto. El apartamento es exactamente como se ve en la imágenes. Nuevo, muy limpio y cuidado al detalle. Las camas son muy cómodas. Alice fue muy puntual y amable con las explicaciones. El apartamento está muy bien situado, a menos de cinco minutos caminando de la plaza de Batalla y plaza de Aliados. Hay varios parking públicos en las calles adyacentes y en la propia plaza de Poveiros que está delante del apartamento. Repetiré en este alojamiento si vuelvo a Oporto en el futuro, sin duda.
lovely stay with Alice. thoughtful touches on arrival and an excellent location, close to all the amenities and attractions but also quiet enough to have a restful time away.
위치도 괜찮고 시설도 괜찮

This is a lovely little gem in the very heart of Porto. It's got everything that makes you feel at home, and even more! From a welcome drink and biscuits on arrival, to plenty of bottled water, towels, pillows, and anything that you may wish. All main amenities and places of interest can be reached on foot, and connections to the airport are also very convenient. Two double beds in a separate space make the place prefect for a couple as well as friends, or mother and daughter, like us. I would definitely recommend this place!

This is a Wonderful place. Clean, beautifully decorated and with everything you need for your stay in Porto. Comfortable and quiet as well. Totally recommend it! Let alone the fact that Alice was very nice and available all the way.

Alice was a great host from the outset, being responsive and answering all of our questions as needed. The place was great. We expected a comfy place with all the required amenities within a good location,  and that's exactly what we got! Would recommend.

Very nice, stylish and cozy apartment located in a nice area near the city center,  Alice is a really nice host, ready to help. The apartment is very clean and there’s everything for a comfortable stay for qu’eut a long time. Thank you for the cookies)))
Brand-new place nearby the shopping area. Fully equipped and ideal for 2-4 people just as shown on the pictures. The neighbourhood is quiet.
El apartamento pequeño y no mucha ventilación

Everything is near, the city center is 5min walking, the coast also, even less. Really perfect location. Hope to come here again, and thank you Gulben for everything!
Gulben is the sweetest hostes ever. She was more than helpfull to us and her house makes your staying more than pleasant.
Excellent location and very comfortable appartient. Gulben designed all  with a good taste and we flat like at home, surrounded even by cats behind the windows))

The location and the neighborhood is really good, The fat is clean and confortable.

Location is great with a sea view.if u would like to enjoy the silence and piece, here is the right place.
Çok güzeldi, çok teşekkür ederim. Herkese gönül rahatlığı ile tavsiye ediyorum.
Ev sahibi  Nilüfer hanim çok candan bi  bayan kendisinden ve evinden memnun kalarak ayrıldık.Hersey icin teşekkürler

nilüfer hanım, harika bir ev sahibi. evinde çok mutlu ve çok huzurlu iki gün geçirdik.  kendisi bizi hem candan karşıladı hem de her konuda yardımcı oldu. evin konumu oldukça ideal, ne çok tepede ne tam rıhtımda. adada araç kullanılmaması ve kış olması sebebiyle tam istediğimiz gibi sakin iki gün geçirdik. yılbaşını dışarda kutlamak için seçenekler mevcuttu, tercih etmedik. evde nilüfer hanım ihtiyacınız olabilecek temel malzemeleri ( havlu, şampuan, kurutma makinesi, mutfak araç gereci vb.) size veriyor. diğer ihtiyaçlar için rıhtımdaki marketlere ulaşım çok kolay. evin balkonu oldukça keyifli, manzarası insanın içini açıyor. ısıtma olmamasına karşın ev elektrik sobasıyla çok rahat ısınıyor. wifi süper çalışıyor. evde zeynep ve tarik adlı iki kedi var, ikisi de çok uysal ve sevimli çocuklar. istanbul’a bu kadar yakın olup aynı zamanda kalabalık ve gürültüden bu kadar uzak olmasından ötürü kınalıada haftasonu kafa dinlemek için mükemmel bir konumda, nilüfer hanımın evi de çok çok iyi bir tercih. kesinlikle tekrar kalmak isteriz. 
herşey için teşekkürler, tekrar görüşmek dileğiyle nilüfer hanım!

It’s a really magic place, winter time possible filing like you are the owner of island, because it’s looking like nobody then you. The sunrises from the balcony with panoramic sea view, silence and cosmic peace and love and care the owner of house and them gentle cats and cosiness artistic hom’s comfort make you clean and happy. Hope to come back one day.

name: Entire apt perfect location
summary: Cenral location in Etiler. 10 minute walk to Levent metro station. Very convenient for singles, family and businessman alike.Located centrally close distance of the two  Bridges, metro and bus stations, this  flat  offers free WiFi, air conditioning.  This property is at walking proximity to high-end shopping and entertainment districts and perfectly located allowing fast and easy transportation to almost any attraction in Istanbul. The Zorlu Performance Art Center is also in walking distance.
space: Cozy one bedroom apartment with a queen bed in the bedroom, a couch and a sofa bed in the living room, fully equipped kitchen and a comfortable bathroom. The apartment is on the first floor of the building.  My apartment is centrally located very close to metro station and walking distance to Akmerkez, Kanyon, and Zorlu shopping malls. There is also a bus stop right outside the building. There is even a barber and a hairdresser at the entrance of the building :) There is a playground right across the building and a major supermarket right around the corner. For medical assistance (hopefully you will never need), there is a private hospital down the street.  The apartment also offers very easy access to both Bosphorus bridges.

Food options range from fast food burgers and pizzas to upscale steak and fish restaurants.  You can grab a ride and will be by the Bosphorus in 10 minutes to access other happening areas like Bebek, Arnavutkoy and Ortakoy.

host.host_about: My husband and I are avid travelers and love exploring new places. I've been living part time in Los Angeles and part time in Istanbul for the last 18 years, but when in Istanbul, love spending time in our apartment enjoying the view and our many succulents :)

reviews.comments:
Wonderful apartment in a stunning location! The apartment is very well equipped, clean and quiet. The wireless internet is excellent and fast. Large and very private apartment. The hostess tried to respond to all our needs and was available when we needed her. There are 3 malls (8 minutes walk from the house), a subway and many supermarkets and small shops very close to the house and A- lot of restaurants.
I highly recommend !!! 5 Stars from me :-)
Nice host and nice flat, everything was fine. The flat is located near the metro so this is really a good point! and for the price it's really attractive.
Very nice place, place much bigger than it looks in the pictures, good aircon, close to shops

very good location, clean house, quick response, air-co on each room and good wifi. this was what we were looking for and that was it. if you dont look for a new furnished house, Gizem's place is a very good choice. for sure we will stay there next time as well...
Nice and homely flat in a very good location in Istanbul. Picking up and dropping off keys was very convenient

The house is location is central and it's really easy to get to. The place is decorated stylishly, and the flat certainly has a cool vibe. I wish I could stay longer, and I will make sure to look into its availability the next time I'm visiting Istanbul.

Dispones de 75m2 para relajarte después de un ajetreado día visitando la ciudad; Tomarte un refresco o un vino en la terraza, sentarte entre cojines en el sofá viendo la nueva ruta hacer para el siguiente día, un buen snack en la cocina, una ducha relajante seleccionando la caída del agua en lluvia para salir dispuesto a comerte la ciudad o dormir como un bebé en las confortables camas.

Y la cocina el corazón de todo apartamento, ahí dispondrás de todos los electrodomesticos posibles para hacerte sentir como en casa. Os espero!  ;)

neighborhood_overview: Centro histórico de Barcelona que le envuelve su gente cosmopolita. Una mezcla de razas hace emblemático el lugar. Tiene un gran abanico de restaurantes, bares, cafeterías y pubs todos con sus terrazas para poder respirar, comiendo o tomando algo, el mágico distrito que es Ciudad Vella. Esta en un punto estratégico en el cual andando todo lo tienes cerca, Ramblas, plaza Cataluña, Paseo de Gracia hasta el Puerto con su majestuosa estatua de Colón. Dispone del 2 mercado más importante de Barcelona después de la Boqueria, donde podrás deleitarte de su gastronomía más Gourmet. Es un barrio en el que te hace vibrar las mejores sensaciones y donde vivirás más la ciudad.
transit: Esta muy bien ubicado asi que tú estancia a pie sera muy cómoda. No obstante tienes una línea de metro ( L2 Sant Antoni ) a dos minutos de mi lugar.

name: FANTASTIC APARTMENT SAGRADA FAMILIA
summary: The APARTMENT is perfectly adapted for short-term-living, it contains all necessities and luxuries to satisfy your stay. Newly renovated, it keeps the delicate balance in between antique building structures, typical for Barcelona housing, and modern design comfort. By the choice of natural colors, I managed to create a space inviting to relax and feel home.
space: it’s composed of tree bedrooms, living room, full equiped kitchen and two bathrooms. All furnitures are new. Sofa, tv, full equiped kitchen, fridge, washing machine, towels, bedclothes, WIFI-Internet connection. IMPECCABLE CLEANING. Everything you need for a perfect and comfortable stay. The apartment is on the 5ft floor (lift/elevator) and just 1 min walking to the Metro Sagrada Familia (lines 2 and 5). Next to the building you will find a supermarket which is 7 days/ 24 hours open. The ROOMs feature a very comfortable new double visco elastic bed 150 cm x 200 cm size, night tables, wardrobe and a private bathroom. Bed linens, towels, toilet paper and hairdryer are provided.

neighborhood_overview: The AREA is ideal if you come on vacations: it has the benefit of a more refined and sophisticated ambiance and it’s a wonderful alternative to others heavily and noisy tourist populated parts of Barcelona. Transport links make it a destination in itself as well as a convenient base for exploring all this energetic city has to offer. WHAT TO SEE: the Sagrada Familia neighbourhood is home to the city’s most celebrated landmark, the spectacular Sagrada Familia temple, the masterpiece of Antoni Gaudí, Barcelona’s most famous son. Leading up from Sagrada Familia is the delightful Avinguda de Gaudí with its many bars and restaurants, which ends at the stunning Hospital San Pau in the adjoining district of El Guinardó.
transit: You can walk around Sagrada Familia area and reach all beautiful corner of the city by metro Sagrada Familia. The metro is 3 minutes walking from home.
access: All flat area is aviable to turists.

reviews.comments:
We spent a week at Jill’s condo, and it was such a fantastic experience, we can’t wait to go back. We have a family of 5 (two adults and three children). The bathroom is very large, has a separate tub and shower and double vanity, which makes up for the fact that we all were sharing one bathroom. Beds were comfortable. The condo has AC, which we discovered we needed after trying to go without AC for a night. Two boys shared a bed in the second bedroom, and our daughter slept on the pull-out sofa in the living area. Linens were provided and were tucked away in the coffee table storage. 
Having three TVs was great when kids wanted to watch different shows. The washer and dryer in the unit were very convenient. We were provided with enough towels for all of us but also could wash them when needed. 
The resort was very nice. The pools are beautiful. The kids especially loved the pool with a slide. Parking was convenient. Location was great —ten minutes from Lahaina. 
I also went to the spa onsite and had a massage. One of the best massages I’ve had. 
Pool and beach toys were available, but we didn’t use them. Overall, we had everything we needed for an awesome week. 
I would highly recommend Jill’s condo and hope to go back soon.

An amazing Maui experience. We loved Jill’s personal recommendations, the amazing beach gear available to use and Monty was fabulous helping our check in go so smoothly. Resort experience with special personal touches. We highly recommend this property. Thanks Jill!
amazing place, top notch location, easy to access everything, great for kids!
