name: COMPLIMENTARY WINE & CHILD FRIENDLY
summary: Relax in our 110 sqmt fully furnished flat in Osmanbey, Sisli. Two min to metro, easy walk to Taksim. 10 min to Lutfi Kıdar - Istanbul Congress Center. Complimentary Turkish wine. Big terrace. Family friendly! Central, comfortable and safe location.
space: We'll pick you up in Taksim and bring you to the apartment in Osmanbey (just one metro stop) which is 110 square meters with a huge terrace and living room. T The Master Bedroom has a comfy queen size bed and new soft sheets.  Kids room - bunk beds with futon style mattresses, toys, Legos, games and books if you are travelling with children.    The sofa also opens to accommodate one more person. Two 'akbill' travel cards are provided for your use during your stay. Free wireless internet. Washing machine/drying rack and laundry soap. Fully equipped kitchen: gas stove, oven, pots & pans, French press, kettle, toaster, plates, glasses and cutlery, olive oil and spices.  Fresh mint, basil, rosemary and oregano growing on the terrace (seasonal). Herbal teas and coffee provided as well as a complimentary bottle of Turkish wine. City guide books and maps provided. Full bath with shower and tub: fresh clean towels, soap and shampoo. Quiet, safe and comfortable. Enjoy your stay in Istanbul!
description: Relax in our 110 sqmt fully furnished flat in Osmanbey, Sisli. Two min to metro, easy walk to Taksim. 10 min to Lutfi Kıdar - Istanbul Congress Center. Complimentary Turkish wine. Big terrace. Family friendly! Central, comfortable and safe location. We'll pick you up in Taksim and bring you to the apartment in Osmanbey (just one metro stop) which is 110 square meters with a huge terrace and living room. T The Master Bedroom has a comfy queen size bed and new soft sheets.  Kids room - bunk beds with futon style mattresses, toys, Legos, games and books if you are travelling with children.    The sofa also opens to accommodate one more person. Two 'akbill' travel cards are provided for your use during your stay. Free wireless internet. Washing machine/drying rack and laundry soap. Fully equipped kitchen: gas stove, oven, pots & pans, French press, kettle, toaster, plates, glasses and cutlery, olive oil and spices.  Fresh mint, basil, rosemary and oregano growing on the terrace (seasonal).
neighborhood_overview: Osmanbey is very central, located between Taksim and Sisli with many restaurants, cafes and bakeries and is one of the main shopping districts of Istanbul. Enjoy the organic market on Saturdays, the flea market on Sundays and the regular fresh fruit and vegetable market every Monday and Thursday.  Macka Park is just a ten-minute walk away as well as Nisantasi with its upscale shops and restaurants. Lutfi Kidar - Istanbul Conference Center and American Hospital are also only ten minutes from our front door. Taksim can be reached by foot in 20 minutes. The main tourist sites are easily reached by taking one bus to Eminonu.
transit: The Osmanbey metro station is two minutes from our front door. The metrobus station is one 'metro' stop away. Walking distance to Nisantasi, Taksim and Gezi Park. Kabatas ferry boats - 15 minutes away Sultanahmet - 30 minutes
access: The entire apartment is being offered.
interaction: We pick up our guests at the Taksim Havatas arrival point and bring them to the apartment. Someone will always be available via mobile phone and email. There is also a superintendent that lives in the building.
house_rules: Absolutely no smoking in the apartment. Smoking on the terrace is allowed.

host.host_about: I'm a former New Yorker living in Istanbul. Love photography and travelling...I work as an editor and teach part-time.

reviews.comments:
April ist eine sehr nette und zuvorkommende Gastgeberin. Die Wohnung ist ideal für eine Familie mit Kindern. Unsere Kinder sind 4+1 Jahr und haben sich dort sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Terrasse ist das Highlight, wir haben sehr schöne Abende dort verbracht.  
Die Wohnung liegt sehr Zentral, Metro & Bus ca. 300m, Geschäfte ca. 100m.

April is the perfect host, and her flat is the perfect flat for a holiday in Istanbul. Beautiful rooms, beautiful terrace, great kitchen with all you'll need for a little home cooking, tons of maps and guides waiting for you on the living room table.
This has been my best AirBnB experience so far, no contest!
You cannot find a better home away from home in this amazing city!

We loved staying in April's lovely, spacious home! She made us feel very welcome and was on hand with lots of advice and useful tips about the local area. Having the terrace was such a bonus and we spent many hours out there when not exploring the city. The central location was perfect, making it easy to get just about anywhere that we wanted to go. Overall, an A+ Airbnb experience. Thanks April, and we'll see you next time we are in town.

We had a very enjoyable stay at April's apartment. It was clean and spacious and the pictures reflect the reality. She had plenty of guidebooks and maps of Istanbul which were very useful. The neighbourhood is safe and very easy access to busses and the underground.

We have just come back from Istanbul where we had a fabulous time. Such a wonderful time was largely due to the kindness and good will of April Chapple and her husband Ufuk. They helped us to find transport from the airport, met us at the end of the bus journey from the airport, organized transport cards which were brilliant and booked us a taxi to go to the airport at the end of our journey.

Their flat is situated in a good, genuine area where we felt safe and from where we found easy and quick transport. The flat itself is very clean, comfortable and artistically decorated.

I was a bit worried when I saw that the flat was on the 4th floor, but this was not a problem for us at all. At the end of our stay we all felt rested, fit and happy!

I highly recommend this lovely place.

April's apartment is just as pictured if not better. It felt as a home away from home; even the pantry was filled with food for us to use. April's husband was gracious and helpful. The apartment is clean, functional, cozy and very convenient to the Metro station, bakeries, cafés, local restaurants and the fabulous Bomonti organic farmers market on Saturdays where we had the freshest fruits and snacked on Local Turkish delicacies, all washed down with tea. On Sunday the Bomonti flea market made for a wonderful shopping experience and some unique souvenir to take back home. The terrace was without a doubt our favorite place for breakfasts and dinners, while our girls thought the kids bedroom was the best thing about Istanbul! :) 
Thank you April and Ufuk for opening
your home to us and for your help in making our stay a memorable one.

We really liked it very much to stay at April's flat. The flat is a perfect place also for a longer stay in Istanbul. It is located in a central but silent little street in Sisli. It is very large, spacious and cozily furnitured. If you like to cook on your own you find everything you need in the kitchen. We loved to sit on the roof-terrace in the early morning and in the evening, especially on the very hot days in August. 

We did not meet April personally because she were on a journey, but everything was prepared just perfectly and welcomingly. April's husband allowed us in and introduced us very friendly to everything which was necessary. 

The house is an older one and for this it has some little patina. But we didn't miss anything and we were perfectly satisfied. The flat is nicely decorated, you can really relax after an exhausting day in the city. I can really recommend April's place, also for a little family.

We have just arrived in London. In the last two weeks, we felt in April's flat like "Home away Home". Specially our two boys enjoyed in the kid's room with lots of toys that much that they didn't want to go out. On our arrival in Istanbul, April and her husband with their son Devrim waited for us in the bus station. We will never forget the warmest welcome we have received from them. They organised our travel card, and accompanied us to the apartment. They provided us  with all the information, so that we could enjoy our trips to Istanbul. The house was in excellent condition, nice and clean, exactly (even more than accurately) in the pictures and descriptions. She looked after us all the time. We got everything that we needed. Even she was so kind with our very late  check out time, let our kids to have rest until 22:00pm though the checkout time was 12:00pm. We just can say our staying in April's house will be always an unforgettable experience in the memory. If we go to Istanbul again in the future, definitely we will choose her house again. As a host, she is highly recommendable. Specially someone/couple with kids should not look further, just choose her house straight way.
In German: April ist eine unvergleichbare Gastgeberin, sehr emfehlenswert besonders fuer familie mit kindern.

THANK YOU SO MUCH!!

April was incredibly nice, friendly and dedicated. She welcomed my parents, my sister and I as we were old friends and we felt at ease very quickly. Furthermore, she was available and answered quickly when we send a message to her. 

The apartment was clean, comfortable and very convenient, perfect for a four persons family ! April terrace is just the best place in Istanbul, sooo cosy !

Finally, the apartment is located next to Osmanbey station, which is very convenient !

I highly recommend this apartment for those who have the chance to travel to Istanbul !

What a cosy and quiet apartment! We felt at home immediately. The numerous travel guides on the table helped us to plan our days in Istanbul. And April's 'welcome-wine' helped us relax after a full day of sight seeing.

This was an amazing stay. April is the most helpful host, she met us at bus stop, guided to her home, and even provided with two Istanbulcards for public transport. She and her son Devrim are just great. 

Apartment is very close to Osmanbey metro station. It looks totally like shown on pictures. It has everything you may need and even more. Kitchen tongs? - yep! A screwdriver? - here it is! Adorable kids room, full of toys, is a lifesaver. Our toddler loved it. I appreciated it most, when we overslept and I had only one hour to pack, and really needed that kid to be busy :)

Neighborhood is great. Clean and comfortable, with lots of places to eat and shop. Far enough from tourist catwalks, but they're still easy reachable by foot. Our favorite spot was the War Museum, within a five-minute-walk from apartment. Biggest collection of weapons and arms in a historical building, and hardly any visitors, so you can enjoy it all for yourself. 

I should mention that there is no elevator in the building, but it may only be a problem for elderly or handicapped people. We got stroller and toddler up and down with no effort.

It is the second time my friends and I have been guests at April's beautiful flat, and we couldn't be happier with the experience.
Great location, amazing equipment in the kitchen, good heating and hot water in the winter (which was truly precious given the weather conditions during our stay) and cosy atmosphere. Once again, the perfect choice for Istanbul!

We had a lovely stay at April's home! 

The apartment was quiet and comfortable and a super place to come back to after a day of exploring the city. 

April is a thoughtful and kind host. She was wonderful with communication and she left information and lots of resources about Istanbul that helped us. We arrived while she was away and she arranged for a friend to meet us and guide us to the apt on our arrival . 

The neighbourhood is close to access all city sights by metro ( maybe a two minute walk away) but far enough to be outside of tourist areas which was great. Small grocery is minutes away, lots of cafés nearby as well. 

April's son had left some toys and books out which was really appreciated by our two kids! 

Recommended stay !

The apartment was roomy and well equipped. We had some difficulties in getting connected with April when we arrived as we had not made arrangements to have cell service. April's family was gracious and came and got us in the rain. 
The location was great once we got our bearing and public transportation was pretty easy. 
April had left us snacks and coffee. My granddaughter loved the children's room. We would defiantly recommend this apartment to anyone.
Wonderful, comfortable apartment and close to the city. Everything was organised and the guides were really helpful. It was a pleasure!

We had a wonderful, wonderful time is Istanbul, and April and Ufuk's apartment certainly played a part in it. Ufuk was kind enough to welcome us in Taksim Square as soon as we got off the airport shuttle, and to take us to the apartment with his own metro card, which he left for us to reload and use throughout the week. The apartment is ideally located, with a supermarket just a the corner of the street, and less than 3 minutes from Osmanbey metro station. April and Ufuk left us a nice bottle of red wine, and plenty of extras : we had coffee, juice, etc... The apartment is absolutely lovely (I just love the square frame in the bathroom), decorated with charm and great taste. The beds are extremely compfortable, the four of us slept like babies. And my youngest son certainly enjoyed Devrim's toys! We would definitely recommend this charming place to anyone travelling to Istanbul.

We have been welcomed by Ufuk, April's husband, who came to pick us up at the suttle station, and drove us in taxi until the flat. It was so nice from him. We also had the pleasure to drink a good bottle of wine offered by April, a very nice attention ! 
The flat is really nice and big. The main room is very comfortable. We were 4 people, so 2 of us slept in the kids' room, where the bed are actually not so much comfortable but it was ok. The convertible sofa in the living room is actually not for 2 persons. 
The only problem we had was the bathroom : very very low pressure (complicated to wash your hair when you are a girl with long hair !) and sometimes some bad smells (but if you keep the window open it is ok). 
Other than that, we really enjoyed the terrace, which is huge and very nice for a drink outside at night. 

The flat is located quite at the north, with the Osmanbey metro really close by. It is out of the touristic spots, wich is quite nice when you want to discover something else. We didnt really find places to eat or have a drink  in the neighbordhood; but we didnt search so much (i am sure there are some).
We really felt good in the flat. 

Thank you again April !
April and ufuk were really nice and helpful. They had left us two metro cards, city guides, coffee, juices etc. Apartment was roomy, quiet and clean.

Das Appartment hat uns alles geboten, was wir als Familie brauchten: Die Kinder konnten spielen, es war genügend Platz für eine Familie und alles vorhanden was wir brauchten. Wir wurden sogar mit einer Flasche Wein und Saft begrüßt. Die Schlüsselübergabe funktionierte problemlos, alles war wunderbar! Zudem liegt die Wohnung otimal für die Erkundung Istanbuls und zugleich ruhig, dadurch, dass sie in einer Nebenstrasse ist. 
Vielen Dank für alles alles!

A great oasis tucked away. Yet so close to public transport.
A truly fantastic place to stay with a wonderful array of toys for my son.

name: Step In Porto -  Loft w/Mezzanine
summary: The apartment is located in the center of Porto. You can walk around downtown easily. It takes 3 minutes walking to the bus and metro stations. 10 minutes from the train station. The street is one of the most authentic in the city,  just as the neighborhood is very traditional. There are  lots wonderful restaurants around. The apartment is completely restored maintaining the original 1932 feeling, with a charismatic mix of brick, stone and iron. Welcome and feel at home. The Step In Porto Team

name: Chic & Modern 1BR in Little Italy
summary: This chic apartment features a modern kitchen with new appliances, a spacious living area, and your very own balcony. Located in Little Italy only a few minutes away from Saint-Laurent Boulevard.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. My home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: This chic apartment features a modern kitchen with new appliances, a spacious living area, and your very own balcony. Located in Little Italy only a few minutes away from Saint-Laurent Boulevard. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. My home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. This apartment is on 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator.
notes: This apartment is on 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator.
house_rules: - __________HOUSE RULES__________   1. All bookings require a security deposit of $250 or more. Security deposits aren’t collected automatically. A host uses the Resolution Center to upload documentation of the damages (like photos or receipts), and request money from their guest to fix those damages.    2. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance.    3. We do not allow smoking and pets; breaking this rule will incur a $250 fine.    4. Parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations; breaking this rule will incur a $250 fine.    5. If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $40 for every extra hour per housekeeper of cleaning required.    6. Guests are not allowed to do an instant booking in their city of residence. Please let us know the reason of your inquiry before booking.

reviews.comments: Gilles and his place were AWESOME!!! Would definitely recommend!!!

The place was nothing short of expectations! It’s a great, stylish, modern and extremely clean space. Everything was tip top as if the apartment was brand new. The access to public transportation (Jarry metro station) was also extremely convenient. The neighborhood itself is very quiet at night and vibrant with life and full of little shops/cafes during the day. I would definitely book this place over any hotel room in the city!
Excellent host.  Everything was just perfect!
Super clean and nicely furnished!  Definitely felt at home!
Had a great stay here in Little Italy. Very close to the metro (orange line) and convenient. It was a great value and a beautifully designed apartment for a couple. Would stay here again!

Appartement moderne, propre, très bien équipé, et situé dans une rue résidentielle très calme. Description tout-à-fait conforme à la réalité. Location pratique, confortable et sans (mauvaise) surprise.
Awesome place!
Super séjour! Je recommande sans hésiter!
Une oasis de paix en toute sécurité. Très confortable avec toutes les commodités désirées. Quartier vraiment intéressant!
Very clean and everything you need

logement parfait et propre 
à deux pas du métro 
je reviendrai sans hésiter

The place is amazing, very clean, pretty well equipped, very comfy, Jarry stations is very close even if its snowing the distance is not a big deal and Montreal is a small city so you can be anywhere and go back home pretty quick, i recommend this place a lot!

name: Eyup Sultan Family Apartment
summary: Eyup Sultan is a historic area of Istanbul.  This newly built apartment is within walking distance to local shops and restaurants surrounding Eyup Mosque.  Nearby, Pierre Lotti has plenty of cafes and walks  to give you fantastic views of this beautiful city.  The local buses can take you to Topkapi Palace, Blue Mosque and Grand Bazaar in approx 20 mins.
space: This first floor apartment is within a new block of 8 flats situated in a quiet, residential area.  The entrance has a few steps leading to the ground floor, lift and access to stairs.
description: Eyup Sultan is a historic area of Istanbul.  This newly built apartment is within walking distance to local shops and restaurants surrounding Eyup Mosque.  Nearby, Pierre Lotti has plenty of cafes and walks  to give you fantastic views of this beautiful city.  The local buses can take you to Topkapi Palace, Blue Mosque and Grand Bazaar in approx 20 mins. This first floor apartment is within a new block of 8 flats situated in a quiet, residential area.  The entrance has a few steps leading to the ground floor, lift and access to stairs. Car parking is available in the basement.  The kitchen has a balcony area with tinted windows. Airport transfer is available on request.

name: Suíte 7 : Suíte Tribord
summary: Le Relais de Marambaia, localizado em Barra de Guaratiba, entre o centro da cidade e Ilha Grande, um dos últimos refúgios ecológicos do Rio de Janeiro, imerge o hóspede em uma atmosfera de encantamento, cercado de paisagens paradisíacas. Oferecendo serviços de Spa, Stand Up e Restaurante para passar momentos memoráveis.
space: Suite com varanda frente para o mar, cofre, TV decodificador SKY, ar-condicionado, frigobar e ducha dupla. Café da manhã completo e personalizado incluso para 2 pessoas.
description: Le Relais de Marambaia, localizado em Barra de Guaratiba, entre o centro da cidade e Ilha Grande, um dos últimos refúgios ecológicos do Rio de Janeiro, imerge o hóspede em uma atmosfera de encantamento, cercado de paisagens paradisíacas. Oferecendo serviços de Spa, Stand Up e Restaurante para passar momentos memoráveis.
neighborhood_overview: Barra de Guaratiba é um lugar maravilhoso, com varias possibilidades de trilhas, passeios de barco, atividades aquáticas (surf, stand up, kayak, etc). As praias podem estar muito frequentadas nos finais de semana, feriados ou no verão. Porém, na pousada, limitamos o numero de pessoas para garantir a tranquilidade de nossos clientes.
notes: O estacionamento na região pode ser complicado, particularmente durante finais de semana, feriados ou ferias. Disponibilizamos uma vaga de estacionamento por suíte, porém, aconselhamos de vir de taxi ou Uber para mais comodidade. Não temos gerador de energia. Em caso de chuva, podemos ter quedas de eletricidade durante um tempo indeterminado. Disponibilizaremos lampadas solares nesses momentos, porém não poderemos assumir nenhuma responsabilidade.
transit: Tem vários estacionamentos próximos caso seja necessário.
access: Acesso direto à piscina e sauna seca
interaction: Todas nossa equipe ficará feliz de assistir você durante sua estadia.  E se precisar, eu e meu marido, Paul,  gerentes do hotel, estamos disponíveis para qualquer duvida, antes, durante e depois da sua estadia.
house_rules: - Não possuímos gerador em nosso estabelecimento, em caso de falta de energia elétrica no bairro ou na cidade do Rio de Janeiro, gostaríamos de deixa-los ciente que esta situação não está sob nosso comando e sim da empresa fornecedora deste serviço. Gostaria de deixa-los informados e cientes que não temos gerador no estabelecimento e que em caso da falta de energia elétrica não somos responsáveis por possíveis danos ou inconvenientes causados aos clientes.     - Não dispomos de apartamentos para fumantes, por tanto pedimos a gentileza de não fumarem no interior de nossos apartamentos inclusive nas varadas, caso contrario lhe será cobrada uma taxa de R$200,00, para higienização do apartamento após o seu Check-out. Informamos também que conforme Lei Municipal nº (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) é proibido fumar em lugares fechados ou parcialmente fechados (como as varandas dos apartamentos).  - O cliente poderá efetuar o consumo de produtos adquiridos fora do Hotel no interior de seu apar

name: SUNNY, SPACIOUS APT. in  FT. GREENE
space: Nicely-furnished,  well-lit, one-bedroom apartment JUST ONE BLOCK from beautiful Fort Greene park.   PRIME LOCATION on tree-lined street also within steps of other the Brooklyn Flea, DeKalb Ave. restaurant row, the Saturday farmers' market, BAM Arts Cultural center, Pratt University, the Brooklyn Museum and Brooklyn Botanical Gardens. Living space constitutes the top floor with views to the street and garden below.  All rooms are lined with windows and have the original wooden floors. Ceilings are high, closet space is good, and there's a spacious bathroom with skylight.  Clean sheets/blankets/pillows/towels provided. Perfect for single or couple. Easy access to public transportation at the Dekalb and Atlantic Terminals. One stop from Manhattan on the express; 10 minutes to downtown Manhattan, by cab. The immediate area has several grocery stores, health food and organic options, a drugstore, and many restaurants as well. High-speed Internet with Wi-Fi, and Washer-Dryer in basement.  A

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: pareja joven de nyc, primera vez en buenos aires,  buena onda Y considerados. gracias y bienvenidos

reviews.comments: The apartment was just as beautiful in person as it is in the photos. The neighborhood is great; located near Fort Greene park with a number of restaurants nearby. It's also an easy trip into manhattan. I spent three weeks here when starting a new job in Manhattan.

It's so easy to review Valerie's place! Everything deserves 5star no matter which criteria.
The neighborhood is interesting, friendly, with pretty nice groceries, cafes, bars and restaurants. Oh, and with the best flea market on earth!
The aptm. is on a beautiful tree-lined street with brownstone buildings, close to Fort Greene Park, quiet enough to sense tranquility and the cool Brooklyn spirit.
Valerie's place is very cosy, really spacious, clean, functional, very well decorated and with lots of light. The bed or should we say "the cloud"... is amazing! 
A few steps to get to the subway and, in 15 minutes, you're eating oysters in Manhattan!
Overall, we loved the Airbnb experience and recommend Valerie's place to everyone who wants to find the best way to discouver Brooklyn. 
Finally, the famous last word goes to Valerie. We really felt privileged to know her. Kind and helpful, gave us excellent hints and makes you feel at home. Gorgeous persona and great host! (Thank you so much Valerie : )

Gorgeous apartment, very clean, comfortable and stylish indeed. Valerie was super accommodating, and was able to make the place available at very short notice. Neighbourhood is awesome; very laid back and full of great little restaurants, coffee bars and cafés. I would recommend this listing without any reservation!

My mom stayed at Valerie's place and thought it was perfect. Valerie was most gracious upon arrival and checked in to make sure everything was in place.

The apartment is smartly decorated and has pretty much anything one would need. And the location is excellent.

Valerie was a great host and we loved staying there. She was courteous and helpful. The apartment is beautiful, clean, and comfortable. Its one block from Ft. Greene, and a handful of blocks from many subways. Recommended.

My husband and I had a great stay in Valerie's apartment. The place was clean, nicely decorated, and spacious. Valerie left instructions and tips on a typed sheet on the table which was very helpful. I also really enjoyed this location - we traveled into Manhattan everyday on the subway and found it to be an easy commute with multiple lines we could take. We wished we had more time to try some of the nearby restaurants in the Fort Greene neighborhood and loved being next to the park. The only downside we experienced was that the A/C units hadn't been installed when we arrived and high temperatures were in the mid- to upper-80s that weekend, which made the apartment pretty toasty even at night. However, Valerie messaged me about the issue afterward and I don't expect that to be a recurring issue. Overall, Valerie was a responsive, thoughtful, and responsible host, and I recommend her apartment as a comfortable, clean, nicely appointed and conveniently located place to stay in NYC.

The location is amazing, right by the park and tucked out of the way on a block of brownstones, but also near food and nightlife and access to subways. The apartment is basic but nicely decorated and more than adequate for a visit to NYC. The price is great for what you get and I'd recommend this in a heartbeat.

One significant hitch: there was a heat wave and A/C units had not yet been installed, and I was unable to get a hold of the handyman to install them (apparently he was out of town). The apartment is warmer than the outside temp even with windows open and shades drawn. Given the heat -- 96 fahrenheit -- I had to eventually book another place. However, Valerie was incredibly kind and refunded my entire stay, and was communicative throughout despite not being in the country at the time. Had it not been for the A/C issue and surrounding misfortune that the handyman was not around, I am sure it would have been a flawless stay.

name: Studio 8.01 with Parking and Air-Conditioning
summary: This apartment is set in a very complete building, with all the services you may need during your stay in Porto: 24h security, comfortable bed with over mattress, air-conditioning, equipped kitchen, internet, laundry service on the entrance level where you also can find lounge areas with snack machines. But in fact, in two minutes you can reach the Mall Alameda, where you can do your shopping without haste and always accompanied by Wi-Fi.
space: We could say, like 'portuenses', that the apartment is placed at the heart of the city, it's undoubtedly the heart of the Dragon, to which the city owes much and we will be happy to introduce it to you, and much more about the history and culture of Invicta City. This work is born right here at Antas, where the heart beats white and blue and we want you to take some of us with you. We will provide you with a unique stay, with all the facilities you need, but what we really want is you to have an experience of Porto in all its splendor. We open the doors to a small world of details that we know that will warm your heart and we hope you will return soon! We promise you will miss us!

neighborhood_overview: Chão De Memórias’s home is located in Porto, Portugal. Right next do Dragon Stadium and a metro station with a direct line to the historical center. Next the apartment you also have a shopping mall "Alameda" and a big supermarket "Continente".
transit: The Metro entrance is 5 minutes walking: Dragon Stadium station, and in 8 minutes you are in the historical center of the city! You can also use taxis.
access: Laundry Lounge areas Garage
interaction: We are always available for you by phone, and the building has a 24h security that can help you when you need, day or night!

reviews.comments: This place is located a little bit out of the centre, but only a few minutes walking from the metro station, with metros going downtown every few minutes. This in combination with free indoor parking made it an ideal location for us to explore the city. Furthermore, from the balcony you can view right into the Dragão Stadium, and even follow FC Porto matches if they play at home. The apartment is clean, and everything that you may need during your stay is present and brand new. For any other needs and groceries you can visit the mall, which is located in the same building and easily accessible. The place feels like a luxury hotel suite, and the host has lots of good local tips and will help with any restaurant/tour reservation that you may need. There is no doubt that if we would visit Porto again, we would try to book the same place (of which I'm sure it will be difficult once others discover it too). Thank you for a lovely stay!

El apartamento estaba muchísimo mejor de lo esperado, aunque las fotos del anuncio hacen justicia. No faltaba detalle, albornoz, toallas nuevas, ropa de cama impoluta, colchón super cómodo, secador, incluso algodones desmaquillantes,... El apartamento superbonito, super limpio y con un toque muy elegante y moderno. Todo estudiado al más mínimo detalle. 
La zona, al ser a las afueras era muy tranquila y las vistas al campo de futbol del Oporto.
Y nuestra anfitriona Mónica, super atenta y simpatiquísima.
El apartamento está ubicado en un centro comercial muy nuevo, conectado por el parquing, con lo cual puedes ir al centro comercial desde el apartamento, sólo cogiendo un ascensor y el centro comercial cierra a las 23:00.
Otro punto a favor es el parquing privado.
La verdad es que nuestra estancia en Oporto es de 10. Lo recomiendo 100%.

Our host, Monica, was very responsive and responsible in her communications with us; receiving us personally on our day of arrival;  personally guiding us through the entrance to the car park; giving us tips and ideas on where to visit in Porto and Douro Valley; and welcoming us to ask her any questions during our stay.

The apartment is in a very good location, well secured with security downstairs and has a good view of the Dragon Stadium. While it is not in the city centre, it is only a 5 minute walk to the metro (only a few metro stops to the city, not a problem at all).  Good for those who don't need to stay in the buzz of the city but yet still want to be close enough to enjoy the city. The apartment is also connected to a shopping mall, which has all the services that would be most useful for travellers. As we rented a car, the apartment's private parking gives us a peace of mind about parking.

During our stay, we were also very lucky to view a soccer match between Porto FC and another club. We could see the match (also on the TV) and feel the roar of the fans from the apartment's balcony. Definitely a surprise and enjoyment for us! 

The amenities in the apartment is well considered and we felt well rested and comfortable staying in the apartment.

Thank you very much, Monica!!

We highly recommend this lovely modern apartment it is in a top position as you are right next to one of the best Portuguese supermarkets we have shopped in
There is Cable TV and a Bluetooth sound system the first we’ve come across which we enjoyed immensely 
The Metro is a few minutes walk away 
Purchasing a day pass you can travel all over Porto with buses included 
We loved it

Adorei a minha estadia ! 

O apartamento é muito mais bonito pessoalmente do que nas fotos. :) 
Gostei de cada detalhe que tinha meio rústica...
Colado ao prédio tem o Alameda Shopping e a 10 minutos do centro do Porto. 
O Anfitrião Tomás, super simpático, flexível e comunicativo. Fácil check-In e check up, nota 5* sem nada apontar. Muito obrigada. 
Recomendo vivamente ! 
Espero voltar  :)

name: East Village w/ Private Bathroom & Roof & Elevator
summary: This is the best place in the entire East Village.  You will have a private room with your own private bathroom and two large windows that look out at the Empire State Building. The room gets a lot of light so be ready to say hello to the NY sun. There are 4 other roommates in the apartment. The place is huge with 30 Ft ceilings and there is a spiral staircase in the middle that leads to a private roof that overlooks all of Manhattan. Grill.  Steps from Clinton Restaurant row.
space: This apartment is really the best in the market. Quiet and relaxed on its own, but steps from all the nightlife and restaurants you can handle. The perfect spot for an extended New York stay.
description: This is the best place in the entire East Village.  You will have a private room with your own private bathroom and two large windows that look out at the Empire State Building. The room gets a lot of light so be ready to say hello to the NY sun. There are 4 other roommates in the apartment. The place is huge with 30 Ft ceilings and there is a spiral staircase in the middle that leads to a private roof that overlooks all of Manhattan. Grill.  Steps from Clinton Restaurant row. This apartment is really the best in the market. Quiet and relaxed on its own, but steps from all the nightlife and restaurants you can handle. The perfect spot for an extended New York stay. You have access to the kitchen, living room, basement gym, private 2500sf roofdeck with amazing views of all of manhattan, private terrace in the back of the building, and study room located on the ground floor There will be someone nearby that can help answer any questions you may have Our neighborhood rocks! It has cafes a
transit: Our neighborhood rocks! It has cafes and restaurants all within a walk a way. It's a local hotspot for Friday and Saturday nights and has easy access to all other parts of Manhattan and Brooklyn. Feel like going to Williamsburg for the day? Take the L train over. Feel like going uptown to site-see? Take a Citi bike (located right outside the building) or a subway (F train is 2 blocks away) Everything is accessible from this apartment and that's why we love it most.
access: You have access to the kitchen, living room, basement gym, private 2500sf roofdeck with amazing views of all of manhattan, private terrace in the back of the building, and study room located on the ground floor
interaction: There will be someone nearby that can help answer any questions you may have
house_rules: Treat the apartment as you would your own. No large parties. Overnight guests are fine and you can invite friends over from time to time.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Law student living in NYC. Born and raised in NYC and know tons of places to go around in the area.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: SUPREME BALCONY DOUBLE ROOM
summary: Es una habitacion privada en un piso compartido, solo para turistas, yo no vivo en este piso.
space: Welcome to Barcelona, the city where culture, joy and adventure meets together!!! Barcelona is a magnify city and full of culture which makes it attractive to visit plenty of very fascinating sightseeing places and enjoy one of Europe´s most exciting cities. In order to make your stay perfect we offer you the following services: In the apartment enters a lot of sunshine during all the day, so the flat is very light. At the moment of check-in, you will get your private key for your bedroom. We offer you a comfortable double bed for one or two people. The living room is very comfortable and has an exit to the balcony, there you can talk whit the others guests and meet new people. The flat have 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room and balcony. The flat includes: Fully equipped kitchen Washing machine WIFI-Internet connection Cable TV All our rooms include: Towels, toilet paper, soap, sheets and blankets Touristic information of principal must-see places of Barcelona - Next to the
