notes: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
interaction: Yo estoy siempre a disposicion en mi telefono, mi amigo vive en el piso y puedes ayudarte en lo sea
house_rules: Soy amigable, tolerante y muy respetuosos de su privacidad, y recibe a los huéspedes que son lo mismo. Check in es 13:00 y la hora de salida-a las 10 de la mañana, aunque esto puede ser flexible si no tengo clientes inmediatamente antes / después.  Le invitamos a utilizar la cocina para el desayuno, sándwiches y bocadillos, y usted puede utilizar el microondas, cafetera y tostadora, dejando todo limpio como encontraste. No se permite invitar a los no invitados al apartamento, para su seguridad y la mía. Hay un montón de bares de moda y cafés cercanos para reunirse con amigos. Sin ruido excesivo 11 p.m.-8 a.m.. Por favor, mantenga esto en mente, ya que es la ley local. I am friendly, tolerant and very respectful of your privacy, and welcomes guests who are the same. Check in is 13:00 and check-out-at 10 am, although this may be flexible if I have no customers immediately before / after. We invite you to use the kitchen for breakfast, sandwiches and snacks, and you can use the microwave,

host.host_about:
I and my brother have a big apartament and love meeting new people and the better way is with the airbnb.
We're an experienced AirBnB host and traveller with a good understanding of what you need to make the most of this lovely city, from guidebooks and maps to local insights and recommendations. I am on call 24/7 and do my best to help people have the best experience possible during their stay.

reviews.comments: My friend and I were happy this place was instant book. We booked it the night before and it fit our needs. We were given a nice tour upon arrival. There was plenty of pamphlets with info on things to do in Barcelona. Here my friend and I found a bike tour we would not have found otherwise--the bike tour was the highlight of our trip! Wifi worked best in the living room--not very well on our own room. The kitchen area was nice. We didn't use much because we only stayed one night. Other people are staying here too so it was a little loud but not too bad. Our bed was comfortable. The people running the place live right downstairs if you have questions, so that is great. Thank you for a great place to stay in Barcelona for a night!
It was a good location and the house had everything we needed!
More of a hostel than a apartment but it was fine bed as comfy no issues
Great place, hosts very welcoming (even picked me up at the airport). Clean and very comfortable. The apartment is close to everything you'd want to see. Would use again!

It was a rather cold welcome from Moniques cousin. She explained everything to us, however in a manner that was not quite welcoming, but neither unfriendly. At the end of our stay we asked if we could leave our baggage there, because we were departing in the evening, and that was no problem, which was nice. 
The neighborhood is fine - things are not quite in a walking distance (for example to the Ramblas it is about  1 1/2 km), but you can reach everthing with the subway. The station Poble Sec is around the corner, a bit less than 5 minutes walking. 
The room itself was OK, it was spacious and bright, but there were also some defects. For example there are no wardrobe and no beside tables. So in the few days we were there all our clothes that we unpacked (we travelled with backpackes) laid either on the bed or on the makeshift "wardrobe" (which is more or less a hallstand with a little place where the extra blanket was). Really a problem to fix. Minor problem: I had my difficulties to lock up the door. About the other rooms: the bathrooms were rather dirty, the shower, as well as the water-tap and the mirror. The size of the bathrooms is nice and also there is no problem getting along with the other guests because there are two. Kitchen: we didn't use it very much, but it was fine, everything there you needed. 
The apartment as a whole was OK, but nothing more and for me not worth the price, sorry.
Un piso muy acogedor, muy limpio y muy bien situado. Monique es una buena huésped

As this is our first time in Barcelona, we were very worried about our stay. We contacted Monique and Monique told us that her brother, ignor provided shuttle services from airport to the house for 25 euros. ignor fetch us from the airport and as it was only 9 plus am(which is too early to check in), he brought us to a neighborhood cafe. He treated us for breakfast and we really appreciate it. Ignor warned us about the pickpockets and told us about the places of interests, entertainment outlets and our surroundings. He make us feel very comfortable in Barcelona . He has been a great help.

As for the room, it was fine. Simple and perfectly good enough for travelers to stay in. The train station was about 15 mins away. The neighborhood was pretty safe. I would recommend for travelers to stay here .
The location is good, nice view from the windows. Bathrooms and kitchen are also good and the host is very nice
Todo muy correcto
My stay was very nice. The neighborhood is pretty calm and in a great location pretty close to the subway. Everything was very clean
Excelente todo
Спасибо огромное!!!!! Мне очень понравилось все!! Квартира комфортабельная уютная, расположение отличное! Рядом метро и площадь Испания!! Обязательно вернусь!! Всем рекомендую!!
El alojamiento perfecto, tal cual se anuncia. Volveré.

게스트 룸 형식인듯;;
광장까지 걸어갈수 있어서 좋은것 같아요
드라이기 없어서 머리 말리는게 조금 힘들었음 
침대 시트는 도착했더니 눈앞에서 갈아주었었네요

Todo perfecto según pude ver en el anuncio. La habitación un lujo y la ubicación de la casa de 10: Nos permite estar en pleno centro de BCN y llegar a cualquier sitio caminando o en metro, pues la boca más próxima de metro está a 50 metros de la casa. Una zona súper tranquila y con muchos servicios de tiendas, restaurantes y demás. Los anfitriones encantadores y todo en la casa muy ordenado y limpio. Recomendable cien por cien. Mucha privacidad.
Ha sido una estancia estupenda. De hecho repito experiencia y lo recomiendo al 100%. Todo muy limpio, tal cual como sale en la imagen y contando con la amabilidad de Nathalie. Gracias por todo.

Positiva esperienza, abbiamo soggiornato per 1 notte, ospiti di Monique. Camera in ordine, pulita e come da fotografia. La camera è parte di un appartamento di 4 stanze con 2 bagni condivisi. In zona tranquilla, comoda per i mezzi, la metropolitana più vicina è a 300 metri circa e permette di raggiungere la zona turistica in un attimo. Gentilissima la proprietaria e sua cugina Natalia. Consigliatissimo.

It was just what we needed. My boyfriend and I stayed in one of her private rooms. We had a good experience. We didn't run into the host very much but we know we could contact her if we needed too. It's really just a bed and honestly it was all we needed because we were never in the room.
todo perfecto, un 10
Habitación según foto, situada convenientemente cerca de todas las zonas de interés. Repetiré cuando vuelva a BCN
The price was fair. Nice neighboorhood, not so far from city center. The room and bathroom could have been cleaner.

Natalie era muy amable y disponible para cualquier pregunta. La habitación, el baño y la cocina estaban limpios y el piso está muy bien situado.
Muy recomendable
Muy céntrico, cómodo y mantiene la privacidad pese a ser piso compartido con otros huéspedes.
El lugar es extremadamente sucio y desprolijo . Desde la puerta de entrada al edificio en adelante. M e parece que airb&b ia evaluar los alojamientos.
Séjour agréable, sans soucis. Logement a prproximité des transport.
Location is great! Very close to the centre but at a quite street. Natalie (the host) were vwry nicw and helpfull, apartment was very light, room was cosy with a small nice balcony

Very good neighbourhood with good infrastructures and transport network, also great if you don't mind walking some lengths. A nice transition from Barcelona's busy downtown. Natalie was very welcoming and kind. However, the house is extremely dusty and you're going to have a hard time sleeping if you're allergic to dust. Plus, I never saw or met the airbnb hosts. Overall, it's a good place to stay if you want to save but it is disappointing to see that the "SUPREME DOUBLE ROOM" turned out to be an allergic nightmare.
La recepción fue cordial. El barrio está bien.

I've never met Monique or Igor, just their cousin Natalie. She was polite and helpful. 
The room was cosy and clean. Apartment is in the middle of the city with excellent connection with most important places in BC. 
One problem which we had was internet connection. It was not working properly.
Estuvo todo muy bien, limpio, ordenado y buen servicio; la zona excelente, cerca Plaza España.

It was a pleasure staying in monique apartment tho i never met her because she's working on my arrival day. I was welcoming by her roommates natalie. She was nice. The apartment was exactly the same as the real room. The nearest metro station (poble sec) can be reach within approximately 10 minutes walking and within 2 or 3 stop you will be arrived at placa de catalunya. The area was quiet and also there is a 24hrs mini market nearby. I recommend this place for you who wants to visit barcelona. Ciaoo :)

Natalie, Monique's cousin, and I hit it off right away!   She invited me out with her and her friends on my first night, and they all made Barcelona feel at home!   The place is great with an amazing balcony to the street.   Natalie works hard to keep the place very clean!

Thank you Natalie!

Jessica
The room and location were great. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! I hope to stay here again!

We told the host we the time we would arrive, which is before the check-in time and she said it was fine and we can go straight to the apartment and there will be someone waiting to get us in. We arrived by the time we told the host but there's nobody home, we have to wait about 20 mins until her niece came, without saying a single word about her being so late, and of course no sorry at all.

The room is quite okay but there's not enough space to put all of our stuffs, we ended up placing our clothes on the floor and on a chair since there's only one table and one chair without closet.

I don't know if the wall of the room is so thin or what. I stayed with a friend and we talked in a totally normal level of loudness, then Natalie (the host's niece) came and said we were talking so loud!?

the location is not too good but also not too bad.
The room and bed was comfortable, place well situated. Very small elevator. Well managed, but had more the feel of a backpackers.
Район отличный, квартира очень хороша для ночлега.
bueno estuvo alguien para recibirnos aun con el atraso del avion.y el barrio muy bien ...

I arrived at the apartment to a warm welcome and was shown round by Natalie. The apartment was in an amazing location, situated right next to the metro and walking distance from the plaça catalunya and drassanes. I went to sonar festival and the location was perfect to get to walk to the day, and get the metro/train at night. Did not meet Monique but met Igor and Natalie who were both incredibly humble people who were always there to help (and spoke perfect english). Room was as shown in the pictures and perfect as i didnt really spend much time there apart from sleeping. Apartment was next to a busy road although not directly situated ON the road meaning it was quiet at night.

Overall my stay was excellent and I will definitely be coming back and staying next year for sonar or monegras.

We were greeted by their cousin Natalie and she was friendly and accommodating. The apartment is about a 5-minute walk to the metro station, and only a 10 to 15-minute walk away from Placa Espanya (where the aerobus from the airport stops, and where a shopping mall and the Magic Fountain is located), so it was quite well located. There were 2 toilets in the apartment so it was very convenient despite there being other guests staying in the apartment as well. We were there during the heat wave so it was extremely warm, but thankfully there was a fan in the room which helped a little!
Great neighborhood close to must see tourist sights but away from the hustle and bustle.  Host was super friendly and provided everything needed!

房東度假去,但吩咐親友接待,沒有怠慢,十分友善｡
房子地點佳,交通便利,附近社區更有好幾家熱門餐廳,使人驚喜｡

Although, Monique and Igor were not at the apartment and I didn't see them, their friend Natalie was helpful and welcoming. The apartment was ok and the room and the bathrooms were clean. I did share a balcony with another room and my balcony door could be opened even from the outside, easily, so I wasn't sure about leaving my money in the room. However, the overall experience was good.
Experience was generally Ok. Very friendly people. Was hot in Barcelona though and room not aircon.

We had a wonderful three night stay at Igor's and Monique's place. We were welcomed warmly by Natalie. The apartment is very close located to a Metro station and is surrounded by cute bars and restaurants. The view is lovely.
The flat is in the third floor and luckily they have an elevator (which is not common). The two bathrooms were clean, and so was the big kitchen. 
We will be back - thank you for everything.
Quite nice experience. The place is about 20mins waking distance to La Rambla and other main attractions.
Great location! Clean rooms and even a rooftop terasse!

Le logement correspond bien à l'annonce, l’accueil par Natalie était chaleureux.  Il est possible de se poser dans le séjour, utiliser la vaisselle, le frigo. Point négatif en revanche sur la connexion internet un peu capricieuse. Je ne sais pas si cela était passager ?
Flat With a very good location , metro near by directly going to plaza Catalunia , fancy bars and restaurants around!
Natalie was great. Met us early so we could drop our bags before heading out. She was a veey good host and made sure we delt comfortable.

Pfff, quelle déception. Les photos ne correspondent plus à 100% (j'en ai prise sur place)
Chambre : petite, pas de place prévue pour mettre son linge, le lit n'est pas très confortable (les ressorts font mal au dos), pas de Wi-Fi, 2 malheureuses chaines de télévision, fils de la TV qui pendent du mur, mur sale, tapis de sol sale, oreillers qui sentent mauvais, serviettes rêches et malodorantes .
Ventilateur capricieux, ne fonctionne que par intermittence. Lorsque l'on laisse la fenêtre ouverte, impossible de dormir à cause du bruit...
Terrasse communique avec la chambre d'à côté, difficile donc de la laisser ouverte en journée.
Salles de bain : les diffuseurs multi-jets des 2 salles de bain sont plein de calcaire, le fil de douche rouille,  tapis de sol sale, sol d'une des 2 douches sale, W-C peu nettoyés et pas très propres. une des 2 cabines de douche est trop petite et la paroi vitrée de la seconde douche n'a pas été nettoyé une seule fois en 8 jours, chasse d'eau d'un des 2 W-C met 8 minutes à se remplir (pas très pratique)
Cuisine : essuies sales, vaisselle de la "cousine" qui n'est faite que le lendemain de l'utilisation (24 heures après), frigo pas propre.
Il manque une table pour pouvoir manger à son aise.
Salon : canapé plein de taches, le mur n'est pas celui de la photo car il est tout blanc, coussins sales, TV multi-chaînes.
Balcon arrière : petit, il y a une machine à laver et le linge personnel de "la cousine" qui sèche toute la journée, donc pour le petit déjeuner en terrasse c'est raté.
Toit aménagé : dégueulasse, vieux frigo, bbq, vieux sofas de plage et autres qui traînent. L'endroit ne donne pas envie de s'y attarder.
Situation : quartier vraiment sympa et situation géographique intéressante pour visiter la ville.
Divers : on sonne à toute heure pour les arrivées, ce qui est normal... mais la cousine n'entend pas cela à cause de sa musique ou du fait qu'elle dort et l'insistance de la sonnette devient dès lors embêtant.
"La cousine " (désolé, j'ai oublié son prénom) est sympa et donne des conseils touristiques si nécessaire.
Le commentaire est chargé et négatif mais je l'estime sincère .
C'était ma première expérience en Bnb et je crains que ce sera la dernière.
J'estime que cela ne vaut absolument pas son prix et je regrette de ne pas avoir réserver un hôtel car la différence de prix n'est pas si énorme.
Bref, je regrette cette malheureuse expérience et c'est moche lorsque l'on s'offre une semaine.
Je regrette mais je ne recommande vraiment pas l'endroit.

The room was ok. I liked the people there and everyone was very kind.
There area of the room was perfect and everything was close the reach with the subway. 

Was very great there!!!

+ good location, close to subway and busses
- noisy and verry hot
- room should be cleaner

I needed a room at short notice and Monique and Igor's place was able to fit me in. The room was exactly like in the photos. 

The room was one of a number of rooms in two apartments that Monique and Igor don't live in and rent for Air BnB, so the experience wasn't the most friendly or personal. Natalie, who runs the rooms for Monique and Igor was lovely though. She also let me leave my bag after I had checked out for a couple of hours so I didn't have to carry it around with me. 

The location was pretty good, but I could have done better for a similar price had I not been looking around at the last minute and for only one night.

The place was very nice and had a very homely vibe to it. Monique or Igor wasn't there but natalie their cousin did a great job showing me around and explaining everything  to me. Would definitely recommend it to anyone traveling to Barcelona for a holiday or a short stay.

The apartment was pretty nice, location really good! We didn't meet Monique and Igor but their cousin Natalie welcomed us and gave us some helpful tips. We had a really good time also with the other people staying there. Everything you need, kitchen, balcony, 2 bathrooms, living room, so it was enough space for everyone. 
We would definitely come back here :)

Muy buena experiencia el quedarme en este lugar, me dejaron claro todo dese un inicio, no pude ver a los anfitriones porque no coincidimos con los tiempos pero la verdad recomiendo mucho este lugar limpio, el cuarto muy cómodo y amplio, a 15 minutos caminando de las ramblas y muy cerca de restaurantes muy buenos.

Lo recomiendo mucho.
Saludos!
The apartment is just so so,not clean.

I've had a good time staying at Monique&Igor, the place is clean, shared bathroom, but this was not a problem, quiet, near Placa Espanya which is a great place to spend your evenings because of the shows that are held at Magic Fountain. I recommend!

Monique and Natalie are great hosts, friendly and welcoming.
The room is cozy as the pictures show. The flat is located within walking distance of many attractions. The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay, even a heater in the room in case of a cold. 
I recommend! =)

Had a amazing time in Barcalona the weather was perfect for me during the day a little chilly at night but not too bad.Meet Monique briefly she came across a lovely girl her cousin wasn't well loaded with the cold while I was there.the apartment was fine for me had everything you need was only sleeping as I was out most off the day and night the area was just 10 minutes to the Rambles on the metro.Love the Gotic area .
All good happy with welcome , great location and nice rooms
A very good place to stay clean and comfortable I recommend this place to anyone who's gonna visit Barcelona for a short trip.
Me senti muy comodo en la casa de Monique & Igor, es linda y muy bien ubicada. Ademas fueron muy anfitriones, gracias! Los recomiendo obviamente

I would recommend this flat to everyone, walking distance from the centre and many attractions, only 7 min walk from Magic Fountain (with music and light entertainment in the evenings, ''must see'' when visiting Barcelona), easy to access by metro. Only 25-30 bus drive to airport (bus 46 or Aerobus). 
Natalie was very welcoming and helpful (she also lives in the apartment, which is convenient). My room was very spacious with TV and balcony. Access to roof terrace for anyone residing in the flat.

The host was very nice and allowed us to drop off our bags before the assigned check-in time which was very helpful. The room was as pictures and very neat although the door lock to my room didn't work all of the time and concerned me since it was a multi-group Airbnb with me just renting a private room. The place has a washing machine; however, the host asked for 5 euro to use it. Overall it was a positive stay
Ich habe mich auf den freundlichen Empfang hin von Natylie gleich sehr wohl gefühlt!

The place was easily reached from the airport. Room was exactly as on the picture, very comfortable and spacious. Hosts replied to my calls promptly. No fight for the bathroom or toilet was needed, although shared, there were 2 of them. Shared kitchen looked promising for a longer stay, although I didn't have the chance to use for my stay was very short.

il soggiorno a casa di alba e Igor è stato comodo e soddisfacente. Natalie è stata sempre molto carina. La stanza non era eccellente ma rispondeva alla descrizione dell'annuncio. La posizione era ottima

A great location near metro station! the bedroom is big enough for 2 persons. The house is full of rules, you need it because of All the guests, but it looked like a studentapartment. The showers were most of the time cold. The people were All very nice! Thanks

I had a positive experience at this apartment. Monique and Igor's friend was there to meet me when I arrived at 10:30 pm (my plane had been delayed). She handed me the keys and left, trusting me to enjoy the apartment by myself! The bathrooms, kitchen, and TV area were shared with guests in other rooms, so it felt more like a guesthouse than an apartment. Nevertheless, I had no problems with my stay. I could tell my room was a little bit "used," but the bed was clean and comfy, which is what mattered. For the price, it's much better than staying in a hostel. Thank you so much!
Great place and responsive for a last minute booking! The room was perfect and easy to get to.
Stanza carina, posizione ottima non lontano da plaza espanya. Qualche appunto sulla pulizia, ma tutto sommato non male!! Natalie muy simpatica y disponible:)
Прекрасная комната, прекрасная квартира и прекрасные хозяева!
Lovely place and convenient. Helpful host who gave contact information so always there to help with anything if needed! Great value and nice space. Thanks!

Nice central flat, room is comfortable and looks like on the pictures. Monique and Nathalie were very helpful and always available if there were any problems. kitchen and bathrooms are small but there is everything you need for a short stay.

Staying at Monique´s and Igor´s place was really nice. The room was exactly as on the pictures, very sunny and cleaned.
The apartment has a great location and it was also easy to find.
It was a nice experience and they were always here for us if we needed any help. 
Thank you again.

Very friendly and easy handling. super charming place in the center of the city - good connections and very nice rooftop terrace.

thank you and haste proxima!
lars

Good location,easy to everywhere,and their equipments are helpful for longstay.Thanks Natalie for waiting me to 11pm to check in.but,the electric water heater is not quite enough for four rooms,if you come back late,maybe no warm water.

Monique was away when I arrived but her cousin Natalie was there to meet me when I arrived.  The flat was super clean with 2 bathrooms and 4 rooms.  The neighbourhood was very central and one block away from a metro station.  I walked easily to la Rambla and was able to access all parts of the city easily from the metro.  I would definitely recommend this apartment to visitors of Barcelona.

I don't recommand this room! Nobidy was here to welcome you at the expected time of my arrival. Finaly, the cousin of the host arrived and made me enter the appartment. She could not speak a word of English and did not explain me anything of the flat and the city. When I entered the room sheets where durty with stains and hairs everywhere and it was so bad I had to open the cupboard to find clean ones and do my bed myself... the host does not live in this appartment... The toilets were broken and the bathroom durty! They just rent the 4 rooms available to make money. That is definitely not what I expected from the airbnb experience... I was disapointed...

I enjoyed my stay very much 
Stephanie recieved me very well
The room was nice and a good shower
There is an elevator (last 2 housen i stayed I had to climp
allot of stairs)
I'll go back there anytime

Die Unterkunft war optimal für diesen kurzen Trip. Es hat alles was es braucht, ist ordentlich, sauber und ruhig. Die gastgeberin hat alles gut organisiert und kommuniziert. Der ablauf war reibungslos. Die aussicht aus dem zimmer war superschön, die zimmer an sich sind hübsch und sauber. Danke viel mal!

I was greeted by Nathalie (Monique relative) she was nice for meeting me late upon my arrival to hand the keys to me. The listing was as described, room was spacious but bit old furniture, but the glass window had a part that doesn’t have a lock, and it was cold one of the nights during my stay and was concerned if anyone can open from outside the balcony. Room was value for money, was away all day and just wanted a place to sleep. Bathrooms were ok. Couldn't find a kettle to boil water at kitchen. Wanted to leave my luggage till I travel at night and I was not allowed, had to run to Sants station to keep the baggage. Neighborhood was just perfect, close to alot of buses and Poble Sec station.

Monique & Igor have a very nice apartment, in a pretty central location - it is withing easy walk to both Plaza de Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Communication with Monique was easy and check-in and check-out very easy. Apartment is clean and well equipped. We would recommend this place.
Our host was friendly, the apartment was in walking distance of Las Ramblas, Plaça d'Espanya, and a metro station. The room was nice, very comfortable bed, and kitchen and bathrooms were clean.

Everything was perfect. The room  exactly as described, wonderful location (nearby two metro stations: Poble Sec and Pl. Espanya). The host was very kind, invited us and explained all the things that we should know about the house. We can only recommend the stay by Monique & Igor.

Pokoj vypadal ve skutečnosti jako na obrázku. Byly zde dvě koupelny a základně vybavená kuchyně k využití. Byt se nacházel na dobrém místě, kousek od stanice metra. V okolí byla spousta obchodů, supermarketů, restaurací a dokonce jedno velké obchodní centrum. Všechny památky byly v dostupnosti do 15 minut metrem. 20 minut pěší chůzí byl park Montjuice s lanovkou a úžasným výhledem na celou Barcelonu.

My boyfriend and I had a great experience! We would highly recommend staying here. The location is very central and easy to walk or take public transportation. There are many great shops and fresh produce markets near by. The room was clean and quite spacious.
Все понравилось!!!

gracias monique !
nos hemos sentidos muy cómodos en tu casa.
Recomendamos mucho este lugar !
Excellent clean room in the centre of Barcelona! Would highly recommend

Eine Freundin und ich haben ein Zimmer bei Natalie gemietet. 
Am Flughafen haben wir ihr geschrieben, dass wir später kommen und sie hat freundlicherweise auf uns gewartet.
Als wir das Zimmer betraten ist die Freude aus unseren Gesichtern geglitten.
 Leider war nicht gesaugt oder geputzt. Unter dem Bett waren Wollmäuse, auf dem Bett Haare und auf dem Nachtisch eine dicke Staubschicht. Die Fenster waren nicht ganz dicht und es hat sehr gezogen. Die Matratze war schon komplett ausgelegen, wir haben jede einzelne Sprungfeder spüren können. Die Küche war sehr dreckig. Jeden Morgen haben wir daher vorsichtshalber, vor Gebrauch, das Geschirr nochmal gespült. Auch der Herd, Backofen und der Kühlschrank haben schon lange keine Putzmittel mehr gesehen. Wir haben einen Staubsauger gesucht, jedoch keinen gefunden. Die Badezimmer waren schimmelig und waren auch nicht geputzt. Es war unschön sich auf die Toiletten zu setzen. Wir haben uns in der Wohnung, daher nur aufgehalten, wenn es nötig war. Der Balkon und die Dachterrasse entsprechenden leider nicht den Bildern. Wir hatten auch nie bis selten Natalie fragen zu stellen da sie nie da war oder noch geschlafen hat.

Die Location war ansonsten aber gut und man konnte durch mehr oder weniger kurzen Spaziergängen alles gut erreichen. Die Metro war auch sehr nah.
Lindo departamento, comodo, muy bien ubicado cerca de estaciones de metros, lugares para visitar y comprar
Great location. Very close to the subway. There is also access to the terrace which is located on the roof. Host friendly and helpful :) Very well appreciate stay and would recommend :)
Great room! Friendly host. If you're not used to city noise bring earplugs, because this is close to a main road. Other than that everything was fine.

This apartment is well located, right next to Poble sec metro. On our arrival, the hosts cousin welcomed us on time and had no issues. The amenities were however poorly maintained. Also the window in the room was broken so all the sound from outside was unavoidable, incl the party goers at 3 am.
Clean, good value for money, nice location

I was greeted by the beautiful Natalie who showed me the ropes (keys, layout of the place, etc.), and it was smooth sailing from then on out.  Monique and Igor provide a great, cozy little room in a clean, modern, and quiet apartment.  This was the first time I rented a room only and was a bit apprehensive about any noise from the other lodgers, but the place was quiet and relaxing at all times of day and night.  The apartment is located in downtown Barcelona--it would be difficult to find a more central location--and is near all the tourist and practical amenities (e.g. stores) one could ever want.  A great experience!

Wir wurden trotz später Stunde sehr nett Willkommen geheißen!! Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral und zur Metro sind es drei Minuten zu Fuß. Bäckereien und Restaurants sind auch in der Nähe und wenn man zum la Ramblas laufen möchte, ist man in 15 min hingelaufen. 
Also wir kommen gerne wieder!!

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, la habitación es como en la foto, tiene luz natural y un balcón a la calle. No conocimos a Monique pero nos recibió su prima Natalie quien nos enseñó el lugar. Nos permitieron dejar las maletas en día del check out para volver por ellas más tarde porque el tren salía a las 6pm. Él check out es a las 10 y se nos hizo tarde, tuvimos que apurarnos pero no hubo mayor problema. Todo estuvo muy bien solo que se percibía un ligero olor a humedad en la habitación pero no en el resto de la casa.
Buena ubicación, fácil llegada. Apartamento muy limpio. Recomendado!
Loved the location. Really close to public transportation. It's on the 4th floor, but there's an elevator.
Logement agréable et bien situé. Accueil sympathique. Je recommande
Monique and her cousin were great! They were very accommodating, the apartment was clean, spacious, convenient to attractions and shops.

La experiencia en general estuvo bastante bien, dejando de lado que estábamos algo cansados del viaje y decidimos dormir un rato la siesta pero fue casi imposible debido a los ruidos que provenían de otra habitación. Esto sólo sucedió por la tarde ya que por la noche todo estuvo en calma. 
La casa es preciosa, con mucha  luz y muy limpia. La habitación muy cómoda al igual que la cama. Volveré pero no dormiré siesta :P
This is the second time I have been at the apartment it is always an amazing experience. The host is fantastic I will definitely use the same host if I  visit Barcelona for the third time.

We did not see Monique or Igor but we only had an overnite in Barcelona.  We were met by a cousin, Natalie.  She went over everything with us and was helpful.  The room was not new or modern like the pictures. It was adequate for a one night stay.
Well located and cozy place. The bedroom is bright and of a decent size. Very close to public transport and to placa Espana. I would definitely return again.
Fantastic clean and 2 bathrooms so there was no waiting for the shower. I loved it
Pasamos una única noche en el apartamento. Es tal cual se ve en la fotos t la habitación es muy luminosa. Cuenta con todo lo necesario, y está ubicado cerca del centro.

The room was the right size, with a queen size bed. Tge room has a small  balcony with a view to the main street.  The location  is fantastix,  just 10 minutes from Plaza de Espania,  steps away from the bus and Metro stations.  The fantastic Barcelonita beach is just 30 minutes away by bus,  and so is Sagrada Familia. There is a common living room, kitchen with fridge and stove,  and a larger balcony available.  A bit too crowded with guests becauae there are 5 rooms for rent i  the apartment,  but all young couples.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Monique 's apartment for couple of days, and it was great experience. Location is excellent. 10 mins walking distance to Magic fountain metro station for L3 is 5 mins away. It's perfect for city tour. Her cousin waited for us and gave us instructions on house roles. In general recommendations for this place.

La chambre était exactement comme sur la photo. Natalie, la cousine de Monique, et sa maman nous ont très bien accueilli. 
Le quartier est sympathique et bien desservi (métro et bus à proximité)
Bien que nous soyons restées qu'une seule nuit, ma sœur et moi avons beaucoup aimé !
Je recommande fortement !!

찾아가기 쉬웠고, 안락하고 편안하게 쉴 수 있었습니다.
사촌 나탈리가 체크인을 도와주었는데, 친절하게 설명해주어서 좋았습니다!

Everything's fine . Monique's cousin, Natalie, who lives in the apartment, was very kind to wait for us until very late at night to check- in . the room and the apartment were as described . the area was extremely convenient for us because close to metro and stop where bus go from/to airport and next to Raval and lively areas .
Logement conforme à la description et aux photos. Propre et bien situé. Attention toutefois au bruit la nuit.
Monique und Igor habe ich nicht gesehen, eine Cousine hat uns geöffnet und die Wohnung gezeigt. So weit alles ok
Smooth reception and clear explanation on all you need to know to get by.
The host canceled this reservation 41 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I didn't meet Monique or Igor.  Only their cousin Natalie who was unhelpful and unwelcoming specially after I refused to buy the beach towels she was trying to sell me that her mom brought from Brazil. I'm glad I only reserved the place for one night.  Even though my room was not ready till 3 PM, checkout was at 10 AM next morning, somehow the wireless stopped working exactly at 10 AM which made my (Hidden by Airbnb) map search route harder.  After this Airbnb experience, I've decided I would rather pay higher rate and stay in a hotel.
The location is really very good. The room is clean. But it is hard to feel like home. It is more like a hostel. I would recommend it.
Todo genial

We arrived to the flat pretty late (after midnight) but were greeted very well. Hosts were not there but people who were living there showed us around and explained how to get to the beach and city centre. Room was cosy. Bed could be a little bit softer but overall experience was great. I would recommend this flat to people who looking for tight budget stay in Barcelona. It is both walking distance to magic fountain or 20min metro to the beach, if fancy 50min walking distance to city centre.

Nos demoramos un poco en llegar al apartamento ya que tomamos un bus que se demoró en su recorrido. al llegar nos estaban esperando pero Thabata se veía bastante molesta por nuestro retraso. El  lugar estaba limpio y tiene una ubicación formidable, muy cerca a los sitios turísticos, con  estaciones  de metro y buses muy cerca. El apartamento tiene dos baños con ducha y están muy bien.
The room was clean and exactly as the pictures. And u loved the little balcony
Nice room in a good location. Didn't meet Monique but was met on arrival by a friendly helpful face. Enjoyed my stay and would recommend to others.

Location of this apartment is great. It's really easy to find it once you reach Plaza de España. The neighborhood itself is wonderful and well connected to the other parts of this amazing city. 
Although I never met the hosts in person they were very helpful and quick to respond.
房间很大很明亮,屋主很热情,周围有各线地铁,但是需要走10分钟左右｡离各个景点也不是很远,不过其实巴塞罗那本来也不太大,真的很闲可以走路去各处,非常感谢这次的住宿体验!
I really enjoyed my stay, I was only there for sleeping so had basic amenities
Everything worked out fine. We asked to arrive early and the housekeeper was there waiting for us with the keys.
L'appartement est sympa, il est est proche du centre. Les quartier est assez agréable, pas mal de bons restos aux alentours. Le check-out à 10h est un peu juste.

Great place to stay. The room had lots of room and a small balcony as stated. 

Quiet and close to transit and restaurants. Would definitely recommend to anyone and would stay again. 

Host was friendly and helped with spots around the area.
I didn't have a chance to meet Monique, since she was living in another city in Spain. Everything was good, but it was so noisy at night.

I stay in Monique and Igor's house for two days with a friend and I found the house location really comfortable, it has near a bus stop and underground station, like in 10 minutes you can arrive in the Main Streets. We had a really good time!! About Igor and Monique we've never meet them! We wanted to see as much as possible so we stay at home just to sleep! About the cleaning I would give them 3 above 5 but I think that for 37€ per night it was a really good room! I would suggest you to book a room from them!
Good location, close to the train station. The room is large, clean and comfortable. It was a great experience for me.
This was a perfect place to stay. It was walking distance to many attractions and close to public transportation. The room was super cute!

Monique made sure I was well welcome and ushered into my room. The place is one of the best I have stayed in so far. The location is just perfect, around Placa Espanya with connections readily available. Information and communication were well on point.

As I stayed at the same place an year ago I warmly  recommended it to my parents for their Barcelona visit. I was more than glad to hear from them, that the place and the hosts keep the same quality of service - clean rooms and shared facilities, responsiveness to all my questions (since I booked in the name of my parents), comfortable bed and quiet environment. Will definitely recommend to anyone going to Barcelona. Besides the location is great.

Situé dans un quartier vivant et animé, j'ai apprécié la chambre et l'appartement. La rue est un peu bruyante le soir, et la connexion internet n'était pas accessible dans la chambre, mais uniquement dans le salon. Je recommande cependant cet hébergement, pour sa situation et surtout la rapidité de réponse de Monique et Igor.
Everything was fine

The place was perfect. It is very close to public transport. The room was clean and exactly the same as shown in the pictures. The shared rooms and bathroom were cleaned almost every day.  the communication with them was very fast.

Se trata de una opcion bastante asequible de precio para un par de dias en un barrio bastante tranquilo que ofrece la proximidad de pasear tranquilamente por Montjuic y que tiene el metro muy cerca para llegar a cualquier sitio de la ciudad. El apartamento contaba con todas las comodidades necesarias para pasar una estancia agradable y en cuanto a la comunicacion para cualquier problema ha sido genial en todo momento.
Malgré un accueil un peu trop expéditif à notre goût, nous avons passé un agréable séjour et nous n'avons pas été déçues par le logement.
不让早到,不让寄放行李,而且房东的要求很多!因为住的人多,卫生间使用很麻烦｡｡由于入住前沟通问题,晚到了会儿,结果房东直接甩脸,特别凶!

Place was very clean! Monique and Igor were nice, very welcoming and contacted me quickly after booking the room! They gave me great tips to get to places and transportation. Their place is super clean! Love the room and its movie theme!

It's a really nice place if you want privacy and confort! Monique is always there to respond any question and Igor (Who checked us in) was really nice and polite, a really great place in the center of barcelona! we will definitely come back!
Perfect spot to discover the city.  The other guests were friendly, quiet and you have enough privacy. Clean apartment. Will go there again if I am looking for a place in BCN
It's a very good place to stay, and the host is very nice.

El anuncio es poco claro respecto al número de personas....cobrarte 18 euros mas por una persona cuando no has  de realizar ningun esfuerzo añadido  me parece abusivo y encima al llegar vimos que solo nos había dejado una toalla...... Además la anfitriona da un trato bastante seco y el piso está plagado de demasiados carteles prohibitivos........creo que hay lugares  mejores donde de quedarse
Gran habitación, muy espaciosa y limpio todo. Si lo recomendaría
Shared flat Airbnb. Great balcony. Very Central!

Communication was prompt. The space was excellent and cozy. Location had all the amenties I needed for my next leg. Enjoyed Barcelona. Hope to return for a longer stay towards the end of my trip. Highly recommend.
Well located and so close to the city center!
spacious room in a nicely equipped apartment. clean and close to Placa de espania and malls

非常に良かったです｡
ｽﾍﾟｲﾝ広場徒歩圏内の好立地｡
ﾎｽﾄも柔軟で丁寧に対応してくれたので､安心して利用できました｡
私が泊まった時はﾌﾞﾗｼﾞﾙ人のｹﾞｽﾄ達がとても気さくに話してくれました◎
ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙは用意してくれるが､ｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰなどは持参して下さい｡
立地､設備などを考えたらｺｽﾊﾟはかなり良いと思います!
Central location of flat, very clean and big, nice cozy room with good bed
buen sitio y buen servicio
Good value for money. Very responsive and helpful host. I will stay again. Thank you

Hola, la verdad mi experiencia fue espectacular el piso excelente, limpio y bonito, con una excelente ubicación cerca del metro y con las comodidades necesarias para pasarlo bien, sin duda volvería!!!
I didn't spend much time in the flat but it was very clean and I was made to feel very welcome.
Muy recomendable para visitar a Barcelona.
Para una estancia rápida . Está muy bien .. cómodo , limpio y bien situado
It is very well situated and great value.
I had a really good time at the appartment. My room was very neat and had everything i needed. I've met some really nice People during my stay.
Ottima posizione

I never got to meet igor or monique but Felipe who basically was in charge of our apartment was fucking awesome! Showed us around the whole night. The place was bigger than the photos led to believe and everyone has been helpful and friendly, would definitely recommend to anyone

Habitación bien equipada y cómoda. Zona bien comunicada para visitar la ciudad, y muy bien conectada (está muy cerca de Plaza de España). Pero hay que llevarse tapones para los oídos porque el ruido del tráfico es muy fuerte.
Great location

Жили в Барселоне 3 дня, отличное расположение, близко все магазинчики, остановки общественного транспорта, удобно добираться из аэропорта на городском автобусе 46. В доме есть лифт, комната находится на 4 этаже, два санузла в распоряжении, общая кухня. Цена приятно удивила. Всем рекомендуем остановиться тут!
Great host and easy to comminicate via email. Good location, easy public transport, clean house, many supermarket around.
Decent stay! Very well located room

Wasnt very happy with apartment, place was dirty , kitchen equipment was old and filthy, and the roof tarace in bits ( dirty seats , lots of old stuff like grill or bike or some towels) so we Couldnt even spend any time there. Place have good localisation.
Wszystko w najlepszym porządku, polecam !

Monique was quick to reply to questions/messages and although I didn't meet her, she arranged for her friend to meet me on the day I arrived. 

The apartment was nice and clean, including the two shared bathrooms and the kitchen. My bedroom was large and it was nice to be able to open the balcony doors in the evening for a breeze. During my stay, the other guests were quiet - no problems at all. 

I was in Barcelona for a conference at the Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, which is an easy commute on the Metro line 3 from the apartment. The apartment is also close to the bus stop for the no. 46 bus from the airport. I'd recommend this apartment for anyone who wants reasonably priced accommodation in Barcelona.
Ótima localização!

Nice apartment with 4 rooms and 2 bathrooms. Subway is very conveniently located a few steps away and you can reach every corner of the city easily. Very clean and convenient. We loved our stay in Barcelona!

This is NOT staying in someone's home. This is run like a 4 bedroom hostel. Very badly run down. Although it had everything you needed for a very basic stay make No mistake that this is a private hostel run under the ABnB banner. We never met the hosts, and we were given a 2 minute introduction to the room. I.e. Keys and location of bathrooms etc. from there we had to wing everything. Not the experience we expected as we are traveling Europe and have used ABnB many times with great experiences. But this was the worst we have experienced. The Brazilian girl looking after the rooms was great but the apartment was not worth the amount asked for. Had it been advertised as a hostel then we would be aware of where we were booking but this was not it.
Würde ich jederzeit wieder buchen ! Schönes Zimmer, unkompliziert, zentral & einfach zum wohlfühlen.

La casa está ubicada a pocas cuadras de paradas de buses y estación del metro, rodeada en el barrio de restaurantes y supermercados. La casa está totalmente equipada, con baños y cocina con todo lo necesario. La habitación es muy amplia, cómoda y todo muy limpio.

Wir hatten einen freundlichen Empfang als wir anreisten. Wir hatten ein Surpreme Doppelzimmer direkt am Balkon. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und ordentlich. Nachts war es sehr heiß, aber das lag daran, dass die Wohnung im 4. Stock liegt und sich die Hitze staut. Die Lage ist absolut prima und man ist schnell an der Placa Espana. Auch ist der Stand nicht weit entfernt. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit

Round the corner from the metro which opens up the city to explore, and a 20 min walk to la rambla, some restaurants and bars round the corner, 20-30 minutes on metro to beach. Means we got to see a lot of Barcelona, offers great value for money and a great base to explore. Girl who helped us check-in was so nice and friendly:) overall very happy:)
Everything was perfect :)
Dichtbij drukke straat en geen airco op de kamer.

The only good thing is the location. The hosts are far away from hospitality. There is no personal attitude at all.The property is looked like low cost hostel. According to me it is not AirBnb style. If the host would leak to be part of shared economic, it will be better to share good and hospitality attitudes first then the apartment in this case.

Great place, lots of character.
Terrific location!
Everything was as expected here! Great location near the metro, restaurants and shops. Would definitely stay here again!
Monique and Igor replied to my email straight away. Their place is clean and tidy. Great location we walked to the Rambla. The taxi to Sants train station is close to their apartment.

très bel appartement, un bon acceuil. l'appartement est porche du métro qui nous permet de nous déplacer dans barcelone, il est aussi très bien équipé, un peu bruyant le weekend pour cause enfin restaurant animé dans la rue. 
je vous le recommande

The stay was okay, but not great. The place almost feels like a hostel, with different rooms and people always checking in and out. The bathrooms are shared, so are sometimes occupied and unclean. The bed is very uncomfortable. The linens in the room did not feel clean. Overall, the stay is okay if you are not spending much time in the place. If you are looking for a more comfortable stay, look elsewhere. The hosts do not live there and are not available for any suggestions or recommendations.
Nice place to stay.

Great place to stay in Barcelona. Quite central, bit of a walk to the beach however it can be easily accessed by public transport. Clean apartment and had a private balcony. There is also a terrace above with sun loungers if you would like to sunbathe. Busy area and plenty of shops and restaurants.
Hermoso piso en una zona muy céntrica (cerca de Placa de España) Felipe y Katia han sido muy simpáticos, flexibles y hospitalarios. De volver a Barcelona, de seguro me vuelvo a alojar allí!
Decent room for if you are coming for a short stay in a really convenient localization.

Enjoyed our stay at Monique and Igor's place. Very close to the nearest Metro for access to town, or a 30/40 minute walk to the Gothic Quarter. Lots of little restaurants, bars and cafes are well within walking distance if town is too far . Two bathrooms are shared between four rooms, but we never had an issue finding a free one.
The location was great and the house very meet. The hosts were very friendly
The location was spot on! We enjoyed our stay in Monique's home. The room was spacious and clean. I am fully satisfied with my decision to stay at Monique's place. I highly recommend it!

We never met Monique but she responded to e-mails promptly.  Felipe and his girlfriend were VERY nice and answered all my questions and offered great suggestions to make our stay better.  The apartment is very well located close to the metro and bus stops that take you all over town.  The room was ok but very hot even with the balcony door open.  For people coming from the US and used to air conditioning, this can be a problem.  There is a fan in the room but it was small.  Also, the bed was very hard.  Overall it was a good experience and rated it a 4 because of the two things mentioned before.  For younger people these may not be an issue and like I said it is very well located.

This is a great place to stay at while in Barcelona. It was clean and roomy and it's also in a great location. You can walk or take public transportation to anywhere. Deapite being central, it gets quite at night. It is also easy to get to and from the airport, there are bus stops only a few blocks away. You will find many restaurants and markets in the area to get whatever you need. I would highly recommend staying here to visit this amazing city!
Es war alles wie beschrieben, wir waren sehr zufrieden.
좋은 위치, 깨끗함, 커뮤니케이션 친절함 모든게 완벽했다.
Excellent place to live in heart of Barcelona!

It's a simple room with the necessary needs and the value for money is good.
The sound insulation it's not very good because the windows are old.

Bien situé. Proche du metro et des commerces & restos. Quartier animé.  2 salles de bains a partager. Chambre spacieuse mais équipements un peu vétustes ou hors services. Bien pour un court séjour. Super bien reçus par Marlon.
Espaço muito acolhedor, bem perto da saída de metro da praça de Espanha. A varanda dá um toque especial para um pequeno almoço agradável.

일단 사진이랑 내부는 똑같고, 화장실도 깨끗합니다. 주인은 같이 있던날도 있고 아닌 날도 있었고요. 위치가 스페인광장이랑 가까워서 공항이나 시내 다니기에도 좋았어요. 주변 치안도 괜찮은 편이었었어서 저는 추천합니다. The room condition was quite same with those photo and bathrooms were very cleaned. I have willing to use this house again in the next time.
It's a really nice place in the city center. Hosts are very friendly and responsive. I recommend Monique's and Igor's apartment to everyone!

The location is wonderful for those who love walking! Only a 20 walk from the train station and a 30 minute walk to the cruise ports. The balcony was an excellent surprise as well! 

Only cons would be that the bed was a little tough to sleep on (but I must admit I love a super soft mattress) and the water pot wasn't the nicest on the inside. This didn't matter though as you a literally minutes from some of the best small coffee and tea shops I've been too. 

It's was an absolute pleasure and when I come back, i hope I would be able to stay here!
Great place and owners. Would recommend.
Really great place to stay. Great location, clean and spacious. I would definitely stay here again.

This place is just perfect. Close to metro station in Plaça d’Espanya and Sants’ train station. The host was very friendly and approachable, always answering my queries in a short period of time. Will definitely try to stay there if I happen to go back to Barcelona in the future.
Prvy dojem nesuhlasil s fotkami ale stretli sme tam super ludi a hostitel bol velmi priatelsky!!Lolalita vyborna ,dostupnost do mesta aj pesi max 20 min.
Easy comunication and nice people.
Alloggio in una posizione molto comoda! Stanza accogliente. Consigliata
Great apartment, nice and clean. Friendly host, flexible check-in :) Subway station is near. All was great!
Great location, steps from the Metro. Very walkable neighborhood. Having an elevator was a nice touch. For a shared apt it was as expected. Overall great value for the price.

The WiFi stayed connected for maybe 20 seconds max at a time. I would go into settings, have to reconnect the WiFi, and by the time I pulled (Hidden by Airbnb) back up the WiFi wasn’t connected anymore. The bed was also very hard. 

Besides these two things, I would 100/10 recommend. It was clean, quiet, and a great first Airbnb for me to stay in.
전반적으로 괜찮았지만, 화장실 위에 뭐가 있는지 소리가 들리고, 잠잘 때 조금 추웠어요. 아침에 티랑 커피를 마실 수 있고 마롱도 친절해요.
Facilissimo da raggiungere dall'aeroporto e molto vicino alla fermata della metro.Consigliato per un periodo di 2/3 gg
Nice stay near the magic fountain and espanya square where we can celebrate our new year count down without worrying our transport home.
Buena hubicacion! Lindo departamento!

It a nice place. The location is good. The neighborhood is safe and there are a lot of cheap cafes and supermarkets. The metro is pretty close to the apartment. The room is nice and clean. There are 2 bathrooms, but you have to know that the apartmen has 5 rooms, and 4 of them are for Arnbnb guests. Despite of that, the price is really good. I had only 1 problem, the window in the room is very old, and it has some damages. There was a windy night, and the door and the window were opening.
Excelente sitio...

Worked for a quick stay, was a bit cold tho. Marlon was helpful. The room was clean. Couldn’t really use the balcony as there was laundry drying out there. Minimal noise besides some cars. They were accommodating with letting us stay in the common areas and leaving our luggage a bit later after check out.

La puerta de la habitación no cierra con llave. Está rota. Llamé al anfitrión para que la arreglase o la apañase con un candado y 2 hembrillas y, a pesar de que me prometió que lo iba a hacer simplemente me ignoró.
Supongo que no salía rentable atender a un huésped que sólo está 2 noches. Lo que no sé es cómo el resto de huéspedes de esa habitación tragan, uno tras otro.

Por supuesto, olvida la factura... es mucho mejor defraudar a Hacienda y a todo el país.

Me había quedado antes, pero no vuelvo. 
No me gusta que me tomen por imbécil.
地理位置可以,也比较好找｡就是房门锁是坏的,一推就开,有点不安全,还好没丢东西｡床单上有点皮屑,所以建议穿秋衣睡｡
Great stay and very affordable price!

Monique and Igor's place was in a great location, just 2 mins from the Metro station. It was a great value for the price. Check in and check out were easy and Monique was very communicative.

Only downside was the room smelled liked cigarette smoke our whole visit. We had to open the balcony door to air it out. I have sensitive skin and allergies so I was sneezing the whole time and broke out in a couple rashes.
Всем советую, удобное местоположение, пунктуальные хозяева, рядом метро, достопримечательности, супермаркет

The room, linen and towels provided were clean however the bathroom and kitchen were not very clean. The bedroom smelt of smoke even though it is listed as a non-smoking room. The biggest issue was that the door of the bedroom does not lock and as this is a room in an apartment with other people renting other rooms- we were not comfortable with this and think that it should be communicated to guests before.
The room was so clean. The common areas are well equipped and Marlon, the person in charge of the apartment is very responsive and helpful. A very good option for visiting Barcelona at a low cost.
Excellent location for our one night stay in Barcelona.
Good location, close to the Musee Nacional de Catalunya and the Caixa Forum.

Nice and decent apartment. This place had everything you needed, especially with communication with the host. He was very friendly and will provide anything needed. This place had a rooftop and had a great view of the streets and other buildings. It had a very rustic view and is a 30 minute walk to the gothic center. I’m glad I was able to spend a few nights at Monique and Igor’s house.
Einwandfreie Kommunikation, alles wie erwartet.
Good guest
okay
Es un buen lugar para quedarse en Barcelona
great location close to public transportation but still walk able distance to everything in the city without having to pay for transport
Appartement vétuste bien pour une nuit ne pas regarder de trop près la propreté Pour le reste on n a pas rencontré l hote

Thank you so much for having me. Very clean and well organized place. Friend of Monique Manu is very friendly and kind person. Contact with other guests was a pleasure, we hung out at the rooftop terrace, which is a great plus. Interior is a little more worn than on the pictures, but all in an OK condition so that is nothing I care about too much. I'd recommend it. Thanks so much!

Nos quedamos durante 1 día increíble gracias a la hospitalidad del anfitrión, el cual fue muy amable e increíblemente flexible con la hora. 
Siempre atento y dispuesto :)
A good spot that met my needs for my brief visit in Barcelona.
Una ubicación inmejorable, un espacio cómodo y limpio, sin duda, un lugar recomendable.

The locations is great!!! It is easy to walk everywhere and transportation is just right there. You can find multiple restaurants, mini markets, pharmacies around the corner. I suggest to stay here. My room was comfortable and with a very nice view.
Great location, close to everything, but i felt it could use a good paint job, regardless of it being an older home.
Удобно для путешествий одному.
The apartment looked perfect, at a very central location to visit the city :)

Cringe guy who lives there generally! Bed is so uncomfortable, hardly possible to sleep. There is no AC, the heat is hardly bearable in summer and the manual ventilator is broke so incredibly loud so you can’t keep it on at night.
Nice place close to metros a few blocks to Plaza España  nice neighborhood.

Thank you so much!
It is a great house with nice location.
El cuarto es miy agradable y esta bn ubicado
Danke, dass wir so spontan kommen konnten. Wir hatte eine tolle Zeit in Barcelona

Monique and Marlon were absolutley Great ! 
We were treated very well and I was even invited on a little birthday Party on their rooftop with a great view. 
Always a next Time !!
Great house and great host. Perfect location to visit Barcelona
Everything nice, thank you!
Nice place to stay.
Nice and good place , close to many places

Pretty decent place for the center of the city, Don’t expect hotel environment, totally worth for the price close to everywhere : public transport, metros, malls, restaurant and most visited places of Great city of Barcelona!
Great location, smooth process, fast, easy communication. We enjoyed our time by Monique & Igor. Thank You!:)

name: Bright, Central Apartment with Traditional and Modern Design
summary: Experience Barcelona's bohemian side at this traditional flat with a modern twist. This spacious retreat has traditional tile floors, a Catalan vault ceiling, and repointed brick. Features a fully-equipped kitchen and balcony overlooking the street. The apartment is located near Ramblas.
space: This apartment offers 2 double rooms and a private bathroom for guests. I share my home with my guests, this is not a full apartment reservation. The kitchen, equipped with all necessary gears and utensils, features a nice open plan on which to enjoy a drink or a dinner. The apartment has heating system in all rooms as well as air conditioning in the living room but bedrooms have only fans. This central 75m2 apartment is strategically located near Ramblas and the port of Barcelona. The neighbourhood is safe and vibrant with many bars, restaurants and many opportunities to enjoy the city. A unique place to be for a fantastic Barcelona experience, surrounded by everything you need to know, visit and taste.
description: Experience Barcelona's bohemian side at this traditional flat with a modern twist. This spacious retreat has traditional tile floors, a Catalan vault ceiling, and repointed brick. Features a fully-equipped kitchen and balcony overlooking the street. The apartment is located near Ramblas.
neighborhood_overview: El Raval offers a central location within walking distance of many of the other popular areas—such as the Gothic Quarter and Eixample—and many of the city's main attractions.
notes: You have all flexibility to move in the apartment, you can use the balcony for smoking and enjoy just the vibe over the street.  If you feel like a home-cooked meal, the gorgeous remodeled kitchen comes fully equipped with all the appliances and gadgets. The living room area enjoys the rustic original ceilings and patterned tiles that give the property its cozy feeling. We offer you the following: - High speed Wifi at 300Mb/s; ⁃ The new modern kitchen has all brand new appliances such as fridge; oven, cooker, kettle along with cooking utensils, pots, pans and more; ⁃ Hair dryer; ⁃ Fresh towels. Please note that the apartment faces the street in Raval quarter and it is very close to Las Ramblas. It is a very lively street, day and night. The rooms have double glazed windows, so you can barely hear noise at night time.
house_rules: My apartment has 2 rooms for guests that accommodate up to 4 people. The base price is for one of either room. The 3rd and 4th guest have an additional charge, this is automatically reflected when you chose the number of guests in your reservation. You can book the 2 rooms if you'd like just by selecting the number of guests to 3 otherwise you will be booking one room only, either the double bed with balcony or the double room with window. I share my home with my guests, this is not a full apartment reservation.  RULES There are four simple rules in my home:  • Guests 30 years and older, please.  • Respect the quietness of the neighbours, especially after 10 pm;  • Smoking is not allowed inside (accepted on the balcony);  • Return the property in the same condition as you found;  CHECK-IN DETAILS:  • Free early check-in upon availability from 9 am  • Check-in from 10pm to 12pm: 20 euro  • Check-in after 12 midnight: 30 euro • Holiday arrival (Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, Boxing Day, N

host.host_about:
Hello all and welcome!

I am excited to be part of this community and to share my home. I have been working and living in many countries and I love traveling and discovering new worlds and new people. 
Looking forward to making wonderful new friendships with people around the globe!

name: Spacious 1BR in Old Montreal by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern kitchen, cozy living room featuring a convertible sofa bed, and airy balcony with seating for four. Located in Old Montreal, just steps away from Square Victoria and Montreal's famous Underground City.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern kitchen, cozy living room featuring a convertible sofa bed, and airy balcony with seating for four. Located in Old Montreal, just steps away from Square Victoria and Montreal's famous Underground City. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Restaurant Deno's or Jardin Nelson for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Bonsecours Market or Le Centre Eaton de Montréal. To explore the rest of the city, take the metro from Square Victoria - OACI. Old Montreal is one of the city's most desirabl
neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Restaurant Deno's or Jardin Nelson for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Bonsecours Market or Le Centre Eaton de Montréal. To explore the rest of the city, take the metro from Square Victoria - OACI. Old Montreal is one of the city's most desirable neighborhoods to stay in. With a history stretching back to the 17th century, it's well-known for its classic architectural charms, vibrant nightlife, and world-class dining.
notes: This Sonder does not have cable, but with our Chromecast enabled television you can easily stream your favorite content or music through a phone, tablet, or laptop. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free nighttime street parking and paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

reviews.comments: Very clean and stylish and probably one of the nicest 1 bedroom Airbnb.
Very spacious living area, clean and nicely furnished. Would come back to this place again. Sonder is a great host, got back to us quickly with our questions.
I would recommend to those staying only two nights.
Good
Tout est conforme à la description. On s'y sent très bien
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Do not hesitate to book this apartment! It was even more beautiful in person. Perfect location for the metro and walking distance to any other downtown sights/restaurants! The building was easy to find and felt very safe and secure. The living room was so comfortable for relaxing on cold evenings. Note: the pillows we're a bit firm so if you like something softer, bring your own (the only possible negative I have on the whole place!)
Clean, central and a warm place to stay

name: Bright & cozy flat with a large bedroom & terrace
summary: Appartement confortable & moderne composé d'une 1 grande chambre, salon / cuisine & d'une grande terrasse. Situé dans le quartier agréable et familial de Rosemont, à 5 minutes à pied du métro Beaubien, le quartier compte de nombreuses épiceries, restaurants et bars et se trouve juste à côté de la célèbre Petite Italie et de la rue commerçante Plaza Saint Hubert.
space: --- ENGLISH BELOW --- Appartement confortable et moderne situé dans le quartier agréable et familial de Rosemont-la-Petite-Patrie, à 5 minutes à pied de la station de métro Beaubien. Le quartier compte de nombreuses épiceries, restaurants et bars et se trouve juste à côté de la célèbre Petite Italie et de la rue commerçante Plaza Saint Hubert. L'appartement comprend une grande chambre avec 1 lit queen et 2 grands placards, un salon confortable avec cuisine et une grande salle de bains. Vous pourrez également profiter des belles soirées de Septembre sur ma terrasse équipée. Articles ménagers: four, lave-vaisselle, micro-ondes, laveuse, sécheuse, douche / baignoire, air climatisé, chauffage, frigidaire. Cozy & modern flat situated in the nice & familial area of Rosemont-la-Petite-Patrie, 5 minutes walk from Beaubien metro station. The area counts many grocery stores, restaurants & bars and it is right next door from famous Little Italy & commercial Plaza Saint Hubert street. The apartmen

neighborhood_overview: --- ENGLISH BELOW --- Profitez de la conviviale vie de quartier de la Petite-Patrie en découvrant les commerces situés à proximité de l'appartement: - Allez manger de bons plats dans des restaurants réputés: Montréal Plaza, , Mademoiselle Dumpling, Luciano Trattoria, Le Super Qualité, Ramen Plaza,  - Savourez de bonnes bières à la Brasserie Isle de Garde. - Allez acheter des viennoiseries & pains à la boulangerie Automne, une des meilleures de Montréal! - Prenez une pause aux chaleureux cafés: Café Pista, Régine Café & Café Dei Campi ou Caffelini. - Mangez un morceau de fromage à la fromagerie Yannick. - Organisez-vous un pic-nic au Parc Père Marquette et savourez quelques bières. - Profitez d'une balade nocturne & manger une glace dans la Petite-Italie. Vous pourrez également vous rendre au centre-ville en 15 min grâce au métro. La station Beaubien est situé à 5 minutes à pieds de l'appartement. Enjoy the friendly neighborhood of La Petite-Patrie by discovering the shops located near
transit: --- ENGLISH BELOW --- Vous trouverez facilement une place de parking en face du bâtiment ou dans les rues adjacentes. Il est facile de se garer car le quartier n'est pas bondé de voitures. Une station de bus (18) est situé en bas de l'immeuble. La station Beaubien est à 5 minutes de marche de l'appartement You will easily find a parking space in front of the building or in the streets nearby. It is very easy to park because the area is not crowded with cars. A bus station (18) its located in front of the building. Beaubien metro station is 5 minute-walk from the flat.
access: --- ENGLISH BELOW --- Vous aurez un accès privé à toutes les parties de mon logement incluant cuisine, salon, salle de bain, chambre & terrasse. L'appartement est situé au deuxième étage accessible via un escalier intérieur partagé avec mes charmants voisins. Vous trouverez facilement une place de parking en face du bâtiment ou dans les rues adjacentes. Il est facile de se garer car le quartier n'est pas bondé de voitures. You will have full access to all the private areas including my kitchen, living room, bathroom, bedroom & terrace. The flat is situated at the 2nd floor & the inside stairs are in a common area you will share with my lovely neighbors. You will easily find a parking space in front of the building or in the streets nearby. It is very easy to park because the area is not crowded with cars.
interaction: --- ENGLISH BELOW --- Je ne serais pas à Montréal au moment de votre séjour, cependant je reste joignable par téléphone ou mail si vous rencontrer le moindre problème ou si vous avez des questions. Un de mes amis se chargera de vous accueillir et vous expliquera les règles & fonctionnalités de l'appartement. I will not be in Montreal at the time of your stay, however I remain reachable by phone or email if you encounter any problem or if you have any questions. A friend of mine will take care of you and will explain you the rules & features of the flat.

Appartement conforme aux photos et même mieux. Communication très facile et très bon emplacement. Une valeur sure !
Quiet, clean, very nice apartment with everything you need. Communication and check-in were very easy.

Pierre-Edouard's Apartment is clean, stylish and a great fit for anyone looking to explore Montreal. Check-in was easy and the apartment is a short walk from a grocery store, cafe's, restaurants and the metro! We highly recommend!

name: Center Secret  Studio
summary: Right in the center of Porto embracing a modern touch this apartment has everything to make your stay even more perfect! Fully renovated with a simple yet elegant style, you will fully enjoy Porto's culture and live it at it's fullest. The apartment is located in the heart of Porto's cultural activity.
space: The apartment is spacious and it has a lot of natural light. This wonderful apartment benefits from being located right in the center of Porto. It has it's back to the well-know "Aliados" avenue and it at a 5 minute walking distance from the splendid "São Bento" Station.  Although, the location is right in the gem of Porto, the apartment is very quiet and it finds itself in a very calm street.  The apartment has 1 master bedroom.. Within the living room there is an existent kitchen with all the necessary material to have a wonderful gastronomical experience. Furthermore, the apartment embraces a modern and stylish furniture, perfect for young couples that want to enjoy Porto in a stylish apartment. Excellent choice for a pleasant journey in Porto!
description: Right in the center of Porto embracing a modern touch this apartment has everything to make your stay even more perfect! Fully renovated with a simple yet elegant style, you will fully enjoy Porto's culture and live it at it's fullest. The apartment is located in the heart of Porto's cultural activity. The apartment is spacious and it has a lot of natural light. This wonderful apartment benefits from being located right in the center of Porto. It has it's back to the well-know "Aliados" avenue and it at a 5 minute walking distance from the splendid "São Bento" Station.  Although, the location is right in the gem of Porto, the apartment is very quiet and it finds itself in a very calm street.  The apartment has 1 master bedroom.. Within the living room there is an existent kitchen with all the necessary material to have a wonderful gastronomical experience. Furthermore, the apartment embraces a modern and stylish furniture, perfect for young couples that want to enjoy Porto in a stylish
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located within the hear of Porto, giving the guest full advantage to enjoy Porto's culture. The apartment is located in between the amazing aliados avenue and the "Bolhao Market".  The neighborhood is a very safe, and the area around the apartment is a very central and typical area of the city. It embraces the true colors of Porto's culture and livelihood of the streets around is an experience you don't want to miss. Taking into account the central location of the apartment the area around it, is very quiet and calm. Inside, the apartment you won't even feel the city living in itself.  Furthermore, you can also find several other landmarks at a very short walking distance from the apartment such as, the São Bento Station, Coliseu do Porto, Majestic Café situated in one of most well-known streets of Porto - Rua de Santa Catarina, and Mercado do Bolhão  our best traditional market.  You can also enjoy Porto and it's typical colours, by reaching the Ribeira area and the f
notes: LATE CHECK-IN  - Guests that check-in between 21:00 and 23:00 pm have to pay an extra fee of 15 euros. And guests that check-in after 23:00 have to pay an extra fee of 30 euros.  HOUSEKEEPING - Our efficient cleaning staff has a very rapid response rate towards any situation that you may require.  BIKES - If you wish to rent electrical bicycles we can assist you in arranging this service at the best available price, from our business partner in Porto. ´ TRANSFER - For a more comfortable and private ride we can provide a transfer service from our business partners, however not included in the room price.
transit: If you are arriving by plane, take the metro at the airport (Line E - Purple) and leave in Aliados metro station.  Leave the station and it's only a 3-minute walk to the apartment, in Rua Rodrigues Sampaio Nº115.  Your destination will be on the left side of the street TRANSFER - For an even easier and more comfortable way to get here! If you want to book a private transfer please contact us so we can book it for you with supplementary costs.
access: Guests have access to all areas of the house as well as the use of all equipment provided. Total access to the kitchen, living room, bedroom WC. The kitchen is fully equipped - includes dishes, cutlery, glasses, pans, electric stove, microwave, coffee machine, toaster, fridge and many other things that you need to have a wonderful stay.  The apartment has 1 complete bathroom with shower, soap and towels. It has hair dry and fragrant traditional amenities from Portugal.  Towels and bed linen are provided.
interaction: Our guests are very valuable to us and  your well-being and comfort comes as a very important aspect of your stay with us!    We are always looking into making your stay more enjoyable. Starting from your arrival, we will welcome you in the apartment and introduce to you Porto´s cultural agenda, unique tour opportunities and transportation methods. Among any other information you may wish to know.
house_rules: - At night, after 22:00 pm, please beware with the noise so that everyone has a relaxing night.  - It is not allowed to smoke inside the apartment. - Domestic animals of any kind of animals are not allowed inside the apartment.  - Please, be careful and pay attention to decorative objects, furniture, bed and bath things.  - Any questions that you have we are available to clarify them and help you so that you fell at home.

Sebastian & Joanna

space: Situé en plein centre-ville , le quartier du vieux-montreal  saura vous charmer , tout près du fleuve saint-laurent  . Grand stationnement et entouré d'arbres matures et de plusieurs parcs, voici un vrai OASIS à deux pas du bourdonnement des festivals , restaurants et vieux montreal  6eme étage d'un immeuble légendaire (construit en 1870), rénové avec goût tout en conservant son cachet unique: murs de briques, planchers en bois , béton plafond et tuyaux apparents Cuisine complete , décoration épurée, plafonds hauts et plein de lumière naturelle. À 3 min du métro square Victoria (ligne orange ) et à côté d'un arrêt d'autobus Profitez d'un accès rapide et facile aux festivals cet été, tout en revenant
