neighborhood_overview: Le Vieux-Port offre aux Montréalais et aux touristes un accès à de nombreuses activités été comme hiver. La Société du Vieux-Port, avec l'aide de partenaires, veille à l'animation du lieu via des évènements culturels tel que le festival Montréal en Lumière, l'Igloofest, le Festival des Grands Voiliers et le Festival International Reggae. Parfois des voiliers et des bâtiments militaires y accostent. Cet hiver, c’est la fête à la patinoire Natrel du Vieux-Port de Montréal. Découvrez nos soirées thématiques qui célèbrent l’activité physique, la musique, la diversité culturelle montréalaise et la période des fêtes. Avec son ambiance festive, petits et grands ne resteront pas de glace et pourront se réchauffer dans notre village réconfort! Laissez-vous glisser sur la patinoire réfrigérée extérieure avec la plus belle vue à Montréal. Une activité hivernale incontournable, offerte toute la saison dans des conditions idéales.
transit: Métro orange square victoria Bus  Uber
access: Le logement sera pour les guests au complet  Nous vous offrons même un locker pour vos affaires
interaction: Je serais toujours disponible par texte message ou bien un de mes employés
house_rules: We take excellent care of our condo and expect our guests to treat our space and neighbors with the same respect and consideration. You will be responsible for: -leaving the unit in the same condition as when you arrived -taking out the garbage -putting dirty dishes in the dishwasher upon check-out -putting used linen in the laundry -no noise after 10:00 pm on the terrace -absolutely no smoking in the unit (terrace is okay) - parties are not allowed ( in any time ) -take off shoes

reviews.comments: We were extremely lucky to find this spot one day before Osheaga as our other arrangement cancelled on us last minute. We had a wonderful stay. Loft was spacious, stylish, clean, air conditioning was powerful and cooled the entire loft very well. Kitchen was great, nice open living space w/ island and chairs. Hosts were fantastic communicators. Location in Old Montreal couldn't be better, 2 minutes to a 24hr convenience store, 2 minutes from the subway (which is the best subway system any of us have used). Less than 20m from Parc Jean-Drapeau via subway. 24hr Parking was cheap, easy to access and very close. Rooftop patio was great. Good value. Montreal is probably the nicest major city in Canada. Highly recommend staying here, we all would stay again. Driving home I'm already thinking, when can I come back to Montreal!?

Great location, close to everything at the Old Port. Restaurants, Bars, and tourist spots are within walking distance. Easily accessible by bus and subway as well. Marine is very helpful and responsive as a host.
Great loft at a perfect location. Very close to all tourist spots.
Great location, close to loads of coffee shops and great eats! Marine was very prompt at responding to our questions. Would stay again!
Perfect location on Old Montreal, a lot os restaurants nearby... Very stilish apartment exactly as shown on photos. Marine and Damien were great hosts, I definitely recommend it. Thank you!

Marine and Damien were exceptionally warm and attentive hosts, responsive to messages, communicative through our stay, and graciously accommodating of our last minute reservation.

In addition to its fabulous location for site seeing and dining, the youthful vibrance of the apartment encouraged a casual sense of comfort, while the cleanliness was to a standard that even my mother would approve of. 

Overall, delightfully easy and enjoyable stay.
Beau condo!
Lovely apartment in beautiful Old Montreal. The host was very attentive and ensured that all our our needs were met. We had a wonderful experience!
Great location.

Really enjoyed our stay.  Great location and Marine was prompt, welcoming and available.
Thanks for being a great host.
Great loft in a great location. Loved the rooftop.  Marine was very prompt in getting back to us when we arrived and answering any questions we had about the apartment.

Marine's place is located in the center of old-Montreal and close to transport, so it's the perfect place for exploring all the famous venues in the city. It's stylish, clean and well equipped too so we recommend it warmly!
FR: L'appartement de Marine est au centre du vieux montréal et pres des transports, donc c'est un endroit parfait d'ou explorer les attractions touristiques. L'appartement est propre et bien équippé, et on le recommande chaudement!

It is great to have pet friendly accommodation in the heart of Montreal! The location was outstanding! The loft is very cool. 
Excellent communication and assistance from hosts.
Excellent location, very responsive, would recommend and go back for future travels
Appartement parfaitement situé ! Nous avons bien apprécié notre séjour au logement de Marine. La communication était facile et l’hôte était bien attentionnée. Je recommande sans hésitation.
Awesome place, perfect for a stay in Montreal Old Port. Lovely host ! I highly recommend. Cheers
Vous passerez à cette place un tres bon sejour. Je recommande
Marine’s space was very cozy and perfect for our weekend getaway in Montreal. It is centrally located with coffee shops literally steps away.
The place was everything we were looking for. Great location and clean. Marine was excellent with timely responses. Would absolutely stay again!

reviews.comments:
Marine was a unbelievably amazing host. During probably the busiest weekend in Montreal due to Osheaga music festival, another AirBnB host canceled last minute, leaving my friends and I without a place to stay. With the help of AirBnB and Marine, she accommodated a large group of my friends to stay last minute. She responded immediately and was in touch during the entire re-booking process. She and her boyfriend Damien bought us a bottle of wine to welcome us into their home, provided us multiple pairs of keys and checked up on whenever we needed. Best of all, the place is in a super cool and spacious loft, with really fun and interesting decor. I 100% recommend anyone considering to visit Montreal to stay with Marine. I know if I'm coming back to Osheaga next year, I certainly will.

- Wensen
Good location, clean, professional, very open to accommodating specific needs and requests.
Great location
Marine is a really supportive host and try to solve and address any inquiry asap

Great location and nice space. The host become abusive over text message when we didn't when left the door locked inside of unlocked and shouted at me in the middle of a coffee shop. Avoid the host shouting at me ruined my day.

Ran into a slight problem at check in at no fault to our wonderful host, but with their quick responses everything was easily worked out. Marine’s place is decorated with all of her own work which makes it just that much better! A Great place to stay for any purpose in Montréal. Only a few blocks from the Metro and in the great area of Old Port!
Very stylish place located very close to many activities, sights, and places to eat.  Would highly recommend to anyone staying in Montreal.
Great and affordable loft space near the heart of Old Montreal. A must stay if you're considering to come to Montreal

Pros:  Great location, very spacious
Cons: 
They had an air mattress as a bed.  If I had known this I would not have booked this location.  We only had one real queen size bed and one single bed. that only sleeps 3 people.  The air mattress provided was subpar and deflated thus two out of five guests had to sleep on a deflated mattress. The airbnb was not fit for a 5 person stay.  I don't know how the listing is for 7 people.

Checked in at 330pm, but the sheets and towels were not ready. The host indicated that the sheets and towels were still being dried.  I agreed that it was ok, but when I got there, the sheets and towels in the dryer were still wet and I needed to dry them a few more cycles before it was ready for use.   Check in was listed at 3pm, the apartment should have been ready for that time, so I don't see how it is acceptable to have the apartment not ready by 330pm.

Host had provided a solution to us and suggested to give us a discount for our stay, I have yet to hear back from them upon writing this review.

I hope they fix these issues, as the apartment space and location has a lot of potential to be a great airbnb for future guests.

Thanks,
Jet
Great location! Nice loft style apartment in the old port.

Great stay. Location is ideal as it is within walking distance to local attractions in Old Montreal. The apartment is very stylish and you can expect what you see from the photos. Marine and Damien were great hosts!

Marine’s place is perfectly located on a quiet street in the coolest part of Montreal. Amazing restaurants everywhere and all within walking distance! Marine was so hospitable and arranged everything for our convenience. In apartment itself was bright and private and had absolutely everything that we needed. It made us smile to see that Marine how do even done a little grocery shopping for us and provided eggs and bacon and a few other nibbles! Thank you Marine, Montreal is now one of my favorite places!

It's too bad. She didi't give food for breakfast. And when I checked in there, they didn't finished bed making and never finished it. We did bed making by ourself and finished dry towels. There is no pocket wifi, just wifi in the unit. I saw､ there are 4 beds. Bud there are just 2 beds. There is no hair dryer. There is only one good thing that it's near the subway station. That's all. 
荷物を先に置かせてくれるということで早めに行きましたが､到着がﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ時間より早かったからという理由でﾀｵﾙやｼｰﾂは乾燥機の中に入ったままだし､洗濯途中の物もそのままほったらかしでした｡結局自分で乾燥機にかけて､ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞﾒｲｸしました｡ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞは4つあると書いてたのに､2つしかなかった｡ﾎﾟｹｯﾄwifi有りとなっていたが､ただの家のwifiのみでした｡朝食の材料付だと書いていたが､初日は大雨という理由で持ってこれなくなったと言われ､その後結局最後まで何も持って来なかった｡連絡しても無視されました｡またﾄｲﾚは詰まるし､床はﾍﾞﾀﾍﾞﾀで汚かったので自分達で掃除しました｡部屋のｲﾝﾃﾘｱがｵｼｬﾚで可愛いかったのと旧市街や駅に近くて便利だったのが救いです｡

Marine and Damien were fantastic hosts! Four slept comfortably in this cozy, well decorated flat in Old Port. We were greeted by Damien upon arrival and were reassured all questions would be answered at any time (and were in a timely manner). Friendly hosts and location were notable highlights! Would recommend this AirBnB to friends and family visiting Montreal.

I had to sleep at the floor because the house say was for 6 people but definely is  for 4, the air bed it does work I could slept the two nights and I had a neck injury at the end of my stay, if you are more than six I don’t recommend this place, upon our arrival the bathroom was shi* .. and used, not really clean ! And if you on the rush and leave some dirty dishes they gonna charge 200 us  be careful
Stylish place and really well located.  No TV or couch, but not a deal breaker.  Would recommend.
If you are interested in exploring Old Montreal, this is the place to be. Very comfortable, great for cooking too.

Pro: good location, good communication and basic necessity/cookware was available. Marine was almost always available if we needed help and gave some recommandation for where to go (Website hidden by Airbnb) Con: furnitures and cabinets were all run down falling apart or peeling. The cleaner didn't do a good job and there were lots of random specs of black stuff on the ground and hair on the sink.  Found a few bugs (not bed bugs) on one of the mattress. Had 2 comforters for 4 beds so my mom was really cold even with several of the small fleece blankets provided. No toilet paper and had to drive around the city to find a supermarket that was still open after 10 ( this after a grueling 12hr drive so you'll have to forgive me for being nitpicky), but marine reinbursed us for it. She also gave us a small reinbursement for all the trouble. Half my family didn't stay as they had an one year old and it really wasnt safe for her to be there (kept trying to eat the black stuff off the ground) so we had to pay for a hotel room as it was too late to book any new airbnb at10pm. Check out was a bit difficult as we couldn't find a time to meet and i couldn't drive to her place to drop off the keys, in the end she allowed us to leave it in the house (Website hidden by Airbnb) All in all i would recommand this place to small group of friends who just want a place to stay and didn't really care much about the above things ( and i don't  mean that negatively, some ppl just wants to come and sight see and  party in montreal and this would be great for them) maybe also for small families of 4 with kids older than 5. Or 2 pairs of couple. Marine was nice to try to accommodate my family of 6 but this was just not a good fit.

Marine was a wonderful host! We had an easy check-in and check-out and she was easily reachable whenever we had a question or needed suggestions for places to go. The apartment was clean, spacious and was perfect for our group of 5.

name: Appartement cosy in little italy !
summary: Bonjour.  Nous sommes un jeune couple qui vivons dans un appartement sympathique comprenant deux chambres dans le quartier de la petite italie (nombreux restaurants et épiceries) proche du célèbre mile end, du quartier du plateau, du gourmand marché jean talon et à 7 minutes à pied des métros rosemont et beaubien. L'appartement est également desservi par beaucoup de lignes de bus.  Nous serions heureux de vous faire profiter de toutes ces belles choses en notre absence !! Paul et Marion

reviews.comments: Marion was a great host and the apartment was very nice. The location is great too, many restaurants are just around the corner and the subway is only a 5 minute walk!
L'appartement etait propre et fonctionel! Marion nous a donné quelques conseils sur la vie locale et sa confiture de bleuets est fabuleuse!

Super appart dans un super quartier typique de Montréal, proche de tout (métro, commerces..). J'ai adoré l'ambiance de la Petite Italie et surtout le marché Jean Talon. L'appartement de Marion a tout le confort nécessaire pour passer un super séjour à Montréal. Les deux petits balcons sont très agréables quand il fait chaud. Je recommande totalement le logement de Marion.

name: Montreal Multi-unit building
house_rules: The guests must clean after themselves. I’m not an ogre just common sense. .

host.host_about: Hi guys. I live and work in Montreal. I’m looking to help people have a decent stay when they come. So have a safe trip and message me if you’re interested!

reviews.comments: Diego was a great host, make us feel comfortable and welcome on his place. The bus stop is a block away, it was really easy to get to downtown.
The host is very friendly and easy to contact in case of any problems. Also, very open to schedule changes.
Amazing hospitality, host went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable and had a relaxing stay.
Nous avons du annuler notre réservation après une nuit.  On recommande plus d'attention par rapport à la propreté des oreilles, draps et linge de maison, ainsi que la partie cuisine& frigo.

Diego is a very warm and approachable person. A compact and neat apartment  in a safe neighborhood and we had a pleasant stay. The kitchen has almost everything you need if you are cooking. There's a beach not too far and bus stop is within a few block that terminates at the Metro station where you can link downtown/ anywhere within
 20/25mins. I will recommend Diego's place anytime and any day!!!
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Easily accessible by public transportation. Free street parking available in the area. Very short walk to grocery store, pharmacy, SAQ, and more.

transit: There is free parking on the street in front of the building, and also on many neighbouring streets. Apartment is close to several major bus stops (3 min walk to stops, <15 min ride to subway Plamondon or Outrement), 7 min walk to Gare Canora.  15 min walk to Univesité de Montreal, Edouard-Monpetit.

reviews.comments:
This place is highly recommended for travelers who wish to have an authentic Montreal experience, devoid of noisy tourist traps. The apartment has a living room and patio that overlook Av. Wilderton; the airy bedrooms are facing an alley, so guests have privacy and quiet, while still enjoying plenty of sunshine; the queen-sized bed was very comfortable. The inclusive tree-lined neighborhood (with its synagogues, yeshivas, and churches) is charming, quiet, and safe; it is a 20-minute leisurely walk (or 10min ride on the 161 Bus) to Outremont station where one can find trendy cafes, restaurants, and a Mamie Clafoutis boulangerie; Côte des Neiges, with its many Asian restaurants, is also close by. Eat-in meals are very doable; ingredients can be purchased at the Metro Wilderton supermarket (that is just a 2-minute walk away), and prepared in the the well-appointed kitchen. Guests with cars will find free street parking in the surrounding streets.

Juliana and Rogerio are fantastic hosts. They are not only friendly, helpful and responsive, but also keep their home spotless, while being eco-conscious. If late check-out is required, Juliana and Rogerio will do their best to accommodate. I would not hesitate staying with Juliana and Rogerio again.

Juliana's place is a gem nestled near the Outremont area. You are about a 10 minute walk in either direction from two amazing neighborhoods and Metro stations, making it a great base to explore the city.  The room is quite big and has all the basic amenities.  The apartment is minimalistic, stylish and comfortable.  Communication with Juliana is great, and Rogerio (the other host) was friendly and enjoyable to stay with. Overall, highly recommended.!
Thanks very much Juliana!

Located in the heart of Outremont, this place is a gem for anyone travelling to Montreal. With walkable distance to the metro, cafes, shops, this is a great starting point for getting to know Montreal in an intimate way. Juliana was very responsive with any questions I had and the cohost Rogerio was informative, friendly and very hospitable. The place was clean, well furnished and stylish with a minimalist touch. Highly recommended!

Juliana and her roommates were wonderful hosts. I needed to find a place for my parents from out of town to stay for 2 nights before better arrangements could be made, and her place was perfect. Cozy, intimate, close to groceries, bus stops and numerous other essentials. They were very understanding of the possible delays of airlines, we were late by almost 2 hours and we still managed to exchange keys. 
Many thanks to the hosts!
Tout était très bien! L’appartement était exactement ce qu’il me fallait.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Habitación muy grande con vistas espectaculares.
summary: Habitación grande de 20 m2 ubicada en pleno Eixample Esquerra de Barcelona. Muy tranquila, soleada, sin ruido de tráfico y... ¡con unas vistas espectaculares! Cama king-size (2mx2m), aire acondicionado y televisión.  Parada de metro Entença (linea 5) a tres minutos andando. A dos paradas de metro de La Pedrera de Gaudí. Large room of 20 m2, Eixample Esquerra Barcelona. Very quiet, sunny, with spectacular views! King-size bed (2mx2m), air conditioning and television. 4 subway stops to Camp Nou.
space: Su habitación y su lavabo. La cocina y el resto de estancias no están disponibles. Your room and your bathroom. The kitchen and the rest of the rooms are not available.

name: LEGNOCASA
summary: Sultan Ahmet Cami Ayasofya Kapalı çarşı 5 (beş) dakika yürüme mesafesi
description: Sultan Ahmet Cami Ayasofya Kapalı çarşı 5 (beş) dakika yürüme mesafesi

host.host_about: caressing,reliable, sympathetic

reviews.comments: انصح المسافرين بعدم الحجز في هذا الفندق لعدم مصداقيتهم بالاضافة الى ان الصور ليست مطابقة للواقع حيث أني حجزت حسب الصور وشاهدت شيئاً آخر
Extraordinarily helpful!! Even on short notice!

name: Open Wall.Gran Vía 2.Renov 2015
summary: Spacious and newly remodeled. Equipped with all the amenities to make guests feel at home. Central and yet quiet. Ouede walk to most of the tourist spots in the city.
space: Spacious and newly remodeled apartment. Full equipped with all the amenities to make guests feel at home.  1 double room 1 single room 1 big bathroom  Sofa bed for two additional guests. In total 5 pax. WIFI, air conditioning, fully equipped kitchen, linens, towels, private entrance, bright, small balcony. etc ...
description: Spacious and newly remodeled. Equipped with all the amenities to make guests feel at home. Central and yet quiet. Ouede walk to most of the tourist spots in the city. Spacious and newly remodeled apartment. Full equipped with all the amenities to make guests feel at home.  1 double room 1 single room 1 big bathroom  Sofa bed for two additional guests. In total 5 pax. WIFI, air conditioning, fully equipped kitchen, linens, towels, private entrance, bright, small balcony. etc ... I do the check in personally, whatever you need during your stay in Barcelona just let me know. Relaxed and cosmopolitan atmosphere. Next to the glamorous Eixample district and next to the main tourist attractions. Next to nice restaurants and shops  5 minutes walking from Montjuic Fountains and less than 15 of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. Metro station - Rocafort Council tax not included. Late check fee 35€ after 21:00

interaction: I do the check in personally, whatever you need during your stay in Barcelona just let me know.
house_rules: Behave yourself in the house as his own.

host.host_about:
Amigo de sus huéspedes.
Viajero habitual.
Profundo conocedor de la vida cultural de la ciudad de Barcelona. Facilitador de buena información sobre la Ciudad. Ayudo a "integrar" al viajero en la Ciudad.

reviews.comments: Manuel was very friendly & help. The apartment was very cosy, clean and quite centrally located. Fully equipped with with all the resources & supermarkets close by. Our only issue was the main bedroom did not have curtains, Manuel did attempt to put these up but never managed to, other then that it was all good. It was only 15 minutes walk from the rambalas. Very close to the national museum & a shopping mall. Transport links very close, with metro station on doorstep. Ideal place for a comfortable stay & to explore the Barcelona. Would stay again.

Perfectly located, equiped and outstanding clean apartement. Never thought it would be exactly as shown and described in the anouncement. We (3 girls, 1 guy, 22 - 27 years, from Austria) had 3 very nice days at Manuel´s place. The fact, that it´s a 15 min walk to La Rambla is soon forgotten, cause the metro stops right in front of the flat. And we were able to buy the only things that were missing in the flat (toilet paper and dishwasher liquid) next door....

Manuel was a great host. Very flexible and easy to work with. The place was beautiful and looked just like the pictures, very clean and perfect for our trip (4 people). The neighborhood was very nice with many shops, markets and bakeries. Not right in the middle of the action as to be too loud and busy, but just close enough to walk to most of the good sights. If you don't feel like walking the metro is literally steps form the apartment with access to all of Barcelona in minutes. Very nice place that I would return to for my next visit.

Hôte charmant, très disponible.
Superbe appartement, charmant avec son plafond vouté, son ascenseur typique.
Très bien placé avec la station de métro à 50 mètres.
Multitude de commerces à proximité.

Point important: état de propreté impeccable, couvertures douces et sentant bon la lessive!

Nous vous recommandons vivement cet appartement.

We had a nice stay at the apartment. Everything was just as in the pictures. Everything worked, it was clean. Although the place is close to Gran Via it was quiet enough for us to sleep at night/early morning. Manuel was a friendly and service minded host. I would recommend this to all my friends.
Manuel has been a kind host. The appartment was very nice and we were very happy to have chosen this place to stay in barcelona!

We enjoyed a lot our stay in Manuel's appartment. It is very well located,  in the center of Barcelona, very close to Rocafort metro station (line 1, directly related to the Plaza Cataluña) so perfectly located to discover the city. The appartment was very clean and well-equipped (wifi, fitted kitchen, bedrooms etc). Finally, Manuel welcomed us warmly and took care of stay in Barcelona. We strongly recommend it for anyone who wants to spend several days in Barcelona.

La casa es tal y como se ve en las fotos, bien decorada, de techos altos y abovedados. Muy bonita y perfectamente situada, en metro y andando. Buenos colchones y almohadas. Manuel nos ayudó con todo y nos dió buenos consejos sobre restaurantes y ocio en la ciudad.

Unfortunately we did not end up meeting Manuel but he arranged for another lady, Ingrid to welcome us and show us the apartment. Ingrid was very helpful, friendly and obliging - helping us with car parking and going out of her way to help us settle in. She provided excellent customer service and was a pleasure to deal with. The apartment was as pictured, well located and clean. We were very happy with our choice.
Garry and family.

Appartment was almost as pictured. But you should keep in mind that the rooms (2 bedrooms and living-room) are not real rooms. Looks like it was 1 big room and they made some separation walls - those walls have a gap to the ceiling about 1 meter. So no real privacy. And actually very noisy from the street (how it comes noone mention it before me?). I used earplugs - so much noise.
This was the first time (of about 10 time renting via airbnb) I didn't enjoy communicating with the host. Manuel asked for 35 euro (in cash) for late check-in. I think that it's normal practice, but it should be in the home rules! Otherwise it's not nice. And Manuel was out of town (since the day after we ariived) and can't (or did't want to) help us with the appartment (no soap and no wash liquid). He just answered in the end of the day "sorry I'm out of town". I think that if host is out of town - he should be able to arrange some people to help guests while he can't do it by himself.

My sister and her adult daughter and I shared this suite in wonderful Barcelona for one week in November. Manuel arrived at our pre-arranged time to give us the keys and explain a few details, such as how to operate the wifi. He was very welcoming and told us a bit about Barcelona. 
The apartment felt safe - there were 3 locked doors to get in. We enjoy walking and felt safe walking in this neighbourhood. There are many interesting places to visit within walking distance, such as the Eixample area, La Rambla, and the National Art Museum. However if you are not a walker, cabs are easy to hail - cabs with a green light indicate they are available for hire. 
The suite is represented accurately in the photos. The supply of linens and towels was ample. The apartment is near a busy road which generates traffic noise at night - this may disturb light sleepers. Our first night was a Saturday night which might be a noisier night or we may have been suffering from jet-lag, but our sleep was disrupted. The rest of the week I slept well.
The bathroom is an ensuite off the master bedroom. Because we are family we were okay with this arrangement, but some people may feel uncomfortable passing through a room with sleeping people to use the toilet in the night.
There are loads of nearby shops to pick up groceries and other supplies such as hand soap, dish detergent, and toilet paper. 
Overall, the apartment was clean and it suited our needs well. I would stay again if I visit Barcelona again.

Hemos estado muy a gusto en el apartamento. El barrio perfecto cerquita de mi familia y al lado de una boca de metro hemos tenido una estancia perfecta.  El piso es tal como se ve en las fotos pero en realidad no tiene tanta luz.

At the check-in there was a girl welcoming us on time, at the entrance of the building. Our stay was comfortable, the flat is very well connected as the tube station is under the building. The flat was clean and fully equipped so we didn't have any problem. A garage for the car parking was 5' on foot and it was convenient. the location is central that's why it's a bit noisy, being on one of the main Streets leading to the centretown. round the corner there's a nice coffee shop called 'fish and chips' where you can have lovely breakfast. A pleasant stay.

Casa muy confortable, adecuada a la descripción de la web y en un barrio muy bien comunicado y céntrico. Manuel nos ofreció todo tipo de facilidades y se mostró muy amable e interesado por nosotros. Este inmueble ha sido una excelente elección.

Good welcome, from Lucia, with useful advises ant tips about the city, tapas restaurant, etc. 
The house is very well cleaned and equipped, but the actual strength point is the transport connection: 10 mt to the metro, 100m to the stop of the autobus to the Airport, 100m to the citybus. 
The district is elegant and some brand new tapas restaurant: I advice Lolita (VERY GOOD) and Tickets (but we have not tested because there is a waiting list of 2 months....). 
Some noises for the traffic and not very illuminated, but it's not relevant to me for a very good stay in Barcelona.

Manuel met me at this beautiful property and was very kind. The property is very clean with everything you need. I would recommend staying here anyone interested. The property is located very central in Barcelona with the metro connection right outside the front door. This was the perfect gift for my parents birthday and I would definitely stay here again.

L'appartement est propre mais manque un peu d’équipement de base. (Pas de torchon pour la cuisine, le four est sale,il faut faire la vaisselle avant de pouvoir l'utiliser, certaines ampoules sont grillées appartement plutôt (Website hidden by Airbnb) situé au dessus des poubelles collectives, attention au moustiques si vous ouvré la fenêtre... une prise de la chambre principale ne tiens pas au mur.)
Ne soyez pas surpris de payer la taxe de séjour a votre arrivé cet appartement est gérer par une agence. 
Sinon, il est très bien situé, il y a une bouche de métro a 10m de la porte de l'immeuble, un parking sous terrain très proche avec des prix avantageux pour plusieurs nuits (3jours => 30 euros)

Such a perfect location!! Very close to the metro and plaza Espanya, as well as a pleasant walk to La Rambla and other tourist sites! The house has everything you need for a short or long stay, and Lucia was very welcoming! Highly recommended!
호스트 대신 다른 여자분이 집을 안내해 주었습니다. 야간에 도시 소음이 조금 거슬리긴 하지만 종일 돌아나녀 피곤한터라 숙면을 취할 수 있었습니다. 집이 생각보다 좁습니다만 세식구가 지내기엔 부족함이 없었고 세탁기가 건조기능이 있어서 편리했습니다. 메트로 역과 가까워 관광지로 이동이 편리했고 주변에 식당이 많아 편리했습니다. 대체로 만족한 숙소였습니다.

THE DESCRIPTION IS MOSTLY ACCURATE. THE LOCATION , OFF THE GRAN VIA, IS OK BUT THE BUILDING IS NOT MAINTAINED AS WELL AS OTHER PROPERTIES ON THE GRAN VIA. THE AIR CONDITIONER NEVER WORKED AND JUST BLEW AIR AROUND. IT SORT OF REMINDS ME OF A STAY HOTEL. THIS IS A MANAGED PROPERTY AND NOT A PRIVATE OWNER PROPERTY. THE CHECK IN WAS SMOOTH AND THE INTERNET WAS AROUND 8.5 MBPS WHICH WAS MORE THEN ADEQUATE. THE SECOND BED IS TINY..JUST BE AWARE, I USED THE ROOM AS A CLOSET FOR MY BELONGINGS. METRO IS CLOSE AND PLENTY OF CABS ON THE GRAN VIA. IT IS ADEQUATE BUT NOT SOMEWHERE I WOULD WANT TO HANG OUT IN. MANAGEMENT COMPANY WAS IN GOOD TOUCH.

The apartment was lovely. We were greeted by Manuel's assistants who were very warm
And informative. Excellent location next to the metro.

The apartment gave us the space and comfort we needed (group of 4 friends), the beds were comfortable, the living space nice, good kitchen and nice proportions.
The only problem we had was with the WIFI, it seems to be working only sometimes which was annoying for moments, besides that great experience! 20 mts from the metro station and still really quiet, we slept with the windows open and was perfectly ok.
Thanks Manuel  for making our trip to Barcelona a great one!!
Everything from the begin to the end was fine!
We had a great time in the Appartement.  Everything was fine. The Metro is just 50 metres away.

Замечательное месторасположение. Удобная квартира. Manuel и его помошница организовали встречу очень четко. Общее впечатление очень положительное. В целом мы остались довольны. Была одна проблема - на 4 чел. и помыв посуды вечером не хватало горячей воды. Надо сначала всем искупаться, потом мыть посуду.

The apartment is very well located, a few steps from metro and 5 minutes from Plazza Espana. Spacious and comfortable, relatively quiet.  Wifi, In the kitchen, microwave, toaster, washing machine .....
Warm welcome and availability of Manuel.
Todo muy bien. El depto esta en muy buenas condiciones. Tal cual lo informado. La ubicacion es muy buena.

Foi tudo bem com o apartamento. 
Somente acho que caberia ao Manoel deixar claro que nem sempre o cheek out é flexível. De fato, este foi um critério importante para selecionar seu imóvel, já que minha mãe, uma senhora de mais de 70 anos, exigia isso pois seu vôo saiu a noite ( ao contrário do meu).
Fora isso, nada a reclamar. Apto limpo, bem situado e interessante.
Agradeço sim ao Manoel!!??
Comodidad a la hora de check in y check out. Piso céntrico; limpio, moderno y en buen estado. Parking a muy buen precio justo al lado.

My family and I really enjoyed Manuel's place - his agent was friendly and helpful, and the place was fine for our needs (self and wife, with our two adult daughters.  There was sufficient space for the four of us and the neighborhood was pleasant and safe.  Recommend!!

This was a great location to stay at. Just steps away from the metro station which made sightseeing easy. And it's on the second floor so we didn't have to climb too many steps. Know that the bedrooms and living room share an open space above the walls...could make a difference whether staying with friends/family. Living room has an AC, but the cooling effect doesn't carry over to the bedrooms as much.

Appartement presque conforme aux photos, avec tout de même une particularité ce n'est pas un appartement avec des murs séparant les chambres mais plutôt un grand studio avec des cloisons qui ne vont pas au plafond . Ce qui est proche de la tromperie par rapport à ce que l'on attends, c'est donc  un appartement pour deux/trois max si vous êtes très intimes. Pour le reste , bon niveau d'équipements . Par contre, il faut savoir que c'est très bruyant: bruit de la rue comme beaucoup d'appartement à Barcelone  mais aussi de la cour intérieur ( voisins). Dernière chose qui nous a le plus déçu, c'est la propreté , en particulier des draps et des serviettes. Pour moi, c'est la base pour se sentir bien et là c'est raté . J'ai contacte Manuel pour la propreté car le premier ménage a été fait "rapidement" et il a fait revenir la femme de ménage mais sans changement de draps et serviettes.

Sehr netter Kontakt, Übergabe und Kommunikation top. Wohnung gut ausgestattet und sehr sauber. Die Anfrage nach späterem Checkout wurde schnell und postiv beantwortet.
Für 2 Pers in Bezug auf den Standard ( auf den bearbeiteten Fotos sah es doch schöner aus)zu teuer, für eine Familie oder mehrere Pers jedoch ein gutes Preisleistungsverhältnis.
Sehr störend ist die laute Umgebung durch die Hauptstrasse genau an der Wohnung. Schlafen war für uns nur mit Ohrstöpsel möglich.
Lage gut, Metro 50 m von der Haustüre

The apartment was exactly as described. The equipment was complete and also the WIFI worked properly. 
Manuel is a very friendy host. Although our arrival was earlier than expected he was very helpful and arranged for us the check-in at about 11.30 am. So we had a perfect start in our Barcelona weekend. The apartent is located in a safe area and very convenient just a few steps away from the Metro-station. We can recommend Manuel and his apartment ! :-)

This is a cozy flat located on the second floor of a residential/commercial building, steps away from the Metro. It is ideal for a couple planning to spend most of their time exploring Barcelona. We appreciated the drip-style coffee maker, and there is an excellent fish-and-chips restaurant located on the corner.

Cozy flat in great, central location - easy walks to Plaza Espanya, El Raval, Gran Via, Montuic, and La Rambla. Great for two adults (2nd bedroom is tiny). At times it was noisy for sleeping but using white noise apps helped considerably. Clean.

Sehr schöne gemütliche Wohnung. Alles sauber, sehr netter Gastgeber und von der Kommunikation her lief auch alles perfekt  Metro Anschlüsse nur eine Minute von der Wohnung entfernt, Busse nur 5 Minuten.
Great location, great host and comfy place to stay.
I can highly recommend this apartment.  It has everything you would need, is clean and located next to the Metro.

The flat was spacious, clean, and very conveniently located. Rocafort metro station is litterly 10 seconds away. Mauel was a great host, he was very welcoming and explained everything with so much care, he even booked a taxi for me to the airport. I will certainly rent this flat again on my next visits to Barcelona.

The place is central and right next to the metro station. Place was clean and the host was very accommodating and helpful with checkin and transportation. We really enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend it.

Highly recommended! Centrally located and near public transportation. Walking distance to a trendy street (carrer parlament) with tons of cool bars and restaurants. Comfortable accommodation, very clean, and accurately described. The entrance to the bathroom is inside the main bedroom which is something to consider for group travelers. Manuel was very responsive and helpful. Lucia (check in) was amazing and gave us several local recommendations and explained the public transportation system to us. Overall, great stay.

El apartamento está muy bien conectado, tiene la estación del metro a la puerta, está bastante céntrico, la chica (Lucia) que nos recibió, nos dió unas estupendas indicaciones sobre la ciudad y el barrio, donde comer, cosas que hacer, etc. La comunicación con Manuel es fluida. El piso es cómodo y amplio, totalmente equipado. Quizás comentar que si tienes el sueño ligero, el ruido de la calle te puede molestar. Comentar que las paredes entre habitaciones no llegan al techo.

Las fotografias reflejan bien la realidad del piso, sólo destacar que para acceder al baño hay que pasar por uno de los dormitorios. En ciertos casos puede ser importante tener en cuenta este punto. La segunda habitación tiene el tamaño justo para que duerma una persona. La ubicación es muy buena y está cerquísima del metro.
Great location. Perfect for couple and a young family member. Thumbs up!
Responded to our messages quickly. Overall we had a great stay! :) Certainly recommend it!
The hosts are absolutely lovely! They were quick to respond to messages and help. They gave lots of local
Manuel, a very good owner, the apartments are cozy and very conveniently located. We are the third time in Barcelona and this apartment we liked the most.
Perfect location. Cosy home. Excellent communication with host. Perfect temporary solution. Thanks Manuel!
Super convenient to both the Aerobus from the airport and the Rocafort Metro L1 Station. Excellent communication and a great place to stay. Would consider again in the future.
Great apartment, close the transport links, and easy check in.

Everything was as listed, location is great, nice neighborhood and great transport connection of needed. Apartment was clean and Lucia was very helpful with everything and communication was smooth as well as check in/out procedure. Would recommend this without any doubt. Thanks for everything.

Manuel was a very kind and accommodating host, working around his other bookings to allow us to check in a bit early and out a bit later. He also arranged a cot for my friend's young child, which was excellent. 
The apartment is all you need for a weekend away - a decent size for both bedroom and living spaces, in a great location, with an excellent fish and chip shop below and only metres to the metro if you're not keen on the 20 minute stroll to the centre of town. Two sets of keys meant we could come and go as we pleased.
Note that there is no proper division between the two bedrooms and the living area (i.e. the walls don't reach the ceiling). So while there is visual privacy, you can hear everything between the three rooms. Also, the bathroom can only be accessed via the main bedroom. If neither of these are an issue, then I'd certainly recommend this apartment!
Great host , nice place close to everything.

- Perfect location, 10 seconds to Line 1 Rocafort
- Two bedrooms with bed, one big one and one small one, which is good;
- All facilities included 
- Problem 1: acoustic, sometimes noisy during midnight (motorbike)
- Problem 2: have bugs during our stay

Manuel's place was the perfect place to stay during our short girl's trip to Barcelona! It was clean and organized upon arrival. Manuel was very sweet and accommodating during the length of our stay and messaged us back very quickly. The apartment is not too far from anything although I would recommend a taxi to go farther downtown towards the night life. Overall great place to stay in Barcelona!

La ubicación excelente a pie se llega perfectamente al centro neurálgico de Barcelona. Es muy silencioso y se descansa perfectamente. 

Tal vez un poco lenta la conexión de internet para poder ver alguna película. 

Hay muchos lugares para comprar y salir a desayunar o cenar.
The location is great it is close to everything one needs like Bus stop, Metro, very good restaurants, car parking. We really had wonderful time.
位置很好,里面的冰箱有点老了,不知道房东现在换了没有｡没有电梯是个大问题,虽然是一楼,但是箱子重的人搬着还是很吃力的｡房子还好,各种设施只能说还好,不是很新的那种｡但是房东反应很快,我们提出的一些问题,反馈很快｡
Great apartment, located in a safe and authentic Barcelona neighborhood. Right next to the metro station which gives you access to the entire city. Would highly recommend!

Location of the apartment is excellent, we could walk almost everywhere. I arranged everything quite easily with Manuel and almost inmediately responded to my messages. We really enjoyed Barcelona and didnt have to worry about anything else. Thanks again!

Manuel's place is really very good and is located in a very nice neighbourhood. The apartment is cosy and clean and has absolutely everything one needs. It's very well located, the metro station and buses are just two steps away but it is also in a walking distance from the city center. 

Manuel is very responsive and helpful and communicating with him is very easy and pleasant.

I recommend this place to anyone who want to visit Barcelona.
A legjobb, központi helyen van, ami nagy előnye, viszont aki csendre vágyik, mást válasszon. :) Mi jól éreztük magunkat, Manuel segítőkész szuper házigazda
Great place in a brilliant location - thanks for having us!
The host canceled this reservation 271 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good place that is central to everything you need .

Good apartment, walking distance to everything. Manuel and Dani are professional hosts there for your needs. The apartment has all amenities you need + right outside shops, supermarket, restaurants. Would suits those not wanting to be right in the middle of the noise. Barcelona always provides fun

Apartment was comfortable and in a great neighborhood. Loved the scalloped ceilings and the balcony. Also plenty of space to cook and eat if that’s something of interest. Aside from the bathroom being an en suite there were no issues.

This apartment is just alright. It's definitely not worth the money you will be paying. Poorly decorated, with holes in the walls, it's missing shampoo and gel and the kitchen utilities are super basic (there was not a single breakfast bowl!). Photos look much nicer than the real thing – it is not as beautiful as it looks and it is not (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with the host was OK until I arrived, then he did not reach out a single time to double check if everything was alright. Check-in was poorly performed too – I waited for the son of the host, who simply opened the door and said "Well, this is it". I had to ask him questions about the amenities, otherwise he would have just left. If you are looking for a comfortable stay in Barcelona, I would not recommend you this place.

A nice place in a great location to explore Barcelona - the metro stop was just outside the front door. Dani (who checked us in) was very responsive and flexible with our arrival time. The apartment was a perfect size for three of us.
Nice flat in a great location (easy walk to old town, train station, lots of good restaurants). Check in was very easy. Barcelona is a wonderful city!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very central location. Subway station and shops are only a few steps away.
Kitchen equipment does not invite to prepare 5 course meals but is ok for breakfast and simple meals. 
High barrel vault ceiling is creating great atmosphere.
Nice and warm welcome with great tips.

Good location, easy access to public transportation and a plethora of brunch places near by if thats your jam. Apartment is a bit out dated while parts of the wall missing plaster but otherwise nice. Shower is really small and flat of a walk up one floor. Market right next door which is convenient. 

Great check in process and extremely responsive.

If you’re looking to stay somewhere in the center of the whole action in Barcelona, then look no further this is the place. Manuel’s place is centralized within walking distance to restaurants, bars, shopping stores, and sightseeing. The apartment is as describe with all necessary amenities. Communication with host (Manuel and Dani) was great.
Good location, clean, comfortable.

We had a great experience with this apartment! Check-in was easy - someone was there to meet us with keys at exactly the agreed-upon time and also left us with restaurant recommendations for the neighborhood. The apartment itself was very clean and spacious for two people. It was conveniently located as well with a metro stop and small grocery just outside the front door. Would definitely stay here again!

Хозяин был гостеприимен и приехал в назначенное время. Ответил на все вопросы. Но, квартира оказалась теснее и темнее чем на фото, вторая спальня явно не для высоких людей, мне с ростом 176 было комфортно, но руки на кровати вверх головы не вытянешь.

name: Cozy room in the center of Barcelona!!!
summary: We rent a room in our amazing modernist flat in the middle of Barcelona.  Our flat is placed in a classical building, modernist style with   high ceilings  and  modernist floors. The flat is super big, spacious and full of light, and calm  so it's a great oasis to explore the city. The room we rent is really cozy and calm (it has a double bed and a closet).
space: We rent a room in our amazing modernist flat in the middle of Barcelona.  Our flat is placed in a classical building, modernist style with   high ceilings  and  modernist floors. The flat is super big, spacious and full of light, and calm  so it's a great oasis to explore the city. The flat is placed in the middle of Gaudí buildings and the center of Barcelona and the shopping area. We are located at 2min walking from La Pedrera, 15min. walking from Sagrada Familia and Park Güell, 10 min walking to Casa Batlló and 15min. walking to Pl. Catalunya.  The location is great, also  5min walk to metro stations (l3, l5, l4).

transit: The flat is perfectly connected by public transport, 5min walking to 3 diferent metro lines, several buses and trains and taxi.
access: The flat has all the amenities you need and you will be able to use them (kitchen, bathroom, washing machine, wifi etc).  We share a chill out area which is placed in a gallery full of windows, plants and sun with sofas and a hammock were we like to sunbath and drink some wine in the afternoon. The flat is placed in the middle of Gaudí buildings and the center of Barcelona and the shopping area. We are located at 2min walking from La Pedrera, 15min. walking from Sagrada Familia and Park Güell, 10 min walking to Casa Batlló and 15min. walking to Pl. Catalunya.  The location is great, also  5min walk to metro stations (l3, l5, l4).
interaction: The flat is located next to passeig de gracia, a luxurious street full of amazing shops and monumental buildings such as La Pedrera or Casa Batlló, walking down the street you will arrive to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas in less than 20min. From another side we are located just at the beginning of Gracia neighbourhood, full of terraces, street music, cool bars, squares, bohemian vibe and hype shops.

name: Ndussol 4
summary: Casa Centenária restaurada mantendo o máximo da sua originalidade, mas com todo o conforto que esperamos poder proporcionar.
space: Todas as Suites estão equipadas com SmartTv, mobília moderna fazendo a conjugação perfeita entre a pedra Secular e o descanso.
description: Casa Centenária restaurada mantendo o máximo da sua originalidade, mas com todo o conforto que esperamos poder proporcionar. Todas as Suites estão equipadas com SmartTv, mobília moderna fazendo a conjugação perfeita entre a pedra Secular e o descanso. Temos uma cozinha partilhada equipada que podem utilizar livremente caso o desejem. Tendo também um terraço comum com mesas e protecção solar para que possam desfrutar livremente. Estou disponível sempre que possível,providenciar dicas locais sobre a nossa Magnífica Cidade. Campanhã é uma zona central do Porto, estando perto de todos pontos de interesse da cidade a pouca distância. Metro (200m) Comboio (200m) Autocarros (200m) Praça de Táxi (200m) Rent a Car (200m) Este é um projecto que está em fase final de recuperação estando neste momento a ser mobilado e a terminar os pequenos detalhes que esperamos fazer a diferença.

name: 6 bd country living near beach
summary: This two story home is just minutes away from the famous beaches, and the #1 attraction, Polynesian Cultural Center in Hawaii.  The house is nearly 2900 sqft that can comfortably sleep 13 people in real beds.  It's perfect for multi family reunions and family gatherings.  Perfect location for people who love the country, beaches, and away from the busy city life.
space: LARGE GROUPS, FAMILY REUNIONS, MULTIPLE FAMILIES can be accommodated at this beautifully clean & spacious home . -Two story 6 bedrooms, 3 baths, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sqft -UPSTAIRS: 1  fully stocked kitchen, living room, 1 master bedroom with a king size bed and a full size bathroom, 3 twin beds in the second room and 1 full bed in the third room. Second bathroom in the hall way. -DOWNSTAIRS:  kitchen, living room, 1 bathroom, 1 king size bed in the first bedroom, 2 twin beds in the second room, 1 queen bed in the third room, big laundry room also served as storage for tools and cleaning products for maintenance. There are  ACs in the upstairs master bedroom and kitchen/living room.  Ceiling fans and portable stand fans are provided in every room.  Rates may vary through the time of the year. Nightly rate has included the Hawaii GE and TA taxes.  Guests do not need to pay extra taxes after booking. Hawaii  Tax ID :  TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
