The house is nearly (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sqft that can comfortably sleep 13 people in real beds.  It's perfect for multi family reunions and family gatherings.  Perfect location for people who love the country, beaches, and away from the busy city life. LARGE GROUPS, FAMILY REUNIONS, MULTIPLE FAMILIES can be accommodated at this beautifully clean & spacious home . -Two story 6 bedrooms, 3 baths, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sqft -UPSTAIRS: 1  fully stocked kitchen, living room, 1 master bedroom with a king size bed and a full size bathroom, 3 twin beds in the second room and 1 full bed in the third room. Second bathroom in the hall way. -DOWNSTAIRS:  kitchen, living room, 1 bathroom, 1 king size bed in the first bedroom, 2 twin beds in the second room, 1 queen bed in the third room, big laundry room also served as storage for tools and cleaning p
neighborhood_overview: 7-11, local restaurants and shopping center are within walking distance.   Here are some nearby tourist attractions:  5 minutes to Hauula Loop Trail   2 minutes to a beautiful white sand Kakela Beach   5 minutes from the Polynesian Cultural Center    5 minutes from the LDS visiting center and temple   5 minutes from Hukilau Cafe featured in Man vs Food   10 minutes from Gunstock ranch (pet zoo, horseback riding)   15 minutes from Kahuku (famous Giovanni's shrimp truck, food trucks)   15 minutes from Kualoa Ranch (ATV tours, Movies site tour, Horseback riding)   20 minutes from North shore, Sunset beach, Pipeline, Sharks Cove, Waimea   20 minutes to North Shore famous Ted's bakery   40 minutes from the historical Haleiwa town
notes: A couple of homes in our neighborhood may look run down due to the high cost for maintenance.  Most neighborhoods look very similar except for gated areas in Turtle Bay and Sunset Area.  Please note that our neighborhoods are very safe and family oriented.  The local people are nice and with lots of Aloha.
transit: The bus stop is just a few minutes walk from my house.  It runs every half hour and takes you anywhere on the island.  However waiting time and travel time might take up some time from your trip.  I won't recommend it to guests that are planning to stay for only a short period of time.  I would strongly recommend them to get a bus schedule online.
access: -Property is at the back lot, enclosed with walls, safe for kids to play in the yard. -Long drive way can park at least four cars in the property -FREE boogie boards, surf boards, water gears to use during your stay
interaction: I am always there to help.  Email or text me whenever you need something.  I will try my best to assist you.  I wish everyone who stays in my vacation rental would have the best and most memorable vacation in Hawaii.
house_rules: This is a family oriented neighborhood.  No late night parties, the neighbors get quiet down around 9pm.  Please respect the neighbors.  Please take off shoes when enter the house.  Please no smoking inside the property.

host.host_about:
I came from Hon Kong 19 years ago to study at Brigham Young University.  I met my husband here who was also from HK.  We felt in love with the Aloha spirit and the county living style in Hawaii so we decided to stay for good.  

I am a stay at home mom with three lovely children.  I love to eat different kinds of food, but my favorites are raw fish and Thai.  I love to watch Korean dramas and I love to read. 

I like to travel.  I've been to some Asian countries but never been to Europe.  I am dying to go there someday with my family and friends.  I love to see the architecture  and learn about their cultures.  
I've hosted some students from the Asia and I found that I love to meet new people.  That is the reason why I join Airbnb.

reviews.comments:
The few days we spent at Samantha's house were easily the best of our entire vacation. Her house is spacious, bright, and very comfortable. There were four of us but this apartment has plenty of room for more. It was very comfortable with ceiling fans in each room. Samantha and her family live right upstairs but you'd never know it because they are so quiet. 

Samantha is a very attentive and generous host. She had fresh fruit waiting for us with new fruit each day. She is proud of her area and eager to share insider tips on where to go and where to shop. We swam at quiet beaches only the locals know about.  Samantha provides plenty of beach towels. After a long day at the Polynesian Cultural  Center, it was great to be able to drive just five minutes and go to sleep!

We loved the time we spent with Samantha and feel like we have a new friend in Hawaii.

Our stay at Samantha's was the best part of our trip to O'ahu! We were just so relaxed & were able to fully experience the spirit of Aloha at her property; the beach with excellent snorkelling (turtles!) is literally at the end of the street, hiking in rainforest & waterfalls in the volcanic hills directly adjacent to the property, plus shops & bus services an easy 5 minute stroll away.. It was such a pleasure to meet Samantha in the flesh, she had gone out of her way to meet my needs (I was travelling to O'ahu for a friend's wedding with my active toddler) & was helpful and discreet. The property itself met our needs perfectly - asides from being self-contained, allowing me to cater to my toddler - it was immaculately clean & on the ground floor. We slept like logs in the comfy beds, able to eat like at home when we cooked for ourselves & the additional touch of leaving ample reading material for us was  just such a welcome surprise - thank you! If you do need to escape from the mayhem of Waikiki I can't recommend Samantha's property enough, you will discover another part of O'ahu...and maybe yourself... Plus perfect for families.

Hidden Gem in Hauula!!!! My sister and I stayed at Samanthas house end of May.  It was awesome! Very quiet and relaxing. Very reasonably priced. The house itself was well maintained and clean. The bedrooms are big and spacious. Furniture and beds are comfortable. She provided us with everything we needed. Even went out of her way and bought electric fans for us. Another bonus is that parking is included!  Samantha was very friendly, welcoming and an excellent host. Her kids are adorable. I wish she had a house to rent in Kauai and Maui. I would definitely recommend staying at Samanthas!!!

주인장은 정말 친절하며 집은 정말 깨끗했습니다.
비행 일정을 맞추기 위해 하루만 묵었던 집이지만 정말 만족합니다.
시설은 사진에서 보는바와 같았으며, 오히려 사진이 조금 더 안좋았습니다.
사만다씨는 사진을 바꾸는 것도 고려해 보시면 좋겠네요.
이른 체크인을 요청하여 편의를 봐주었으며,
약속된 시간보다 늦게 갔지만 불평하지 않았습니다.
아주 만족하는 여행이었습니다.

Samantha was great, she greeted us when we arrived. Gave us a walk-through and let us know where everything was. Plenty of towels, dishes, rooms were spacious even had a washer and dryer. Samantha let us know about the best places to visit. She even allowed us to use their snorkel gear and boogie boards.
Accommodation was clean and spacious with plenty of room for our family of 8. A beach was at the end of the street and it's close to the Polynesian Cultural Centre.

Samantha was an absolutely amazing host. Despite being 8 months pregnant (and in the middle of a summer heat wave) she was always available and responsive. We spent two weeks in Hauula, and fell in love with the area, and the house!  The home is spacious, comfortable, clean, and so peaceful. It is a bit of a drive back to the Honolulu side, but definitely worth the tranquil surroundings, and easy commute to the world famous North Shore.  There is a grocery store, and several small eateries around the corner, and the white sandy beaches of Waimea Bay are a short drive away. Everything you need in one perfect little paradise package! Avoid the tourist crush, and stay in the 'real Hawaii'. You won't be disappointed.

Our host family was wonderful.  Samantha made check in and check out easy.  She showed/told us everything we needed to know about the property and our stay.  The house was great.  Everything was in good order, freshly painted, etc.  Having access to a washer and dryer on site was a real bonus.  The accommodations were perfect for our family of six.  Being in a quiet town, instead of a busy city was nice.  Most our our planned activities were around north shore, so the location was really convenient.  Much better than having to drive from Honolulu repeatedly.  I would recommend this property to anyone who wants to stay in the north shore area, rather than Honolulu.

Everything was as described.  Samantha and Edward were excellent hosts and quite helpful.  I cannot say enough there.  Great location away from the busy city.  Everything one needs is within a short walk or drive.  Overall, my wife and I had a wonderful time.  We would highly recommend booking with Samantha.

Samantha and her family were great hosts!  The home is everything that was described.  Like many others, our experience staying here was great!  Samantha and her husband were very friendly and were a great help with our time there.  It definitely is an area to get away from the tourists.  We had the small beach all to ourselves and even used the boards provided by Samantha.  I would definitely recommend this place if you are visiting PCC and want to get away from all the tourists.

This was a great first Airbnb experience. The location was right across from the Hau'ula Beach Park and close to two shopping centers. Really convenient location to get to Giovanni's Shrimp Truck, Ted's Bakery, Papa Ole's and about an hour drive each to Waikiki, Hanauma Bay, and the Honolulu Airport.
The unit is very clean and well stocked with all essential items and Samantha and her family are great hosts. Responds to any inquiries within 30 minutes and recommended a bunch of things to do around the area while caring for a new baby!

Great self contained place! Huge open kitchen/dining/lounge and massive bathroom. Main room great size too. We loved all the attention to detail from Samantha - from snorkels to coffee to beach towels and sunscreen and shampoo - it was all there and available for guest use. She really went over and beyond too as my son had his birthday there and she allowed her children to come to a small party. I also did some online shopping and she was okay with mail being sent. A million times better than any hotel if you'd rather save your money :-) Insider tips- don't panic about no local Safeway - it is all Foodland on that part of the Island. Try the Laie Palms family cinema. Also a very small rock pool on the closest beach was awesome for small kids. Location is very good for commuting - an hour gets you any part of the island pretty much so super easy if you want to do both North Shore and Kailua or Honokulu and Waikiki etc.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Samantha and her family were very welcoming. She gave us a quick tour upon arrival and offered to be available if needed. The listing description is very accurate the house is very well kept. The neighborhood was quiet and family oriented. There was a total of 8 people traveling with us. 5 adults and 3 children ages 8, 7 and 3.  We had plenty of space to comfortably rest relax and enjoy our vacation together. The washer and dryer were definitely gold to us! Although we were always on the go taking advantage of every minute were had on the island, at the end of the day we all felt like we were going "HOME". Thank you Samantha for everything, we wouldn't change anything about our stay !

We loved working with Samantha. She was willing to go above and beyond to make us feel welcome and accommodate our needs.
We would definitely book a stay with her again.
Estuvimos muy cómodos, Samantha nos atendió bien.

Samantha was wonderful. Her communication  was excellent before we arrived, and she accommodated for our needs very well. There were 6 of us staying, and one baby. Samantha was very helpful with all of our needs for the baby as well. The house was even nicer than it seemed in the pictures, and we were very pleased. She provided water shoes, boogie boards, snorkeling gear, and other beach accessories so we didn't have to bring our own, or buy much while we were there. Would definitely recommend her as a host!

Samantha is an extremely welcoming and helpful host.  The home was exactly as listed.  It had everything we needed and more.  It was a very comfortable space that can fit a large family.  I would definitely recommend this home to others.

Samantha was a welcoming host. Her house is in a small development, with many other houses crowded round hers and no outdoor space for sitting. She and her family live on the second floor of the house and we occupied the first floor (Website hidden by Airbnb) The space was clean and neat with comfortable beds for 6 people, and one large modern bathroom. Unfortunately there was no grab bar in the shower and no rubber mat on the floor - a very slippery situation for the geriatrics, plus no shelves inside the shower for soap, washcloths, or shampoo bottles. 
  The place was not set up for the 5 of us - only 4 coffee mugs, 4 glasses and 4 cereal bowls; the dish rack and garbage pail were very small, plus there was no kettle and no measuring cup. Our most difficult problem was the lighting: only overhead lights and no reading lamps by the beds or in the living room. We're readers and we greatly missed having reading lights.
     The driveway was difficult for us - we had to  back down the length of it in a large and unfamiliar rented car.  It was hard to do! The beach was nice and close, as was a supermarket.

Our stay with Samantha was wonderful. She was very in tune with our needs. It was like being with family, but nowhere near intrusive. She genuinely cares about the place and the people that stay there. Given the opportunity, we would stay there every time when going to Oahu.

Samantha was very easy to contact, and went out of her way to make sure that our family was well accommodated, including our children.  

The rental is the bottom floor of a two-storey with the owners living above.  There was never any noise or disturbance, and I felt we had sufficient privacy.  It is a good-sized living space, and is in good condition.  The house is in a quiet neighborhood within walking distance to the beach and the Hau'ula loop and Ma'akua ridge hiking trails.  It is also convenient to Polynesian Cultural Center and the beaches of the North Shore.  Covered parking was provided.  

I felt this rental was an excellent value, especially for our large family.

Samantha was very kind and thoughtful.
Her explainanation was correct. 
Location is very good to move many beautiful beaches and scene points.
Great place to stay! Big kitchen/living room, confy beds, huge bathroom and all very clean. Samantha is a great host, nothing to complain! Thanks ;-)

Samantha and her family were awesome. My husband and I got married in Laie and used Samantha's place for the groomsmen and my husband to stay in the night before the wedding. She was great about communication and even gave them a later checkout time so that they could get ready for the wedding at the house. My husband said it was beautiful, comfortable, and spacious and he would highly recommend it.

We stayed at Samantha's for almost a week and a half and I truly wish we had stayed more. Her place was so inviting I honestly felt like I was staying with family. If you want to experience the Ohana way,  stay at Samantha's place. My whole family (including my 1 year old) felt at home. My one wish was that I remembered to use hthe beach gear for when we went swimming. But oh well, next time ;) 

Mahalo Samantha

We called our host and met her there when we arrived.  She was pleasent and gave my wife a tour while I unloaded the van.  No stairs to climb which made it convenient.  We had six of us staying there and our youngest was 11 yrs. old, we felt safe.  For our needs the location was great and stores, beaches were very near.  She never bothered us and was very nice when we departed.

This rental was perfect for me and my family. It had three rooms, one bathroom and a kitchen/living room/dining area all in one big room. The entire house was very spacious. We were on the first floor of a two story house but we had a lot of privacy. We also used a couple of the boogie boards and scuba gear that was available to us by Samantha. When we first got there, her son (I am guessing) showed us around the space and I met Samantha that night and we ran into each other a couple of times throughout our trip but for the most part, we were left alone which was fine with us. I would definitely stay here again if I came back to Oahu.

We had a wonderful stay! The houses was very spacious and clean.  Information such as lock codes, directions, etc . . . were very specific and given to us in a timely manner.  Previous posts said there was no a/c, but there is a small a/c in the master bedroom upstairs that made it very comfortable.  Thanks for the wonderful stay.

The house was perfect for our family. Plenty of space for 9 people, well furnished, the kitchen upstairs has the bulk of the utensils and dishes, close to the beach, and lots of beach gear.  Some GPS navigation apps/devices might throw a fit at the address, just be persistent and creative. Samantha was great at communicating before and during the trip. This side of the island is now my favorite!

Amazing house!! Just one minute away from the east coast, I can see the sunrise in the morning. Near the North shore only 30 min from the Shark's cove and Sunset beach, the best place for snorkeling and surfing. The house has all of facilities even Monopoly! I like this house very much cuz there are not many visitors here and it is near the real beautiful viewpoints(not tourism viewpoints). Strongly recommend.

The house was more than we expected! Samantha was very timely with her responses whenever I had a question. Rooms were great and accomodated our large wedding group. Neighborhood is quiet but kept noise level down during  the evening with no complaints from neighbors. Very large master bedroom with private bathroom. The long driveway could fit at least 6 cars. Had a great time at her residence. We would stay here again!

If you need a silence space in Hawaii, Here may be the best choice. Samantha is responsible for everything. I'm not similar with American household electrical appliances. She would like to teach us more than once.
By the way, 房东是香港人可以说中文,所以交流很方便｡

Fast response is very good. The house is wide and is nearly located to famous point.
If I have chance to again visit hawaii, I want to stay samanda' rental.

房东Samantha非常友好,我们两个大家庭入住后对一些设施的使用和运行状态存在疑虑,Samantha很快就驱车赶到,并仔细向我们讲解使用方法,直到大家熟悉使用｡
房子的安全性很好,有安装cctv监控系统和闯入报警设施,即使全天在外游览也不用担心物品被窃｡
厨房设施非常齐全,妈妈们能够得心应手地施展她们的厨艺而不用担心没有趁手的工具｡房间设施均工作正常,除了空调外,其实3月的夏威夷也用不上空调｡

Samantha made us feel very welcome and the home was exactly how it was listed. Very comfortable , clean and well equipped with plently of room.  The location is great. We really enjoyed our stay and would love to come back again sometime. Samantha communicates very well and is quick to respond when contacted.

Good value for a house that will hold a lot of people. We had 14 in our group and there were plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms for all. Only a block from the beach on the north shore. Quiet local neighborhood. Host is very helpful and responsive.

We had the opportunity to check in a little earlier since there was no one staying prior to us. That also gave us the chance to meet Samantha in person and she is just as sweet in person as she is on profile. The home is very welcoming and exactly as shown in photos. We got a little lost at first only because we didn't see that it is actually located in the back. The location is very close to the beach, we walked a few times and a 7 eleven was close by so things were very convenient. We loved that it was just a few minutes away from grocery stores and other amenities. Would love to book in the future.

Samantha was great! She offered to let us check-in early and check-out later, which would have been great if we weren't already running around planning our wedding at Kualoa Ranch. The house is perfect! It fit our huge family, and it was only 20 mins away from our wedding venue. The house has 2 separate kitchens, which was perfect for 2 asian families that liked to cooked. It also has 2 separate living room areas and a ton of space. Samantha and the house were great! Will definitely stay again! Thanks Samantha!
We had a great time at Samantha's home. Everything went as planned and our family was ecstatic over the home.

My children, grandchildren & I stayed at Samantha's place in Hau'ula while we attended a family reunion in nearby Laie.  It was the perfect place, accommodating all 15 of us and we could have added a few more.  The house was very clean & Samantha provided us with various items for beach use.  Just 3 blocks away are 3 hiking trails, 1 totally paved where we ventured with all 7 young grandkids.  Later I did a more serious hike. I recommend Samantha's place if you need a place to stay for a large group of people.
Good location for north island explore, very clean and good communication.

The neighborhood was a quite family oriented neighborhood as described in the original posting.  The house was clean and well furnished for large groups.  Our group was boy scouts.  We were able to have the scouts sleep upstairs and the adults sleep downstairs.  There was also a covered carport area where the scouts were able to do some grilling even though it rained off and on while the scouts were cooking.   And a grocery store right down the road.

We had an enjoyable stay at Samantha's house, who proved to be a friendly host. It is a spacious accommodation, great for large family gatherings and the like, in a good location with easy access to many North Shore sites. There is no A/C in the house (actually, there a couple of machines but they weren't working during our stay) and it can get muggy at times, especially during the day. There is usually a breeze, but if you don't like humid conditions, and if you plan to spend a lot of time in the house and not out and about, this may not be the place for you. But overall, we'd definitely recommend this lodging.

Samantha was very responsive and friendly.  She was flexible and gave us the option of checking in a few hours early, too! The place was pretty much as described, though a few things were not working, like both A/C units, one of the microwaves, a fan downstairs...  It wasn't fancy but it was clean and the kitchen was well-stocked with cooking utensils, pots, pans, etc as well as many staples such as cooking oil etc.  Hauula was a little more isolated than I realized, (so finding places to eat took a little creativity), and the street felt a little run-down.  Overall, it was a good experience!
Samantha made sure everything went smoothly! We had an awesome time.
Great place to stay for families. Disappointed the ACs didn't work since it was so hot this weekend. location is close to the beach. We had a great time.

Loved it! Stayed here with 15 family members and had plenty of space in a wonderful home. We enjoyed a 4 night stay and were so happy to have an upstairs and downstairs living room and kitchen. Great location if you're looking for a place on the north shore.
Good location.

Host is quick on communication. We asked for an early check in and was able to give us that. The rental house was perfect as described. The only thing was the AC was not working on both units. The wires were literally cut. Luckily it was not too hot and humidity for us. The fans worked just fine. The location is near North Shore ( North-East side of the island) so if you want to do all the activities near Waikiki, expect an hour drive each way. The neighborhood is quiet as it can be, besides maybe a couple of rooster calling 5 or 6 AM in the morning. Overall a good place if you have a big family.

The house was really great there was 14 and our group. With the two separate living areas we never felt like we are on top of each other. Smith and make sure at the time of booking that we knew that there was no air conditioning which was fine. It wasn't that hot nothing that the open windows and ceiling fans can cool down. We really love the fact that the house was furnished with beach towels boogie boards and other water accessories. Would definitely recommend the house to anybody. And if you try looking it up on (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps it's not the house that you see. It's a house that is behind the one on the main road. Great house great location really close to the beach but definitely stay there again we had the chance

Samantha did a great job of contacting me regarding access to the house and also making sure there were enough blankets, etc. My family had a great time cooking dinners together and going to the beach. While Hauula is not in a touristy area, there are things to do that are very nearby, such as the Polynesian Cultural Center, shrimp trucks and shops, and numerous beautiful beaches. It was also very convenient to my home in Kaneohe, so it beat putting everyone up in Honolulu. All in all, it was a wonderful experience for everyone! Mahalo Samantha!!

Definitely a house I would rent again!!  It was nestled back away from the main road, but not to far, so it is a great place if you bring children.  Also, the house was big and roomy, and it was clean.
The host was very easy to get a hold of and worked with us. The house was good. There was no air conditioner so it got a bit hot. The house was very roomy and spacious.

Nice and clean house on the north coast. Had a family  vacation with 14 members, and the house is perfect for the big group. A lot of kitchen stuff for cooking. The host Samantha is very easy to communicate with, very helpful and nice! Would definitely recommend this house!

Place was not what we expected. Didn't have any problems, but the neighborhood doesn't look very inviting. It actually looks scary when you are driving up. There's some rooms with things you can't use. Laundry room is used more for storage. We made the mistake of not taking pictures of thar stains on the carpet and ended up being charhed to clean the carpets. We found a few roaches in the kitchen.

Great place. Samantha was more than helpful in making sure we had everything we needed. Location is perfect. Great places to eat, grocery store, and beach all very close.  We used the kitchens to cook and it was great to have plenty of hot water and laundry for our party of 16.

This place was exactly what we needed. A place for 16 people to sit and eat together and save a little bit of money. The distance from the city didn't hinder any of our expeditions as the ride allowed us to enjoy the scenery ofHawaii. Samantha was a great boast and definitely made our vacation wonderful.
Great place.   Samantha was very attentive.  Perfect for our family size.  Everything was in good working order.

Samantha was a great host. She very quick to answer questions. The house was just right for our 12 people.  It was nice having two living areas. We didn't feel crowded at all.  It was convenient having everything provided kitchen wise. It saved us lots of money being able to cook instead of going out every meal. The only down side for us was that it was very hot without air conditioning even with the windows open and the fans going and there was a rooster next door that woke us up about 3:30 every morning. That said, we would stay there again and recommend it to anyone who wants to stay on the upper East side close to great beaches, the Polynesian Cultural Center and North Shore activities. Mahalo, Samantha

House was great. Great location friendly neighborhood. Only minor problems with the house. All the air conditioning in the house had the cords cut. Water heater I think turned off during the stay but it was bearable. Overall it was a great trip.

We really enjoyed our stay here.  Accommodated 10 adults and two infants with space to spare.  Quaint authentic Hawaiian neighborhood-- felt like we lived in Hawaii rather than insulated at a resort.  Beautiful beaches close by-- our favorite was Pounders beach just a mile up the road towards Laie. Took two great hikes each just minutes from the house.  Loved the mountain backdrop!
Very Good

Samantha's home is a two story house with kitchen amenities upstairs and downstairs, 3 bedrooms on each floor, and 3 bathrooms. Washer and dryer available with 2 spacious living rooms/common rooms. A short walk to the ocean and a short drive to a beach.

Samantha was a wonderful host.  She responds to any questions or concerns  very quickly.  However, I don't think I can say quite the same for the house.  It is a relatively nice house in Hauula, yet we encountered some issues.  The bedrooms were not as clean as we thought it would be, and the floors had leftover crumbs from the previous guest.  Furthermore, some of the appliances were showing their age like the fans in the house that were broken upon our arrival.  That being said, the price you pay for the house is what you get, so I can't be overly upset about what we encountered at the house.

We really enjoyed staying at this property.  Our family of 12 and 2 babies fit really well.  There was a lot of fridge space and the house was well stocked.  We loved the fact that she has beach things available for our use. It was clean and Samantha was very responsive to my communications.  The only drawback was no air conditioning.  Especially bad in August. She does provide extra fans but it was still very warm.  Great house. We would stay here again.
We loved our time together at Samantha's home and she was quick to help with anything we asked for. If the "country" setting is what you are looking for contact Samantha and she will serve you well.

Home was super cute and very clean. This time of year is hot so no A.C. is hard but the host provides a lot of fans. The home has a great set up for families.  The home is very close to great beaches. This side of the island is much slower than Honolulu, which I love.  Thanks for a wonderful home stay.

Samantha’s home is thee perfect location if you are trying to avoid the city feel of being on this beautiful island. It’s also the perfect place to stay for families. Clean, spacious, walking distance to the beach and convenient stores. We truly enjoyed our stay and her home. She was kind, helpful, and made our stay feel like home.

Samantha was very attentive to our needs, answered quickly any questions we had. House is clean and very accomodating to a large family! Very close to beaches, right across the street. Polynesian Cultural Center 5 minutes away, supermarket and drug store and 7-11 all within 5 minute drive. Has all cooking supplies needed just add the ingredients. Beautiful scenic drive to downtown Waikiki! Would recommend if you don't want to be in all the craziness of downtown but close enough to drive to. This is the greener side of Oahu. Don't be concerned it may be misty here but when you get to Waikiki it is sunny! Beautiful mountain views! Came in in December 2017 had a wonderful time making memories!

Samantha's place was very spacious and it had many rooms. Here in Hawaii, spacious house like that for big families like ours are hard to come by at that kind of price. It's either over a thousand dollars a night "mentions" or run down place in not so safe neighborhood at an okay price range. We did have our doubts when we reserved the place but it had exceeded our expectation. The location had pros and cons. Pros were that it was near many "country" side of the island's tourist attractions such as the PCC and many beautiful beach parks along the north side of the island. The cons were that it was a quite a drive from the Waikiki and the south side of the island as it is located in north east side of the island. The house was generally a clean house. Beds were made and the kitchen was organized and bathrooms were clean. Some things in the house were old but not unusable. Samantha kept in touch with us and checked on us often. I would definitely recommend Samantha's place to my friends and families.
Samantha was a great host. Her place was clean and great for family! Thank you so much Samantha.

We loved our stay!!  The house is big and spacious and very clean.  Don't worry about the air conditioning, Sam supplies plenty of fans to move the air and the house has lots of windows to catch the island breezes.  It was the perfect house for our large family, we had enough room to be together and play games, but still have room to not be together too much.  The house is well stocked with cooking supplies and all the amenities we needed.
The location of the house is perfect.   We saw whales in the ocean just across the street from the house and monk seals also live on the beach.  We were 5 minutes from the PCC and just 15 minutes from the North Shore.  Kauloa Ranch and the Byodo-In temple are about 20 minutes south.  It takes about an hour to get to Waikiki, which can be seen as either a bonus or a drawback.  We didn't really want all the hubbub of the City so for us it was perfect.
Sam texted us everyday to make sure all was well, and we knew that if anything went awry she would be able to help.  She left a helpful list of attractions and things to see.  
We would definitely love to stay at Sam's again.  
Thank you Sam, for making our first trip to the island so very wonderful.
Mahalo!
and Aloha, until we meet again.
Overall decent place.  Samantha was quick to respond to questions.  Far from Honolulu but in a quieter area.

Awesome location and awesome host! If you have a big group this is the perfect place, especially if you want to stay away from the city and be more closer to nature.  This house is basically north shore heaven. Samantha also provides water boards and snorkeling gear to use throughout your trip. Checking in and out was very simple as well, which is a huge plus. If you want to have a good time this is the place to stay. Samantha is also available anytime you have questions or concerns which helps make a better experience for everyone. Mahalo Samantha!

We booked this listing the same day we arrived. Samantha was very communicative and kept our check-in time prompt. It’s an excellent place for a large group as we had 10+. We had 4 small kids in our group so the yard and playhouse were a great touch to keep the kids occupied. This is 50min-1hr from HNL airport, but well worth the trip and right down the street from a nice beach. Very satisfied across the board.
The house was nice for my family just make sure you respect the house and remove your shoes the house has light carpet in certain rooms and hallways
Enjoyed the stay would do it again
Clean, tidy and easy to find. Takes you away from the hustle of Honolulu and brings the feel of real island life.

Wonderful place to stay.  Private and plenty of room for a large family like ours.  We still had room for more!  Plenty of parking for all.  Had everything you would need to have away from home.  There are grocery stores a couple of blocks from home and another bigger store in Laie plus places to eat if you want to eat out.  Close to everything on island.  We were all over the island hiking, snorkeling, swimming in ocean, sightseeing, you name it we did it.

Great communication with the host. She was very quick in responding to questions. This is a good place if you have more than 14 people. We had 3 cars and they fit in the parking space. The place could use some upgrade, but it is not a big deal. Overall, my family enjoyed their stay.
Communication was great and the place was awesome.

Location is good.  Good gathering space for a large group, roomy and comfortable.  We were a group of 15 adults and 2 youths. Place is kept tidy. Need sone  updating   It is a country home in a safe snd quiet neighbourhood. Host responds quickly to your request.
Great stay, very clean. Quick responder and very spacious house.

This home is even better than advertised. We were pleasantly surprised at the amount of space, the size of the bedrooms and the common space. All you need for a great vacation is provided. Appliances, dishes, pots and pans, water toys, it is all there. If you want to get away from the traffic and hustle and bustle of the city, and want to really enjoy the North Shore and all it has to offer, then this is the place for you!. A great value!

ｸﾘｽﾏｽ時期に家族と利用しました｡
大人8人子供4人の私たちには十分な広さのお宅でした｡
特にｷｯﾁﾝが良かったです｡大きなｵｰﾌﾞﾝが鳥を丸ごと焼くのに大助かりで､
家族との食事が大いに盛り上がりました!
海外でのairbnbの利用は初めてで､不安も感じましたが､滞在中もこちらの質問(主にｺﾞﾐの捨て方)に細かいﾌｫﾛｰ連絡をくれて､親切に感じました｡
歩いて5分以内で海に行けたり､車でそれほど離れてないところにｽｰﾊﾟｰや観光施設もあり､家族が思い思いに過ごせたのも良かったです｡ﾜｲｷｷとは違うのんびりしたﾊﾜｲを楽しめました｡

We stayed for two nights. 
Samantha's house was wonderful, so comfortable, big enough for us (8adults 4kids).
We especially love the kitchen with big oven. We enjoyed cooking during our stay.
The location was also lovely. It takes 15-30 minutes to get many tourist spots by car. Supermarket was also nearby.
We had a very relaxing time. 
Thank you Samantha!
Great location!

Awesome house, you can find everything there. We were 13 people with 3 cars and 2 motorcycles and there was space more than enough. Everything was clean and ready for our stay there. I had the pleasure to meet with Samantha, she is very kind. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS HOUSE 100%.
LARGE home, a family member of mines is handicapped, so the downstairs worked well for him. The parking is quite tight, but fit 4 cars comfortably. Definitely worth the price for 16 guests

This was an awesome place that comfortably housed 13 people for a couple day trip. We enjoyed the ample space for group Gatherings as well as the fully-equipped kitchens for some good old-fashioned home cooked meals. I would definitely recommend, and hope to come back someday in the future. Much mahalo!
Wonderful host. Very fast to respond. Highly recommend this stay and this host!
Samatha was a wonderful hostess and was quick to answer any questions we had. We had a nice family gathering there.
Very peaceful area. Country living   Thanks Samantha

name: antiguo loft-barna
summary: Mi alojamiento es perfecto para parejas que quieran pasar unos días en Barcelona muy cerca del centro y de la noche nocturna.....casa antigua con encanto ... casa de piedra de hace II siglos de historia .. en esta zona de Barcelona estaba llena de fábricas y por los alrededores eran donde vivía la gente obrera está a 5 minutos  de las Ramblas... muy cerca de las playas de Barcelona
space: Es un espacio distinto a lo que se está acostumbrando, todo el espacio es de piedra natural
description: Mi alojamiento es perfecto para parejas que quieran pasar unos días en Barcelona muy cerca del centro y de la noche nocturna.....casa antigua con encanto ... casa de piedra de hace II siglos de historia .. en esta zona de Barcelona estaba llena de fábricas y por los alrededores eran donde vivía la gente obrera está a 5 minutos  de las Ramblas... muy cerca de las playas de Barcelona Es un espacio distinto a lo que se está acostumbrando, todo el espacio es de piedra natural

name: Cosy 2 bedroom apartment at Foz old town
summary: Casa de charme,com 2 quartos, localizada na zona da Foz Velha, a 400 metros do rio Douro e do mar. 2 quartos, com cama de casal, uma confortável sala de estar com lareira, sala para refeições, cozinha totalmente equipada, 2 casas de banho completas e um pátio exterior asseguram o máximo de conforto. Wi.fi e TV Cabo disponíveis e gratuitos
description: Casa de charme,com 2 quartos, localizada na zona da Foz Velha, a 400 metros do rio Douro e do mar. 2 quartos, com cama de casal, uma confortável sala de estar com lareira, sala para refeições, cozinha totalmente equipada, 2 casas de banho completas e um pátio exterior asseguram o máximo de conforto. Wi.fi e TV Cabo disponíveis e gratuitos
house_rules: É necessário respeitar a lei do ruído portuguesa pelo que, a partir das 23h, é necessário reduzir ao mínimo o ruído. Só é permitido fumar no pátio.

host.host_about:
Living in Porto for the last 40 years (-:

A huge fan of traveling and receiving people in my hometown.

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments:
Très bon séjour chez Tiago qui a "le" guide avec les meilleurs adresses du quartier et de Porto, vous n'avez qu'à le suivre. 
L'emplacement dans un quartier résidentiel et calme a été très bien pour nous qui avions une voiture, à 15 min. du centre et à quelques centaines de mètres à pied des petites plages de foz. 
Le quartier est bien desservi en bars et restaurants de qualité, si on veut éviter le bruit du centre-ville. 
Le logement correspond à la description et Tiago est très réactif pour répondre aux questions.

Tiago really was the perfect host - super responsive, very welcoming and always happy to help with any questions we had (and we had many). You could feel that he truly enjoys hosting guests! The house is a hidden gem! It is super stylish, has everything you need (and probably even more) and is in the best location and a very safe neighborhood - only 3 mins to a beautiful little park, to the ocean and the river, cute little restaurants and cafes as well as grocery stores just around the corner or a short walk away. Highly recommended!!

O espaço é espetacular. Muito amplo e bem decorado. A infraestrutura da casa é impecável. Aquecimento e água quente em abundância! Lareira na sala e no quarto, um charme de lugar.
A localização é perfeita. Fácil acesso para o centro e também para outras áreas interessantes para passear.
Restaurantes, praça, parque, pastelarias e mercados, tudo muito próximo! Nos sentimos em casa e com certeza voltaremos!
Obrigado Tiago e Lisa!

name: Large and beautiful private bedroom
summary: The perfect room for a weekend in Montreal located in the heart of the lovely Plateau. The Plateau is one of the most fun areas of Montreal, with restaurants, shops, bars, street art and cafes galore. This beautiful apartment is just a 4 min walk from Mont-Royal metro station, 10 min walk from Sherbrooke metro and an 8 minute walk from Saint-Laurent street. You're perfectly set to explore Montreal!
space: A spacious and bright apartment with wooden floors throughout, high ceilings and a large kitchen with it's own balcony. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher if you like to cook. There are two washrooms with a shower, bath and equipped with a washing and drying machine.
description: The perfect room for a weekend in Montreal located in the heart of the lovely Plateau. The Plateau is one of the most fun areas of Montreal, with restaurants, shops, bars, street art and cafes galore. This beautiful apartment is just a 4 min walk from Mont-Royal metro station, 10 min walk from Sherbrooke metro and an 8 minute walk from Saint-Laurent street. You're perfectly set to explore Montreal! A spacious and bright apartment with wooden floors throughout, high ceilings and a large kitchen with it's own balcony. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher if you like to cook. There are two washrooms with a shower, bath and equipped with a washing and drying machine. Guests have access to a private bedroom, large living room, fully equipped kitchen, balcony and two bathrooms. You'll be sharing the house with my 3 lovely roommates. They enjoy chatting to guests if that's what you're into and can give you great tips about what to do in Montreal. They all live quite busy lives though so you
access: Guests have access to a private bedroom, large living room, fully equipped kitchen, balcony and two bathrooms.
interaction: You'll be sharing the house with my 3 lovely roommates. They enjoy chatting to guests if that's what you're into and can give you great tips about what to do in Montreal. They all live quite busy lives though so you might have the house to yourself most of the time. I'm available via phone or email during your stay if you have any questions!

host.host_about: Hi I'm Joe! I've spent the last 5 years living in London, but moved to Montreal at the start of April! Here are some things I love - cycling, cooking, building stuff with javascript, playing squash, Bob Dylan etc...

reviews.comments: We booked at the last minute but Joe was a perfect host and he gave us nice advices about his fantastic neighbourhood!

Nous avons réservé en dernière minute et pris un peu Joe au dépourvu. L'appartement était pas mal en desordre mais il a tout fait pour nous donner une chambre en bon état rapidement. C'est un bel appartement bien situé, proche du métro et de plein de commerces,  la chambre est sympa au sein d'une colocation de jeunes.
Je pense qu'elle est plus indiquée pour des jeunes moins délicats que nos habitudes de quinqua. 
Merci en tous cas à Joe pour sa réactivité et son acceuil.

Joe's place is on a street that has plenty to do and is a reasonable walking distance or a quick drive from whatever you'd like to do. Lots of shops and places to eat nearby! Paid parking on the street, but there are reasonable covered parking lots that are a 20 minute walk or less away. Joe is an excellent host, would definitely recommend!

Really lovely apartment on a main street, spacious bedroom with window onto the street, comfortable mattress, everything clean and tidy—really nice for a short stay! Great emplacement in the city too, very close to station Mont Royal and in a walkable area. Hosts were friendly, clear, and communicative. Only thing to be mindful of as a potential guest is many steep exterior steps.

name: The Mini Single
space: Good things come in small packages. Our 12sqm Mini Single Suites are bite-size yet functional,packed with all the standard amenities that make Value Suites a cut above the rest. You will enjoy the Mini’s space saving design with your own bathrooms. Ideal for the single urban adventurer exploring Sydney. Dining implements to cook a meal, we have the facilities for you to self cater your stay.
description: Good things come in small packages. Our 12sqm Mini Single Suites are bite-size yet functional,packed with all the standard amenities that make Value Suites a cut above the rest. You will enjoy the Mini’s space saving design with your own bathrooms. Ideal for the single urban adventurer exploring Sydney. Dining implements to cook a meal, we have the facilities for you to self cater your stay. Please enter via our main entrance at 16 O'Riordan Street, Alexandria ValueSuites Green Square is located literary on top of Green Square Station, which is 1 stop from Central and two stops to Sydney Airport. Our Hotel is an original back-to-basics experience for the midscale market. ValueSuites focuses on the simple things that guests want: great energy, design, being connected and a genuine travel experience wrapped up in value. ValueSuites Is Simple Done Smarter. Our staff are knowledgeable & always happy to help with directions & recommendations. A short walk from The Grounds of Alexandria, Woo
neighborhood_overview: A short walk from The Grounds of Alexandria, Woolworths Supermarket.
notes: We offer complimentary Wi-Fi, local calls, Grab N’ Go morning bites, unlimited Nespresso coffee, tea and hot chocolate served daily in our coffee lounge.  Our kitchenettes are equipped with all the necessities to make your home palatable, as well as onsite laundry facilities and yes, we are 24/7.
transit: 2 Minutes walk from Green Square Station which is 1 stop from Central and two stops to Sydney Airport.

house_rules: Please note that payment by American Express, Diners, Union Pay, Visa or Mastercard are accepted. A merchant service fee of 1.3% applies to all Visa and MasterCard payments. Payments made via American Express, Diners and Union Pay will incur a 1.85% merchant service fee.  -A $100 credit card pre-authorization will be taken upon check in (standard hotel policy). - ValueSuites Green Square is strictly non-smoking. Cleaning fees and Fire Department call-out fees may apply. - Noise restrictions at unsociable hours will be enforced. -A valid photo ID will be required to be scanned matching the name on the credit card and the booking name at time of check-in.

reviews.comments: over all good service

name: Cosy Studio downtown Montréal
summary: Studio parfaitement situé à Montréal en plein Downtown: 3 stations de métro à 5 minutes (Atwater, Concordia Georges Vanier), toutes commodités et à deux pas du canal Lachine. Appartement très pratique pour 1 à 2 personnes dans un petit immeuble neuf
description: Studio parfaitement situé à Montréal en plein Downtown: 3 stations de métro à 5 minutes (Atwater, Concordia Georges Vanier), toutes commodités et à deux pas du canal Lachine. Appartement très pratique pour 1 à 2 personnes dans un petit immeuble neuf

reviews.comments: Very nice apartment for a couple who wants to stay for short term in Montreal.

name: Beşiktaş Central Fresh Villa Fully New Furnished

host.host_about:
►Hello , I'm Resul. I'm 22 , from Ankara(the capital). Studying in Galatasaray University which is located next to the Ciragan Palace.
► I worked as Manager of Erasmus Event&Trip Organization.
►Im working as Operation&Sales Coordinator at Grand Work&Travel - Foreign Education Company.
► I am too outgoing and funny person , I like sportive activities and trips ; camping , swimming , hanging out with friends and getting new friends.
►I'm Living in Beşiktaş , 1 min to Seaside + Bus Stations & Beşiktaş Square.
► I can be your guide also , to travel around the city.
► I have got 1 flat (villa with garden) ' which are airy and fully new furnished.
►The  Price per day is 59€ ; Ultra All Inclusive (bills + subscription + internet etc.)
► Minimum for 3 days renting.

reviews.comments:
Les photos n’ont absolument rien à voir avec le logement 
À fuir !

name: The Avenue ft Pool & Gym
summary: Beautiful and cozy studio located in the heart of wanchai. 2 min walk to the MTR station (wanchai Exit D). 1 king size bed, 2 balconies ,small kitchen, fancy bathroom...studio with everything that you can expect in a luxury hotel and feel like home at the the same time :) Fully furnished studio  25th floor  Extremely private studio with 2 balconies,Bose surround sound speaker  fully equipped kitchen ,refrigerator with freezer, in room washer, A/C,need to pay gym room ,swimming pool at clubhouse
description: Beautiful and cozy studio located in the heart of wanchai. 2 min walk to the MTR station (wanchai Exit D). 1 king size bed, 2 balconies ,small kitchen, fancy bathroom...studio with everything that you can expect in a luxury hotel and feel like home at the the same time :) Fully furnished studio  25th floor  Extremely private studio with 2 balconies,Bose surround sound speaker  fully equipped kitchen ,refrigerator with freezer, in room washer, A/C,need to pay gym room ,swimming pool at clubhouse Downstairs to Highend Shopping Area and Restaurants 2 minute walk from Ophelia and other popular bars Heart of Wanchai, 2 Mins to Wanchai MTR exit D
neighborhood_overview: Downstairs to Highend Shopping Area and Restaurants 2 minute walk from Ophelia and other popular bars
transit: Heart of Wanchai, 2 Mins to Wanchai MTR exit D
house_rules: Apartment should be in same state of cleanliness which they got while check In when they leave the apartment

address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: I love this place. It is located in a nice neighborhood, and it's very close to the metro train station. Highly recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good location near subway and convenient with luggage.
Cleanliness needs more improvement.. other than that it’s all good especially the view. Love it the most !

Would not recommend staying here, too dirty (giant poop stain in toilet, hair shaving and grime over sink, wet bathroom mat, lots of food crumbs, pillow had a smell).

Really good location though.

name: Close to Ala Moana Shopping Center, Hotel room, 2 beds
space: A daily hospitality fee of 20USD plus tax per night is required at check-in. Price not inclusive of Hawaii State GET and TAT of 14.962%, collected at check in. Lobby/reception accessible via stairs only. The Paniolo is a charming boutique Honolulu hotel located on Waikīkī’s “Upper West Side” where you will find an abundance of restaurants, easy access to one of the world’s largest shopping malls, a quick stroll to the beach and gorgeous sunset views. This Honolulu Hotel is Waikīkī’s only “North Shore connection,” as the ownership company also manages a magnificent 100-acre stretch of completely unspoiled beachfront property along O‘ahu’s North Shore. This is the home of the Hawai‘i Polo Club where polo matches, polo lessons and spectacular trail rides become available to hotel guests. We encourage our guests to make the beautiful drive to the hotel’s sister property on the North Shore for a day of riding, picnicking, swimming or beachcombing.

neighborhood_overview: Da HI Brew Café and Paniolo Bar located in the lobby. Café by day, smooth saloon at night, join us at Da HI Brew and Paniolo Bar for the best libations and unique creations. DA HI BREW Open from 6:30 am to 2:00 pm Enjoy Hand-crafted Artisan Coffee and Tea made with Love and Aloha at Da Hi Brew, located in the heart of Waikiki’s Upper West Side at the lobby of the Equus Hotel. THE PANIOLO BAR Open from 2:00 p.m. to 10:00pm The Paniolo is a gathering place for hotel guests as well as for other Waikiki visitors, locals, and visitor industry employees who are looking for creative drinks and a relaxed gathering place. The lounge’s design is by Becca Dailey, who has won awards for her work in the hotel. In addition to bar stools sporting saddles, there will be poolside and cabana seating for approximately 30 guests. Kelly Jeffers, well-known for his creative libations as Bar Manager at Mud Hen Water in Kaimuki, serves as Beverage Consultant. With his expertise, the creative concoctions utili
notes: Valet parking available at $28 per day.
access: Room and Hotel Amenities: Daily Housekeeping Complimentary welcome beverage/cocktail High-Speed Wi-Fi Refrigerator Pillow Top Beds Handmade Italian Mascioni Duvet Comforters Flat Screen LCD HDTV Clock/Radio with iPod Port Direct Dial Telephone Keurig Coffee Maker Ultra Quiet Split-Air Systems Earth Tempo Amenities Hair Dryer Iron & Ironing Board In-Room Safe
interaction: Front desk open 24 hours.
house_rules: No smoking No pets

host.host_about: Enjoy the last family owned and operated boutique hotel in Waikiki!

reviews.comments: Lovely place. It’s nice and cute, perfect for two friends. Nice size bedroom.
近所にｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞﾓｰﾙもあり､立地は良かったと思いますが､室内は､暗い感じでした｡
My favorite choice in Waikiki!

name: Sunny Apartment right on the beach in North Bondi
summary: Sunny north facing apartment directly on  the beach in North Bondi. Amazing location, we are on the first level so its literally a few footsteps to the beach. 2 bedrooms (1 x master bedroom and 1 x 2nd smaller bedroom), polished wooden floorboards,  bathroom (with bath + shower) and fully equipped kitchen.  Organic grocer, laundromat, bus station, gym, yoga studio, great cafes, bars and restaurants 1min walk.  Everyone in the building is very friendly, it's a nice community vibe.
space: North facing, amazing beachside location.  Bathroom with bath & shower. Detachable hand held shower head with great water pressure. Dedicated desk and workspace with wifi throughout the apartment. 2 bedrooms. 1x master bedroom with queen bed and 1 x smaller bedroom with double bed. The 2nd bedroom has an adjoining door to master bedroom so this feature is great if you are family with child.

neighborhood_overview: North Bondi Fish (bar / restaurant) is across the road and one of the best places to watch sunset in bondi.  3 doors down is Porch n Parlour cafe - amazing food and coffee with a view of the beach. For coffee Bru and Speedos are also very good with views of bondi. Accross the road there is a public outdoor gym right on the beach accross the rd as well as a private indoor gym with views of the beach. 1min walk to north bondi barber, pharmacy, organic grocer / general store, laundromat, yoga studio and all north bondi bars and cafes. 5min walk to the famous Icebergs and all the shops and restaurants in Central and South Bondi beach.
notes: Great water pressure in shower
transit: 1min walk from North Bondi bus station and across the road from a bus stop. Uber X and Uber Pool are also very cheap options for getting around
access: Entire Apartment
interaction: I will be overseas for most of the time but will be available on messenger and email.  There will be a lock box with key for self check in or a friend of mine will greet you and let you in. Let me know which you prefer and I will accommodate.
house_rules: Quiet time after 10pm, no parties or smoking please

host.host_about:
Relaxed and friendly Australian.

I’m a freelancer in the creative industry that loves traveling, music, art, photography, yoga, cooking and being by the beach . 

I grew up in Sydney, Australia and love to chill in my home in North Bondi when I’m not traveling. 

Non smoker.

:-)

reviews.comments: This place is very well located in Bondi. Suits for 4 peoples easy, good value for money. Cassandra is very communicative and will provide what you need. I definitely recommend this place.
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: 'The Dunes' Luxury 2 Bed Beach Guesthouse Cronulla
summary: A NEW 2 bedroom private designer guesthouse with its own access, minutes to the beaches of Greenhills, Elouera & Cronulla. Situated under the iconic 'Wanda Sand Dunes' in a quiet residential suburb, the position of the apartment is an outdoors and nature lovers dream. A 3 minute drive or 20 min walk will have you at the trendy cafes, bars & restaurants of the famous surf village of Cronulla. At ‘The Dunes’ you can escape, unwind and enjoy the coastal lifestyle in absolute comfort and privacy.
space: An immaculate ground floor 62 square metre guesthouse apartment with an open plan living/ dining room that leads into a 'chefs' caesar stone kitchen. This guesthouse is set up specifically for air b n b guests meaning that there are no personal belongings in here and it really is your own place. Two spacious bedrooms and a great size bathroom ensure there is plenty of room for all guests. Ideally suits a couple, two couples, singles or a family of four. Decorated in contemporary coastal colours 'The Dunes' has porcelain tiling, luxurious soft carpets and is beautifully styled for that perfect relaxing get away.  Accommodation  Spacious living/dining area - Large lounge, comfy cushions, 4 seater wooden dining table with chairs, a 55 inch Ultra Definition 4k SMART TV with unlimited  access to Netflix, celling fan Designer Kitchen - Westinghouse oven, hob, microwave, large fridge/freezer, Breville kettle & toaster appliances, Nespresso Latissima coffee machine, ample storage Master Bedroo
description: A NEW 2 bedroom private designer guesthouse with its own access, minutes to the beaches of Greenhills, Elouera & Cronulla. Situated under the iconic 'Wanda Sand Dunes' in a quiet residential suburb, the position of the apartment is an outdoors and nature lovers dream. A 3 minute drive or 20 min walk will have you at the trendy cafes, bars & restaurants of the famous surf village of Cronulla. At ‘The Dunes’ you can escape, unwind and enjoy the coastal lifestyle in absolute comfort and privacy. An immaculate ground floor 62 square metre guesthouse apartment with an open plan living/ dining room that leads into a 'chefs' caesar stone kitchen. This guesthouse is set up specifically for air b n b guests meaning that there are no personal belongings in here and it really is your own place. Two spacious bedrooms and a great size bathroom ensure there is plenty of room for all guests. Ideally suits a couple, two couples, singles or a family of four. Decorated in contemporary coastal colours 'T
neighborhood_overview: The unique thing about Greenhills Beach is it’s spectacularly beautiful and convenient setting. A relaxed coastal neighbourhood surrounded by 90 hectares of national park and water but it is only a couple of minutes into the heart of bustling vibrant Cronulla. Greenhills Beach has a beautiful sea breeze,  it has a boardwalk lake full of ducks and lots of walking tracks around. A 15- 20 minute walk to the viewing platform at the top of the iconic sand dunes is a must as you can view the whole of Bate Bay into Cronulla and the Sydney CBD. If you are feeling up to it, walk at the edge of the water to pristine Boat Harbour and back or along the whole length of Bate Bay (4kms) . There are so many things to see, do and experience in the local area.  From The Dunes Guest Apartment:  Walk into Cronulla along the Esplanade - 20 mins  Swim in the Cronulla, Shelly Beach or Oak Park rock/ sea pools - 3-8 mins drive  Drive and park at Boat Harbour (4WD and subject to park fees) Get a coffee at Bian
notes: Included: Bedding, house towels (please do not take to the beach), tea, coffee, milk for hot drinks, salt, pepper, cooking oil, shampoo, toothpaste, toilet paper and household cleaning products. Please make sure you read the house rules. There is absolutely no smoking allowed inside or outside the guesthouse. We kindly ask you to treat this guest apartment the same way you would treat your own home and clean up to the best of your ability before your departure. NOTE: There is a  minimum 2 night stay Please note: There is no pool, no outdoor area for kids to run around, only small outdoor seating area in laneway path at side of apartment. There is a community deck/ pond area nearby and Wanda playpark 8 minute walk away.
transit: Sydney Airport 25-35 mins in car  Walk home from Cronulla along the Esplanade - 20 mins  Cronulla and Wooloware train stations - 20 mins walk or 5 mins drive Sydney CBD 35 - 45 mins on train Uber and Taxis - very easy to get
access: The guesthouse apartment is self-contained and it has been described as 'like your own personal home away from home'. It is attached to the main house but we enter our premises from the other side of the block. Guests have exclusive use of a side path at the front (right side) of the property. There is street parking space directly outside the black gate in front of your access path which is always available. There are additional public street parking spaces in the street. Guests have unlimited access to Wifi and guests must agree not to use it for illegal uploading, downloading, or other illegal activities (air b n b disclaimer).
interaction: I am around occasionally but mostly I am contactable by my mobile if you have any queries or need assistance. If I miss your call, leave a message or text me and I will do my best to get back to you as soon as possible.
house_rules: No extra guests are permitted in or to stay in the guesthouse without prior consent, thank you. No pets inside or outside please. NO Smoking or Vaping Rule. This premises inside and out is absolutely no smoking. If this policy is not adhered to and if there is a smell of smoke in the apartment, there is a fine of up to $500. The smoke alarms will be triggered if they detect smoking inside the apartment and the homeowner will be alerted. Strict no Party or Drugs Rule - this is a beautiful, quiet part of the world, so please be respectful towards the neighbours and keep the noise to an acceptable level, especially between 10pm and 8am. So please no exceptionally loud music.  If you have visitors please ensure that they observe the House Rules. Please look after the keys, replacement of keys will result in $30 from security deposit. If any of the house rules are broken as per Air b n b Policy the homeowner can cancel the booking straightaway and guests will be asked to leave immediately.

host.host_about: I love my family, travel, the ocean and helping others.

reviews.comments: Erin’s Airbnb is exactly like the photos it’s clean and stylish and so easy to check in. Such a beautiful Airbnb if you’re looking for a home away from home this Airbnb is the one you’d want to book!

My family loved staying at Erin's place. The place is beautifully styled, pristine clean, and in short proximity to Wanda beach and the sand dunes. Perfect for a beach get away. Couldn't recommend Erin's place highly enough! 5 stars!
We LOVED our stay! Location was incredible and the place itself was immaculate. Will definitely be staying again next time we are in Sydney! Everything we needed and more.

Erin was such a good host, easy check in and provided lots of little extras. Good location close to beach and shops. Immaculately presented with super comfy beds and great entertainment such as Netflix and wifi. I would Highly recommend The Tides Beach apartment

A very  quiet location.. a beautiful tidy and well presented studio apartment. 
So close to the beach! Host was easy to get in touch with, and most helpful. 
Would definately stay here again.
Very clean and well set out, you dont need to bring anything. A good location only minutes from eating places.

Thank you Erin for an absolutely incredible stay! We loved your place, it was very modern, stylish, impeccably clean.  We were very comfortable and felt we had privacy too. The apartment had all the facilities we needed. Thank you again for the nice additional touches. We loved staying, it was very convenient and if there is ever another opportunity to come back to Cronulla in the future we would stay again. Highly recommend.

Five star! Clean, fresh and beautifully styled. We had absolutely everything we needed. Wish we could have stayed longer. Excellent location, perfect host and communication. Would stay here again.

I would highly recommend this accommodation to anyone!
Erins place is super nice with great hospitality.
Lovely place to stay. Absolutely immaculate throughout! Would highly recommend ❤️

Loved our stay was the perfect girls pad and was so clean! Great beds and pillows which was awesome being pregnant! We honestly had a really nice stay and felt at Right at home when we didn’t want to go out.
Super clean and comfortable, with great amenities, my family enjoyed staying at Erin’s place.
Spotlessly clean and modern accommodation not far from the beach. Quiet location and ideal for getting away from the hustle and bustle but only a short drive to shops and cafes etc.
Beautifully presented space with comfy beds. Beach is a couple of minutes walk and so many things to do and see within a short drive.
Very thoughtful host - providing both a porta-cot and a high chair for my little one...made the stay all that more simpler and easier.

Erin's place was great! The location was fantastic, the place was incredibly clean and tidy and provided everything we needed. Erin was easy to communicate with and very thorough in her information which was helpful. We'd definitely stay here again :)

name: Spacious 1 bedroom, prime location.
summary: In the heart of NYC.  A modern, door man building. A tastefully furnished yet comfortable feel NYC apt. Sleeps 2. Centrally located.
space: Located in the heart of Hells Kitchen. One of NYC's premier neighborhoods. Steps to 9th and 10th Avenues and minutes from the Broadway theaters and NYC's finest restaurants. Be in the hub of it all. Truly spacious one bedroom apartment. The apartment is fully stocked, great kitchen, dining table that seats four.  Large living room and a generous size bedroom with ample closet space. Wifi, cable, heat and central a/c.  Expect to be in a great neighborhood. Plenty of restaurants to chose form and night life is great! You can be anywhere in minutes. Several subway lines are close. A,C,E,1,2,3 lines are a short walk away.
