No more then 2 People can stay here. That is the maximum.  -NO over night guests are allowed.  -NO Parties or gatherings at all.  -NO pets.  -NO smoking.  -If you finish something please replace.  -Respect my neighbors, Respect my property.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: from NYC. Lots of interests.

reviews.comments:
We were really happy with Alex's apartment, it was very clean and apart from a hairdryer and iron, it had everything we needed. Alex did offer to reimburse me if I bought a hairdryer but as the apartment was warm, wet hair dried fairly fast on it's own!

Regarding the location, the area was nice and felt safe to walk at night. Theaters are very close by, as are many restaurants and convenience shops. Time Square is about a 10 min walk.

Alex was a helpful host and was always extremely responsive to questions asked both before and during our stay. Although he was away the weekend we stayed, the key collection was straight forward and I felt I could contact him at any time. He also left some restaurant recommendations which made our first night quite easy and it was tasty. 

I would definitely recommend Alex's apartment as a great place for staying in NY.

Great experience at Alex's place. It was very much as advertised. 
I loved that it was close by to all the action yet far enough away from
the crowds. The comfort of the bed was important to me having done 
so much flying.....   it was first rate.
Its obvious that Alex cares for his space and wants those who stay there
to enjoy it also.
I would stay here again without hesitation 
Matt

Alex was GREAT.  His place was WONDERFUL.  We had a BLAST.  Can't wait to do it again!!!  Location was perfect.  We took it all in.  Our only regret was not being able to meet Alex.  We will do it next time.  Thx Alex, it was everything we expected and more...  See ya soon..

Alex's apartment was in a great spot with short walking distance taking you to many restaurants,  bars and Times Square. The street was quite and seemed safe.  Safe enough that I would walk home most nights.  The apartment has everything you might need.  It was clean and comfortable.  I would recommend anyone stay at Alex's apartment.

We stayed in Alex's apt for 10 days and had an amazing time! We felt like we were coming home at the end of each day. The home is clean, very quiet and very comfortable. Having AC was a plus as it got hot and muggy in the middle of August. The neighborhood is awesome, we loved all the nearby restaurants (especially Anejo) and the bars (especially The Pony Bar and On The Rocks). There are a couple deli/convenience stores that stay open 24 hours very close by as well.  We felt very safe walking home, often in the middle of the night. It's nice having doormen in the building as well. Times Square is a short 10 min walk. The subway stations are the same. Alex was very communicative and available for any questions. We appreciated his recommendations and he made us feel welcomed. Would recommend Alex's apt highly! Wish we were still there!

We didn't meet Alex but communicating with him was easy, he responded immediately before our stay and sent text messages every couple of days to check all was well. Collecting the keys from the doorman worked perfectly and Alex had left useful information in the flat.
The area is busy and there is a lot of construction work going on but the building itself is lovely, doormen are always there so it is safe and secure. We were never disturbed by noise from outside or inside the apartment, it is moments away from the hustle and bustle of 10th Avenue but it was very peaceful once inside the building. 
The apartment is lovely too, very spacious well furnished and equipped- it was just like home which was wonderful when returning from a busy sightseeing day!
The location is great, not pretty exactly but so interesting and safe, near to many restaurants and bars and only 10 minutes away from subways.
Some places we enjoyed are: Bubby's at the Meatpacking end of the High Line, The Jolly Monk ( a Belgian Bar and Grill) on the corner of 47th and 9th, Times Square Diner (great for breakfast- they will swap potatoes for a bowl of berries!) it's not actually on Times Square, it's between 48th and 49th on 8th Ave.
We had a wonderful stay in Alex's delightful apartment, the photos and description don't fully do it justice, we would definitely stay again if he'd have us!

We could not have picked a better place to stay on our first visit to New York. Alex was a fantastic host and was very easy to contact. The apartment looks exactly as pictured. It is clean, spacious, comfortable, and very convenient to subway lines and Times Square. We would definitely stay here again!
Alex always answered my e-mails quickly and solved all my issues.

We had an amazing stay at Alex's. He communicated w/us via email, text & telephone, fast responses and super nice!  We didn't get to meet him, but the doorman gave us a key. 5th floor apartment, looked exactly like the pictures. It was very comfortable, clean and homey. The queen size bed was comfortable and bathroom shower was awesome, super hot water, great water pressure (that's important to me lol) the doormen were very polite. It was a safe area. About 11 minutes away from time square (walking) and we hopped on the trains for everything! (I suggest getting an unlimited train and bus pass for however long you're in the city.) Some great restaurants we really enjoyed in the area were pio pio (Spanish food), becco (Italian) & a small deli called skyline gourmet deli. Overall great place, safe area, close to everything and great communication with Alex.

I have used airbnb numerous times and this was the best experience, by far. Al was the greatest host, calling to make sure all was well, etc and my only disappointment was not meeting him personally. Picking up the key was a breeze and the neighborhood was nice and quiet. Apartment is much bigger then pictured and I appreciated the coffee maker and toaster for breakfast. Can*t say enough good things.
Nice and clean apt with everything you need. Really love the location!

Al is an amazing host who answers all questions immediately. The apartment could not be any better. Its clean, beautiful, huge for two persons, and features everything you need - maybe even more. Full kitchen, super bathroom, nice TV set, fast Internet, cozy bed, A/C and so much more. All administrative stuff worked perfectly smooth (key from doorman, etc.) and the location is even better than expected. We walked in about 10-15 mins. to the subway, 20 mins. to Times Square, 10-15 mins. to Intrepid, and even locations as Central Park or High Line and Chelsea Market are possible walking distances if you are a little used to moving your legs. Alternatively, you can always get a fast connection to all major spots via subway. We will definitely come back and book with Al's if possible. Thanks a lot Al!!

Alex was a very attentive host.  He always responded quickly to my questions.  The appartment was perfect for us and presented better then in the photos on the site.  Perfect for 2 people who wants to be centrally located.

Al could not have been a better host - he met me for the key handover ceremony and left a welcome pack in the apartment that provided helpful information about the apartment and the area. The apartment itself was as described and was clean, airy, comfortable and well equipped - it really was a home away from home. The location was superb, I've visited NYC many times but hadn't explored Hell's Kitchen much and so this gave me the perfect opportunity - I found the area quiet, safe and convenient. There are so many great bars and restaurants within walking distance and you're only about 10 minutes' walk to the Theatre District and Times Square - very handy! I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Nice apartment, better than the pics. Clean.  Great location. Al was helpful every time!
This was perfect: nice appartment, very clean, with everything you need, quiet place, safe building, convenient location. I definitely recommend the place and i will go back! Thank you Al.

Al's apartment is very comfortable and he was hospitable, trying in their own way to make our stay as comfortable as possible so all was perfect: good comunivation, nice appartment, very clean, quiet place, safe building and perfect location. I definitely recommend the place. Thank you Al.
The apartment was just as described. Clean and organizes. We had an amazing time there, the neighborhood is nice. Al was very nice with us on all requests. I recommend for sure the apartment.

Al's apartment is exremely spacious for NYC, what you get is exactly as shown in the pictures.

Al provided us with all the information we needed and would always reply to messages quickly. Getting access to the property was simple and Al had everything sorted for us when we arrived including fresh towels, toiletries and landry cards.

The apartment is in a fantastic location! You can literally walk to times square and the rockerfeller centre in 10mins. If you want (as we did) you can also easily walk to Empire State Building, Grand Central Station, Central Park, etc. We only used the metro to go either up or downtown or across to another borough.

Great location for people looking to get a real feel for New York, close enough to be part of the action. But also far enough away from tourist central to make it much more enjoyable.

Would highly recommend this apartment. Location was excellent for someone wanting to see the city. Walking distance to most things. Al was very easy to deal with. Very responsive with any questions we had while booking etc. Was my first time using Air B and B but won't be my last based on this experience. Thanks again for everything Al.

très bel appartement idéalement situé 
pourvu du necéssaire dans une rue à la fois calme et proche de mid-town..
alex est décontracté dans son approche de la location
nous y reviendrons avec plaisir..

Great place in Hell's Kitchen! Spacious and clean apartment, safe neighborhood, walking distance to many restaurants. 10 min walk to Times Square and other tourist attractions. Al was easy to work with, great communication and easy pick up/drop off key transfer.

Great place, clean and spacious! Alex is very quick response and help to solve any questions as much as possible 
Definitely recommended

What a lovely apartment; just what me and my girlfriend needed for our 10 day stay in Manhattan! 

The apartment is brilliant with lots of space, a very comfy living space with a great big TV, good AC, great water temperature/pressure in the bathroom and quite a big kitchen space (which helped us save some money as we had breakfasts in most mornings and dinner in once or twice).

The local area (Hell's Kitchen) was great; only 2 blocks from the Hudson River which provided us with a lovely summer walk down past all the piers; a short walk from Midtown; and close to lots of bars/cafes/delis. There is also a laundrette right on the corner which provided a drop-off service that we used one day.

Al was very helpful and communicative; check-in and out was very simple and he had left us plenty of info on WiFi, local recommendations etc.

L appartement est spacieux ,très bien situé(restaurants à proximité ),non loin de time square et des éventuelles (Website hidden by Airbnb) est aussi calme et c est appréciable après une une journée de visite!! La communication avec al se fait par téléphone et il répond toujours rapidement.super semaine grace à cet appartement.merci al! Je recommande vivement cette location et si je reviens à New (Website hidden by Airbnb) veux loger ici!

Al è stato un ospite molto attento a tutte le nostre richieste e veloce nel rispondere. La casa è esattamente come nelle foto: consiglio ad Al di mettere più immagini perché la sua casa è veramente molto bella ed accogliente. Quando tornerò a NY o verranno amici o i miei figli spero che Al possa ospitarci. Grazie ancora!

Al’s place was perfect. The two of us that stayed there for the 8 nights couldn’t have complained about a thing. Al was amazing and very easy to communicate with. The apartment was very clean and tidy.. and the doormen to the apartment block added that element of security! Would highly recommend this place to anyone who’s looking to come to NY. The location is so close to everything - close enough to be around the hustle and bustle of Times Square and also far enough away to have some time out! Everything in walking distance. Loved this place!!!!

Al’s place is great. He is a wonderful host and very attentive. Responses were quick and he provided us with everything we needed to feel like we were living in New York for the time that we were there. The neighborhood is surprisingly quiet being as close as it is to the hustle and bustle of Times Square making it a great location. We would definitely return. 

Thanks Al.

Al’s place is amazing. So close to the bustle, yet so peaceful at night. Close to Times Square, Broadway and Hell’s kitchen!! The apartment is comfortable and beautifully decorated. Everything was exactly as advertised on Airbnb. Al’s response and communication was quick and check in and out was effortless. Don’t snooze on this one if you’re planning a trip to New York

Al’s place was fantastic! Quiet, nice interior, spacious, very close to the theater district, subway, 5th Avenue... Al was quick to respond with helpful insights to the city. With the 24/7 doorman the building was sure to be safe. Had awesome ten days and hoping to return sometime soon! We can highly recommend!
Nice and cozy apartment! Location is great - 10 min walk to Broadway, Times Square, Pier 83 and subway. A lot of good restaurants, great bakery and grocery shops around.
Super expérience ! Un portier qui peut nous accueillir 24/24, Al toujours très réactif, un appart hyper bien placé et nickel : il a surpassé toutes nos attentes ! Allez-y sans hésiter :)
Great apartment in an excellent location for sightseeing. Would stay again, very good communication with host. Many thanks Al.

name: The Lilikoi Inn
summary: The Lilikoi Inn is situated on three unspoiled acres of lush Kona coffee country on the west side of Hawaii's 'Big Island'. All of our rooms come complete with a private bathroom, wireless Internet access, cable television, and a private entrance.
space: Each room comes with access to our relaxing hot tub, a convenient laundry area, as well as our newly remodeled gourmet guest kitchen. We serve all meals on our beautiful lanai (Hawaiian covered porch), which has expansive views of the world-famous Kona Coast. Additionally, the property has an abundance of lilikoi (the Hawaiian word for passion fruit), bananas, avacados, grapefruit and other tropical treats which guests are welcome to pick!
description: The Lilikoi Inn is situated on three unspoiled acres of lush Kona coffee country on the west side of Hawaii's 'Big Island'. All of our rooms come complete with a private bathroom, wireless Internet access, cable television, and a private entrance. Each room comes with access to our relaxing hot tub, a convenient laundry area, as well as our newly remodeled gourmet guest kitchen. We serve all meals on our beautiful lanai (Hawaiian covered porch), which has expansive views of the world-famous Kona Coast. Additionally, the property has an abundance of lilikoi (the Hawaiian word for passion fruit), bananas, avacados, grapefruit and other tropical treats which guests are welcome to pick!  Shai and Trina are originally from the San Francisco Bay Area where they ran a bustling Cafe and Catering company for over 25 years. Upon their move to Hawaii's 'Big Island', they discovered the tranquil artist's village of Holualoa, nestled just above the larger town of Kailua-Kona. With perfect weather a
interaction: Shai and Trina are originally from the San Francisco Bay Area where they ran a bustling Cafe and Catering company for over 25 years. Upon their move to Hawaii's 'Big Island', they discovered the tranquil artist's village of Holualoa, nestled just above the larger town of Kailua-Kona. With perfect weather and serene tropical surroundings, they knew that it was unfair to keep their new home all to themselves, so they look forward to welcoming you with a cup of Kona coffee - grown just outside your door!  Shai is a trained chef with a broad range of culinary talent. Having lived and traveled in Brazil, Israel and Thailand, Shai combines his love of food from these regions with his creativity, to prepare sumptuous daily breakfasts, gourmet dinners or picnic lunches fit for any occasion - a very special treat, so let him know if you're interested while you're here.  Along with food, Trina & Shai have a passion for languages. Shai speaks five and Trina teaches part time language classes in S

host.host_about:
We live in Hawaii 10 years now and love it! I teach while Shai watches the farm and  bed and breakfast. I also sing in the local choir, snorkel and swim!
we know so many great spots to snorkel and hike , we love to share this with our guests. We look forward to meeting people from all over the world!

reviews.comments: Nice private area.  They accommodated me at the last minute.  Welcomed with a smile and showed us around the property and walked us to the room.  They made sure we had everything we needed.  Great place if you want to be in a secluded area.

Our stay at the Lilikoi in was excellent. I can't speak highly enough about Trina and Shai. They are extremely personable and helpful hosts and their property is everything one could want in a B&B. Our room was a great size, clean and comfortable with the perfect amount of island charm. The property is beautifully secluded with amazing views out to the water. Breakfast was plentiful and delicious, and we were lucky enough to enjoy coffee they grow, harvest and roast on site! We will definitely be returning to this gem.

We were so fortunate to book a room at the Lilikoi Inn at the last minute! We were greeted by Shai who cheerfully showed us our beautiful room and the lovely grounds, then surprised us with delicious smoothies made from the organic fruit grown on the property. Our room was comfortable and although it had the best view of the ocean, we really couldn't see it through the lush vegetation. The next morning we had a delicious breakfast made by chef Shai and served by Trina. Breakfast included yummy coffee from their own gardens. The Inn is even better than described in the listing. There is a secluded hot tub and outdoor shower that we did not see mentioned in the listing. The hosts were extremely warm and friendly. Be sure to let them know ahead of time if you have any dietary restrictions. Enjoy your stay in paradise!
Trina and Shai were wonderful hosts, full of Aloha spirit, and very accommodating. Their B&B is located in the beautiful cool air above Kona, with a wonderful view.

Wonderful host, fabulous location, warm welcome, clean and comfortable room, delicious breakfast.  We could not have hoped for a better experience.  Our flight arrived late at night, but we were very warmly welcomed and made to feel at home from the moment we arrived. Aloha and Mahalo!

Wir wurden sehr herzlich mit einem Getränk, einem Snack und einem netten Gespräch empfangen. 
Das Zimmer ist wunderschön und das Frühstück ungewöhnich und ausgezeichnet. 
Wir haben mit Trina und den anderen Gästen sehr angeregt geplaudert. So stelle ich mir Bed & Breakfast vor!
The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Trina and Shai were wonderful hosts, always ready to help with itinerary planning, giving driving directions, suggesting restaurants and shopping. They were generous hosts too, sharing the wonderful fruits grown on the property and free-range chicken eggs freely. The breakfasts were creative and plentiful, lots of fresh fruit, followed by interesting and delicious dishes that flowed from their well-traveled and catering experiences. Their special qualities are complimented by the fabulous home in the coffee-growing hills overlooking Kona bay, where you can lounge on the lanai with a glass of wine (or fruit juice) and watch the sun set and feel the scented cool breeze caressing your sunburnt skin. It's paradise in paradise.

Shai was friendly and helpful. Loved the breakfasts on the lanais overlooking kona. Sunsets were beautiful! Rooms were clean, comfortable.  Able to use kitchen common to other guests to store our food, fruit. Loved visiting Shai's coffee field and fruit trees below the inn. His home- grown avocados were the biggest we've ever seen! Shai greeted us with a delicious papaya /banana smoothie and some avocado w bread. This was so welcomed after a long day of traveling and hiking! There are cool breezes at the inn all day as you are up high in mountain above Kona. Very quiet at night. Driveway steep, but paved. Very nice experience.

Trina and Shai were so welcoming and gracious.  Breakfast each morning was a trip around the world with culinary treats.  Enjoyed being up overlooking the ocean and cooler nights.  Getting up to the house was a challenge on the steep, narrow road but such a treasure hidden in the hills. Looking forward to returning some day.

We really enjoyed our stay! This place is about 15 to 20 minutes outside of Kona which for us meant a nice distance from all the tourist madness. Trina and her husband were delightful hosts, serving delicious (and ample) breakfasts made with ingredients grown on their farm and offering tips on local hikes and activities. A great place to enjoy the big island!

You'll be treated just like family at the Lilikoi Inn. Fantastic breakfasts made with ingredients from their own farm, and a healthy dose of activity suggestions each day will make sure you get the most out of your stay in Kona country.

Shai and Trina are a wonderful couple, who will go above and beyond to make sure your time on the island is much better than expected.  Their place is amazing and third tips, about the Island, are even better.  Highly recommend staying with them, especially if you want to enjoy a bit more local experience.

A wonderful, charming gem nested in the Kona hills, the beauty and serenity of the Lilikoi Inn is something very special indeed. The breakfasts are lovely and artfully prepared And  Trina and Shai are so warm and welcoming, adding to the great experience we had there.

Gorgeous location, amazing fresh fruit available plus home cooked breakfast! Great hosts with local tips. Hard to find, especially at night, but Shy gave us good directions over the phone and met us in person to make sure we found our way. The driveway is very steep and long - a little intimidating. We wish we'd have had more nights to stay there. The rooms were not very sound proof, so we did hear other guests and the rosters crowing in the morning, not recommended for very light sleepers.

Lovely setting uphill in Kona, with coffee trees and birds. Shai & Trina are very friendly hosts with a wealth of local knowledge. Being greeted with a smoothie (made with fruits grown on site) at 11 pm was excellent!

name: Chambre privée ds immense appart! metro Jean-Talon
summary: Allo! Bienvenu chez nous! Notre appart est un grand 8 1/2. On est 2 colocs avec 2 chambres airbnb (partir de fin aout, on sera 3 colocs et 1 chbre airbnb). On est du monde bien sympathique entre 21 et 29 ans. On s'adapte tres bien aux nouvelles personnes :)
space: Ce qui rend notre appart unique c'est sa taille qui surprend toujours et sa luminosité. Il y a des fenêtres dans toutes les pièces, même dans les placards. 2 de nos placards on des puits de lumière haha!
description: Allo! Bienvenu chez nous! Notre appart est un grand 8 1/2. On est 2 colocs avec 2 chambres airbnb (partir de fin aout, on sera 3 colocs et 1 chbre airbnb). On est du monde bien sympathique entre 21 et 29 ans. On s'adapte tres bien aux nouvelles personnes :) Ce qui rend notre appart unique c'est sa taille qui surprend toujours et sa luminosité. Il y a des fenêtres dans toutes les pièces, même dans les placards. 2 de nos placards on des puits de lumière haha! Dans l'appart toutes les pièces sont communes hormis les chambres. On a 2 beaux balcons. Idéal si vous êtes fumeur. On a tous une vie occupée, ouverts à la discussion lorsqu'on est à l'appart et que l'ouverture est réciproque :) Le quartier est vraiment super! On s'y sent en sécurité et tout est accessible. Autour de chez nous il y a des restaurants, bars, boulangeries, crèmerie, banques, piscines, salle de sport, biblio, grand parc jarry (un des plus grand de montreal), plaza st-hubert et ses commerces, fameux marché jean-talon. Le

Autour de chez nous il y a des restaurants, bars, boulangeries, crèmerie, banques, piscines, salle de sport, biblio, grand parc jarry (un des plus grand de montreal), plaza st-hubert et ses commerces, fameux marché jean-talon.
notes: Avis aux allergiques, nous avons 2 adorables chats. Ils jouent beaucoup dehors mais je préfère prévenir tout de même
transit: Les transports de jours comme de nuit sont tres facile (ne vous souciez pas du dernier metro). Env 20-25 mn du centre ville. 15 mn du plateau. 99 est / ouest au coin de la rue 30 nord/sud (va jusqu au vieux port) au coin de la rue Metro jean-talon a 10 mn de marche Metro jarry a 8 mn de marche Bus de nuit 361 passe a toute les 5-10 mn la nuit sur tout st-denis. Si vous restez au centre jusqu'à apres la fermeture du metro, ce bus vous amene a 5 mn de marche de la maison

name: Suburban Bush Retreat Room 2
summary: Comfortable queen room in exterior building attached to family home, with access to pool and national parks on the doorstep. In the leafy suburb of Engadine, Sydney's south, this property is located on the doorstep of the Royal National Park. Relax by the pool or spend the day walking in the Royal National Park (or both), or simply stay with us if you're looking for an affordable bed in the area. Please note we have 2 friendly cats (inside the house) & 2 chickens (in an enclosure in the garden).
space: The queen bedroom is within an external building that does not have a bathroom facility within that building.  There will be access to the main house bathroom facilities though, which are shared with the family living there.
description: Comfortable queen room in exterior building attached to family home, with access to pool and national parks on the doorstep. In the leafy suburb of Engadine, Sydney's south, this property is located on the doorstep of the Royal National Park. Relax by the pool or spend the day walking in the Royal National Park (or both), or simply stay with us if you're looking for an affordable bed in the area. Please note we have 2 friendly cats (inside the house) & 2 chickens (in an enclosure in the garden). The queen bedroom is within an external building that does not have a bathroom facility within that building.  There will be access to the main house bathroom facilities though, which are shared with the family living there. You will have access to 2 bathrooms (bath and 2 showers), kitchen, lounge (with TV), outdoor decking/entertainment area (with TV), pool table and swimming pool. This is a very quiet neighbourhood located about 5 minutes (driving, or 30 minutes walking) from the centre of En
neighborhood_overview: This is a very quiet neighbourhood located about 5 minutes (driving, or 30 minutes walking) from the centre of Engadine and its train station.  Engadine is located on the edge of The Royal National Park. Walking distance to bushland surrounds or a drive takes you into Audley where you can hire watercraft for a gentle river paddle.
notes: This is the external building/garage area of a family home, which is occupied by a couple and their 18 year-old son. In addition to this room, which can occupy 2 guests sharing a queen bed, there is also a second bedroom (double bed) within the house that you may book on a separate listing; Suburban Bush Retreat Room 1.
transit: Buses come through the neighbourhood from Engadine station but easiest means of getting around is your own car (street parking is free and easily available) or Uber. Engadine station is a few minutes drive away, or Sutherland station only 10 minutes drive away, (with more frequent services to the city).
access: You will have access to 2 bathrooms (bath and 2 showers), kitchen, lounge (with TV), outdoor decking/entertainment area (with TV), pool table and swimming pool.

host.host_about:
Honest and hard working, Rod is native to Australia while Lynsey is Scottish...they met in Sydney when Lynsey was on a gap year in 2005.

We enjoy watersports and spending time by the pool/at the beach or camping.  

Lynsey spent the first 14 years of her life in Malawi (C. Africa), then lived in Scotland.  Rod lived in Scotland with Lynsey and his son Brandon for a couple of years (exposed to the coldest winters we've experienced during 2009/2010), before we all decided to move back to Australia for the warmth!

As hosts we want you to have a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us.  We open our home to you as guests.

reviews.comments: Lovely and friendly people, close to National Park. Great communication.

reviews.comments: El alojamiento estaba genial. Mucho mejor de lo que esperabámos, aunque, un poco alejado del centro de Oporto. Por lo demás, genial!

Confortável, amplo, cozinha com geladeira, fogão vitroceramico  e micro ondas novos. Vista muito bonita no por do sol. Se tivesse que reclamar seria do banheiro que necessitaria renovar. Fácil estacionar e acesso rápido às entradas da cidade.

Après un accueil sympathique j’ai passé un excellent séjour dans cet appartement bien équipé avec sa superbe terrasse panoramique . Cependant, alors que j’ai réservé à la derniere minute et un peu fatiguée, j’ai vite découvert que l’appartement n’est pas « au centre » de Porto.  Ça permet d’être au calme et de ne pas avoir trop chaud mais le soir ça peut être un peu long de rentrer en transports en commun (métro + bus).
Bel appartement tout équipé. Le concierge qui nous a accueilli est très sympa et arrangeant. Aucun problème.
Nice place good view to expensive for the many that you paid on the Algarve you get better value for money you paid
A bit far from downtown, other then that all was OK.

O espaço é aconchegante e tem tudo o que precisamos. Essa é a segunda vez que me hospedo neste apartamento. Os anfitriões são pessoas maravilhosas e fiquei muito feliz por ter feito essa escolha. Tem acesso a autocarro e tem uma linda paisagem do pôr do sol.

name: Sunny Room with balcony. Free big space for yoga:)
summary: Hello, welcome to moda:) My rooms have landscape of walnut trees and there is no street front of them.  This room has balcony that you can have breakfast or coffee, there are seats available.  I am dancing and exercising yoga everyday at my saloon, so you can:) p.s. The bed is for 1.5 person. P.s. Please check the entrance timing to home and schedule your trip beforehand. 5 euro/hour will be charged if you enter late than airbnb's entrance period (12 pm- 14 pm). Thanks for understanding.

reviews.comments:
Whilst going through several countrys and Airbnb’s I’ve never seen such a surprisingly beautiful place and such a nice and polite host! 
Everything was just perfect and I’m super happy to have been able to experience such a beautiful surrounding. 
I’m sure you’ll like it as much as I did! 
:)

Suheyl is such a wonderful, caring person. You receive a lovely warm welcome from him. Suheyl’s place is a great location, room is very cozy and apartment is sparkly clean. You will really enjoy yourself at Suheyl’s place I would definitely recommend to stay there.
Suheyl is very nice and helpful host. Room and all apartment are very clean and bright . The location of the apartment is perfect. Highly recommend!

It was my first trip to Istanbul and Suheyl made it extra special with outstanding hospitality . The place is super clean and easily accessible from any where in Istanbul. I would i highly recommend Suheyl's lovely place in kadikoy.
Highly recommended
Had a great stay at Süheyl’s. His flat is nice and clean with lots of natural light and space. He was very accommodating and great at communication. Would recommend to others. Thanks Süheyl!

name: Room in stunning beach house
summary: Stunning renovated house, 3 min walk from the beach, ideal location, balconies, BBQ & garden Huge sunny living room & open kitchen 4 awesome (Hidden by Airbnb) (Aussies & Irish, 2 boys and 1 girl, 26 - 35 years old) Spacious room TV room with Netflix

name: Cozy and Bright Studio at Marquês
summary: Seja bem-vindo ao nosso estúdio. Está situado a 20 minutos a pé do centro da cidade do Porto, a 5 minutos da estação de metro Marquês e tem paragem de autocarro em frente do apartamento. Fica situado numa zona tranquila, fácil acesso a autoestradas e tem supermercado, padarias e diversos serviços muito próximos. O estúdio está equipado com uma pequena cozinha e tem um lugar de estacionamento dentro do prédio, que pode ser usado gratuitamente.

reviews.comments:
It was a great cozy and very clean and light studio as expected 
The host Joana was very helpful and kind... Her hospitality is much more one traveler can expect 
The location is perfect for a move around the whole city..
Joana es buena anfitriona pero el apartamento está situado en un antiguo garaje y aunque esta reformado, hay ruido y luz que molesta en buen descanso

Alojamiento en Oporto muy recomendable, muy limpio, muy funcional y con Parking incluído. La anfitriona nos ha tratado estupendamente, es muy amable y sus respuestas siempre han sido inmediatas. Se trata de un estudio a unos 10-15 minutos andando del centro así como de los puntos de interés de la ciudad.
Joana was very responsive and all the apartment was in perfect conditions. The neighborhood is nice and it has all you need around.

name: Luxury & Cozy Apartment in Heart of Sydney CBD

host.host_about: 本人住在澳大利亚悉尼,喜爱旅游,餐饮,和聚会

reviews.comments: The apartment exceeded our expectation with its view and its modernity, its within walking distance from central station, Chinatown, 10mins walk to Pyrmont bay, and tram stop to fish market. The host replies rather quickly to any request or simply any questions. Most housing appliances were provided. Highly recommended
位置非常非常好｡几天都是靠步行和公交去各个景点的｡公寓干净,房东热情｡
非常棒的房子!绝对给你惊喜!
thank you for providing a nice accomodation for my family trip. better than expected. highly recommend.
Our group of five enjoyed our stay at Cy's place. The location was really great as it was in the middle of Haymarket and easy to get around by foot. Thanks for having us!
房源地理位置很好,房间比想象中大,性价比很高,会向朋友推荐该房源｡
3 colleagues and I were in town for 5 nights and the place was home away from home! We loved the space so much! Highly recommended!

Cy provided an excellent place to stay. All amenities were provided, great location, spacious. Quite a new apartment with beautiful views. Lot of restaurants, grocery shops, nearby public transport and walkable to most landmarks. We were a group of 8, and it fit us quite nicely. He even helped us out with a later checkout as per our flight times. Would highly recommend.
Great location. value to stay
Such a great place to day. Very central and close to everything. Incredible service.

Cy was an amazing host who was super understanding when our flight was delayed and we couldn’t check in till 4pm. The location of the place was outstanding with it only being a 10min walk to darling harbour and a 10 minute train ride into the CBD! 10/10 would recommend and stay again!
It's a convenient and pretty place.

host.host_about: Love to travel around the world !

reviews.comments: We had a great stay with 4 couples and 1 single. The master suite unit is very modern, and private from the 3 bedroom unit. Both were very clean and comfortable. I wish we could’ve stayed out on the lanai later in the evening, because the view of Diamond Head and Waikiki is gorgeous! We would definitely stay here again.

Stunning view of the city, water, and sunset. Just outside of Waikiki with lots of space for the 8 of us. Stocked with enough towels, garbage bags, and paper towels, but limited dishes. Great AC, fans, and natural light. Awesome place for big groups who want to be just outside the big city. We had a great time!

name: Flat Copacabana c/ piscina e garagem!
summary: Seja bem-vindo ao Flat com infraestrutura de auto check-in, lavanderia no prédio, garagem com manobrista, internet e tudo que um viajante precisa, seja a negócios ou lazer (ou os dois!). O condomínio dispoe de serviço de arrumação básica diária, não incluída no preço. Entre em contato se tiver interesse.
space: Dispomos de uma cozinha completa com todos os principais utensílios que você pode precisar.
description: Seja bem-vindo ao Flat com infraestrutura de auto check-in, lavanderia no prédio, garagem com manobrista, internet e tudo que um viajante precisa, seja a negócios ou lazer (ou os dois!). O condomínio dispoe de serviço de arrumação básica diária, não incluída no preço. Entre em contato se tiver interesse. Dispomos de uma cozinha completa com todos os principais utensílios que você pode precisar. Todo o espaço é exclusivo do hóspede. Há no prédio áreas em comum que podem ser utilizadas nos horários permitidos. Qualquer dúvida, não deixe de perguntar! Morando em bairro próximo ao apê, estarei disponível para eventuais dúvidas e solicitações dos hóspedes. Copacabana é o bairro mais tradicional do turismo do Rio de Janeiro. Há muitas opções de mobilidade, incluindo metrô a 200 metros do apartamento e farta disponibilidade de Uber e taxis. Estamos a duas quadras da praia de Copacabana, local de muita diversidade e opções de lazer. Para os que chegam pelo Santos Dummont, o aterro do flamengo
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana é o bairro mais tradicional do turismo do Rio de Janeiro. Há muitas opções de mobilidade, incluindo metrô a 200 metros do apartamento e farta disponibilidade de Uber e taxis. Estamos a duas quadras da praia de Copacabana, local de muita diversidade e opções de lazer.
notes: É possível utilizar a lavanderia do prédio, que cobra uma taxa de R$ 15 Solicitar a ficha na (Website hidden by Airbnb) a finalidade de evitar desperdícios, a energia elétrica será cobrada a parte, através de uma medição no momento do check-in e outra no check-out.
transit: Para os que chegam pelo Santos Dummont, o aterro do flamengo é uma ótima opção. Há metrô, ônibus, Uber e taxis bastante farto na região.
access: Todo o espaço é exclusivo do hóspede. Há no prédio áreas em comum que podem ser utilizadas nos horários permitidos. Qualquer dúvida, não deixe de perguntar!
interaction: Morando em bairro próximo ao apê, estarei disponível para eventuais dúvidas e solicitações dos hóspedes.
house_rules: - Atenção: Para evitar desperdícios, a conta de Luz será cobrada separadamente. O relógio será fotografado antes e depois e será utilizada a tarifa da Light do mês em questão (fornecedora de energia elétrica). - Respeitar a Lei do Silêncio - Respeitar as regras do condomínio - Permitimos animais pequenos com aviso prévio e devido cuidado.

host.host_about:
Morador do Rio de Janeiro há mais de 20 anos, sou entusiasta do turismo. Acredito que viajar proporciona às pessoas conhecimento do mundo e de si mesmo. Como brasileiro, gosto de passar o tempo com os bons e velhos amigos e ainda ter tempo de conhecer novos. 
A minha motivação de ser um anfitrião Airbnb é oferecer um pouco do cotidiano carioca a todos que desejam desfrutar das maravilhas que o Rio possui, sem depender de guias oportunistas ou agências de turismo.
Morando na casa ao lado, terei a disponibilidade e o prazer de não só receber mas também ajudar com roteiros e dicas locais.

Sinta-se a vontade para entrar em contato e tirar qualquer dúvida!

reviews.comments: Tudo perfeito cumpre com o anunciado o imóvel é perto de tudo Guilherme super atencioso recomendo!

name: ×× BARCELONA RAMBLAS PLAZA REAL ××
summary: THIS APARTMENT IS LOCATED A FEW STEPS AWAY FROM THE RAMBLAS. IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF BARCELONA GOTHIC QUARTER IN THE CENTER THIS CHARMING APARTMENT IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF BARCELONA'S GOTHIC QUARTER. NEAR SOME OF THE BEST RESTAURANTS AND BARS. CENTRALLY LOCATED ON A PEDESTRIAN STREET NEAR LAS RAMBLAS AND PLACA REAL. THE NEAREST METROS ARE DRASSANES AND LICEU. JUST A SHORT 5 MIN STROLL TO THE BEACH AND PORT. THE SPACE IS MODERN AND COZY WITH TRADITIONAL CATALAN VAULTED CEILINGS AND WOODEN FLOORS. THE APARTMENT IS FULL EQUIPPED WITH HEATING, INTERNET (WIFI), FULL KITCHEN, FRESH LINENS AND TOWELS. THERE IS ONE COMFORTABLE DOUBLE BED AND ONE SINGLE BED IN THE LIVING ROOM. WE PROVIDE OUR GUESTS WITH A MAP INDICATING OUR FAVORITE RESTAURANTS FOR YOU TO ENJOY AUTHENTIC AS WELL AS MORE EXPERIMENTAL SPANISH CUISINE. OUR CHECK OUT IS NORMALLY 10 AM BUT IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO CHECK OUT LATER PLEASE LET US KNOW AND IF WE HAVE NO GUESTS CHECKING IN THE DAY OF YOUR DEPARTURE WE WILL BE HAPPY TO

name: Lindo flat com vista para o mar na Barra da Tijuca
summary: Excelente flat, recém reformado, comporta bem 4 pessoas.  O flat tem serviço de camareira diariamente, restaurante 24h, academia, serviço de piscina com bar, máquina de lavar e secar comum do prédio (necessário comprar fichas para usar).  Ótima localização, de frente para a praia, próximo ao posto 4.  Pessoas de todas as origens são bem-vindas, qualquer dúvida responderei por mensagem.

address.street: Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Adorei minha estadia no Rio com o Airbnb, a anfitriã foi super solicita, tive muita hospitalidade, apartamento bem localizado, limpo, e com acesso a academia, piscina, hidromassagem, sauna, além de ser em frente da praia! Voltarei com certeza.

El departamento es muy bonito, todo muy bien decorado y super funcional, realmente el lugar es increíble y las prestaciones del complejo no podrían ser mejores. 100% recomendable y Leticia una excelente anfitriona.

El departamento esta renovado, muy agradable y bien decorado y con todo lo necesario ya que tiene cocina, microondas, cafetera y servicio de playa.
Sin dudas volveremos!
El apartamento muy lindo y cómodo, tal cual las fotos publicadas. La atención de Leticia fue excelente siempre ante todas las consultas. La ubicación es excepcional. Súper recomendable!!!

name: Studio Bimbadeen
summary: Studio Bimbadeen is a private self contained studio with spectacular views of the Nepean River & the mountains. The original property was named Bimbadeen in the 1950's - the aboriginal meaning for 'GOOD VIEW'.  The studio is a lovely getaway for 2 looking for a romantic escape which has great river views,  many large trees which are home to the wonderful bird life and yet so close to amenities.  Its a beautiful spot to unwind with a glass of wine & watch the sunset.
space: Overseas guests from all backgrounds are  welcome. Guests have use of an outdoor fire & seating to watch the sunset, enjoy a wine &  watch the rowers pass on the river. The Studio has a queen size bed with quality linen, reverse cycle air conditioning, free WiFi, TV, kitchenette with microwave, kettle, toaster & continental breakfast supplies,  private bathroom off the private enclosed verandah & use of bathrobes & slippers.

reviews.comments:
We had a fabulous time at Studio Bimbadeen. Stunning location by the river, very tranquil and relaxing. 
Shirley and her husband were lovely and very hospitable and their little dog was so sweet. 
We will definitely be coming back here.
Would highly recommend this place, couldnt ask for more from an airbnb, great location and room. The hosts were so helpful and friendly.
Lovely place and outdoor area

Great host to stay with. Very private place with lovely views over the water.

Easy to access and great location.
The views are amazing, the studio is styled beautifully and light filled and very private. You won’t be disappointed..
A lovely, relaxing place on the river. Shirley is a great, thoughtful host.

The most beautiful souls inside and out — I had a wonderful stay here. Aside from the accommodations being immaculate (great location, cozy, clean, and everything you need) Shirley is absolutely fantastic. I would be so happy to stay again!
What a wonderful stay we had here!!! Will definitely be returning - the views are simply stunning and the studio was so beautifully designed. We loved it all!
What a stunning environment and the accommodation felt luxurious and amazing. The photos don’t do it justice and we loved everything they have done to make it such a heavenly space.

name: Cozy Apartment in the Mile End
summary: Very nice and cozy apartment in the heart of the Mile End. Situated in a calm street, it is a perfect place for travelers who want to relax in a quiet  atmosphere. Grocery stores, bars, cafes, theaters, drugstores, parks and swimming pools circle the neighborhood. Not far from the Mont-Royal and the Plateau.
description: Very nice and cozy apartment in the heart of the Mile End. Situated in a calm street, it is a perfect place for travelers who want to relax in a quiet  atmosphere. Grocery stores, bars, cafes, theaters, drugstores, parks and swimming pools circle the neighborhood. Not far from the Mont-Royal and the Plateau.

reviews.comments: Spacious and clean. In a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to Mont. Royal and public transit, and walk-able to st. Laurent bars/restaurants. Check in and out process was seamless.

Theotime was an excellent host! Communication was very easy and he was very accommodating to our slightly late arrival time due to border traffic. The location of the apartment is also prime. It is centrally located between downtown activities and some of my favorite neighborhoods, such as Little Italy and Mile End. I would especially recommend this place to any small group of friends visiting Montreal for both the nightlife and beautiful sights.

name: Suite no Leblon
summary: Suite confortável , bem próximo da praia , próximo de otimos  restaurantes . Frente estação do metrô .
description: Suite confortável , bem próximo da praia , próximo de otimos  restaurantes . Frente estação do metrô .

name: A Cute Room in Balat
summary: A very cozy and historical building has 4 private floors. Every floor consist of a large bedroom with a private toilet and shower. The building has one entrance door but each floor is independent, private and lockable. Your room (your floor) is in the second floor has 5 large windows, a double bed, wardrobe, coffee table, armchairs, mini fridge, mobile fan, bed linen, pillows, duvets, towels, curtains. Toilet papers, soap, shower gel, shampoo, slippers, kettle, coffee cups are included.
space: Each street and each corner is filled with an old historical smell and the chance to explore this neighborhood. Throughout its history, Balat has been one of the most popular settlements of Ottomans, Greeks, Jews and Armenians. The district was included in the World Cultural and Natural Heritage Conservation Convention by UNESCO in 1985. When you see it with your own eyes, you get a better understanding of why it's included.  There are colorful houses scattered in every street, restored with happiness.  Balat is also very close to historical and famous touristic places of Istanbul. For example; Taksim square, Golden Horn, Church of Hagia Sophia, Sultan Ahmed Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Galata Tower, Grand Bazaar, Süleymaniye Mosque, Spice Bazaar, Basilica Cistern, Blue Mosque, Istanbul Archaeology Museum, Turkish and Islamic Arts Museum, Para Museum

neighborhood_overview: Balat is a traditional, historical, authentic,  charming and oldest place in Istanbul. You can taste the “old Istanbul”in a safe and secure district. The building is very close to grocery shops, many traditional and international restaurants, bakeries, cafes, supermarkets and many small shops.   “Balat” will make you feel like you travel in time. Start your tour with walking down from the hill and you’ll fall in love with the old, colorful Greek, Jewish and Ottoman historical houses.  The neighbourhood of Balat is also in the UNESCO World Heritage List. We share with you the places that you must see in this old Greek and Jewish district. Fener Greek Orthodox Patriarchate : The building of Orthodox Patriarchate is also the head of Orthodox Church. It’s still in the same place since 1602. The old throne of Patriarchate from the 5th century and as the belief says the column that Jesus had scourged is still there. These two pieces and the three Saints’ coffins are really important historic
notes: Please note that, it is not an apartment, it is a renovated historical building with 4 floors. The building has only one entrance but each floors are independent, private and lockable. Every floor has private bedroom and private bathroom & toilet. In the bedroom, there are free potable water in fridge and some delicious green tea, herbal tea and coffee which all are free. We kindly request you to not step inside with your shoes in order to protect the historical floor covering in the house. We provide you slippers for free.
transit: 20 minutes to Ataturk Airport 10 minutes to Taksim Square 15-20 minutes to Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar, Church of Hagia Sophia (Ayasofya), etc. Bus station for public transportation is 3-5 minutes far away from house. Many touristic and famous places are only a short bus ride away
access: The building has a basement floor where located a shared kitchen equipped with a washing machine, a cooker, a dinning table, chairs, pots, plates, cups, spoons, forks, etc.
interaction: I am always online on (Hidden by Airbnb) . and on airnb message system and i will be available any time to help you. Do not hesitate to contact me or my brother.
house_rules: To avoid breaking the historic fabric of the House with our shoes in the House we do not visit. Would you like to the same the next time you do you have to find.

host.host_about: I like to explore people, animals, nature and new places. it will be a whole new discovery for me to welcome you...

reviews.comments: Die Unterkunft hat alle meine Erwartungen übertroffen. Blitzsauber und sehr gemütlich. Die Gegend in Balat ist ebenso wundervoll mit sehr vielen kleinen Cafés und Restaurants. Als Frau habe ich mich sehr sicher und wohl gefühlt. Ich bedanke mich an den Gastgebern und empfehle die Unterkunft an jeden weiter !!!
great location. Balat is an amazing area. great hospitality. we will be back

name: Porto city centre apartment H
summary: Deseja visitar a cidade do Porto por 2/3 dias ou até uma semana e não sabe onde ficar? Nós temos a solução mais confortável e económica para si!

reviews.comments: Very nice flat. I like very much the view from the balcony. And a warm welcome from Paula's mother. Thanks for your hospitality and see you soon.

El apartamento como figura en el anuncio, fue una maravilla, en pleno centro y una gran experiencia, por parte de ellos gran facilidad dejándonos realizar el check in antes de hora y estando en contacto en todo momento. Muy recomendable dicho apartamento, no lo dudeis.

Paula ha sido una estupenda anfitriona. Hemos podido realizar el check-in más tarde de lo indicado sin ningún problema. El apartamento es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, pequeño, pero perfecto para una pareja. Limpio y equipado con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días de relax y, al contrario de lo que imaginábamos, muy tranquilo, ya que no da a la carretera. Muy bien situado también, ya que en nada te pones a pie en los principales lugares de interés. Recomendamos este apartamento sin ninguna duda y a su anfitriona Paula que ha sido muy atenta en todo momento con nosotros! Esperamos volver a esa bonita ciudad algún día!

Paula's apartment is really nice and well situated ! 
The communication with Paula was easy.

Tha apartment was very nice and well outfitted. There was a spacious parking lot but the entry and the tunnel to it was a white knuckled affair. At one point I had to look away as my wife drove into the tunnel because I didn't want to see the rental car get scratched. It didn't but only by less than one inch on either side.

Location was convenient to the metro.

Nous avons été parfaitement accueillis par Paula dès notre arrivée à l'appartement.

Celui-ci bénéficie d'un emplacement idéal pour un week end de découverte de Porto grâce à sa situation très centrale!

L'appartement est conforme aux photos, tout est neuf, propre et très bien entretenu. Ce fut très agréable d'y séjourner!

Merci encore Paula!

Maravilhoso!! O apartamento é magnífico e fomos maravilhosamente recebidos pela simpática mãe da Paula!!! A estadia foi óptima!! A localização é óptima, o apartamento nota 10 e o facto de ter estacionamento...perfeito!! Adorámos!!!
Obrigada por tudo!!! Voltarei com toda a certeza!!
Ana*

Very nice apartment in the city centre, definitely recommend to everyone. Unfortunately we did not meet Paula but her mother met us at the place and checked us in.
Thanks!
Lukas and Petra
Superbe chambre, lumineuse et silencieuse. Photos représentatives, un coup de cœur!

We stayed two nights in paulas apartment and it is awesome!
it was exactly like the fotos,clean and close to everything you might need.
We felt like home and would return whenever we could!

Séjour superbe! Une ville magnifique, des gens adorables et un appartement tout mignon!
A faire absolument en couple ou entre amis!

L'appartement est tout neuf, l'accueil parfait, on se croirait dans une chambre d'hôtel etoilé!
Et j'avoue que le petit porto de bienvenu sur la table ne nous a pas laissé indifférents.

Que de bonnes choses a dire et pour le coup absolument rien a redire.

Je recommande!!

We had a lovely time in Porto and Paula's apartment. It's a great apartment for a city trip to Porto. The apartment was perfectly clean and modern. The location is great. It's nice that there is a carpark with the apartment. Would stay here again!
Communication with Paula was quick and easy.

We had a great stay in Porto at Paula's Apartment.
The apartment looks exaclty like the pictures, was clean and very nice.
It's located perfectly to get around in Porto.
We would stay there again, communication with Paula was good.

L'appartement est génial, haut de plafond ce qui le rend spacieux et très agréable, le quartier sympa (pas très loin du centre, idéal et calme).
Nous avons passé un super séjour !

Appartement "croquignolet", c'est à dire bien restauré dans un immeuble de charme.
Fonctionnel, confortable, silencieux, tot neuf, impeccable. Trés bon accueil de Paula.
Le métro n'est pas loin ainsi que le marché de Bolhao.

It is perfect for a single, or romantic couple and in a quiet street. While others have met Paula’s mother, Paula oriented me. She was waiting with a warm greeting on the front doorstep – even though my train was late – when I arrived in my taxi [8 Euros – have change!] It is a comfortable, elegant, stylish and cool refuge. Almost everything you may need has been provided – you just need your hairdryer and bathroom toiletries. Reliable WIFI. It is located close to Rua Santa Caterina (main shopping boulevard) and Rua Formosa in the city centre. The fully renovated studio apartment is housed in an historic building on the FIRST floor [for those with heavy luggage like mine] with a grand entry, polished marble stairs and features glorious space with 15ft ceilings and gigantic windows. They open to a petite balconette with a small table setting for those who smoke, or for drying travel laundry securely. At night I opened the shuttered doors to let in the cooling evening breeze. It is a short walk to the traveller’s friend – the pingo doce supermarket and the Via Caterina shopping centre. Down the hill at 58 Formosa you will find the traditional market - "Mercado do Bolhao" - the Bolhao Market. I can also recommend a charming, family restaurant hosted enthusiastically by the son. It has an excellent budget menu – “economico” - Restaurante Don Rodrigo, in our street @ no. 37/39. For 5.50 Euros – vegetable soup & bread / meat or fish main / ½ litre wine (drink choice) and coffee. [See trip advisor reviews]. It also has a quaint outdoor patio & courtyard garden. The landmarks for “home” – Ibis Hotel, Residential Gabriel, Garage Elephante, Aquario (electronic shops). Paula also made life easier by booking a taxi back to the train station and kindly sent me text messages confirming our arrangements. Thank you Paula, and sadly, goodbye Porto!

I would definitely recommend this apartment for one or two people, preferably a couple. The apt. is as shown in the add. It is very tastefully decorated and uses the small space well. It is all you need for a week or two stay and it is located around the corner from the metro stop. You can also walk to the center or to the river from the apt. We had some lovely breakfasts on the terrace, which is definitely a plus. The kitchen has all you need for meals, including a refrigerator, burners and electric heating items. The bed is super comfortable as were the pillows, showing that the host put a lot into selecting items for comfort. I even want to see if I can buy the pillows. Paula, the host, was very flexible with the time for check in for I didn't know up until the day what bus I was taking from Fatima. She met us and there was a glass of wine for my husband and I, a nice touch. There was also a map of Porto, which was helpful and she was available for any questions. The shower works well and provides consistent hot water. The towels were soft and very adequate. The cost was extremely reasonable. You really can't get a lovely room with a terrace close to all the attractions at this rate. I would highly recommend it.

We spent 2 days at paula's apartment   and we really enjoyed it. The apartment is very cosy and perfectly located. 
So I'd definitely go there again.
We enjoyed our stay at Paula's. It was very clean and we had a warm welcome by Paula's mother unless our delay. Location is nearby metro and trainstation.
The apartment was cute, clean, and centrally-located. I loved Porto and this was the perfect place to stay!
Un très bel appartement dans un immeuble vraiment bien rénové. L'emplacement est idéal et l'accueil est agréable. On y resterait bien volontiers!
Pour compléter le précédent commentaire, j'ajoute que la literie est de très bonne qualité. On a merveilleusement bien dormi.

We began our portuguese trip from Porto. And the perfect start was booking Paula's apartment for our stay. The house is very well located, most of the monuments and nice places to go are at a walkable distance. When you get out at Bolhao metro station you'll be amazed by the Capela das Almas. And Porto is just great. 
Paula's mother was really kind when we arrived and we really enjoyed the porto wine Paula offered to us. 
The apartment is clean and cozy. Perfect for two people. 
We recommend it.

Thank you Paula.
Bel appartement. Bien situé. Nous avons été bien accueili. Très bonne communication avec Paula

Paula's mother welcomed us to the appartment in the centre of Porto and showed us the garage, with an entrance next to the beautiful building. The small studio is as modern and proper as the accurate photographs show. Since the place is located in the centre, you (of course) do hear city noises. It came in most handy that everything was within walking distance: cafe's, bakeries, a supermarket, shops, etc. Also, we were very charmed by the little balcony.

Elegant, bright room at good location!
All was according to expectations, a nice balcony where you can enjoy a delicious portwine!

Un precioso y amplio estudio con mucho encanto. Está estupendamente situado, en el centro, y tiene todos los detalles necesarios para pasar unos días en una encantadora ciudad. Está decorado con un gusto exquisito, muy limpio y cuidado y es muy cómodo y luminoso. Cuenta con plaza de garaje y wifi. Paula fue muy amable. El estudio es Ideal para una pareja. Le damos un 10. Volveremos, pues sólo pudimos pasar un día en Oporto, y repetiremos alojamiento.

the apartment is very lovely.we can feel just like our (Website hidden by Airbnb) very near to the subway station.we can go everywhere we want in cheap way.also Paola is very nice and friendly. I love this city,I want to go Porto for another time,and choose this apartment again. :)    thanks a lot,Paola!
Tres bonne adresse, tres bien située. Appartement tres charmant, lit confortable et salle de bain moderne. Accueil tres sympa. Nous reviendrons!

The apartment was as described, with good light and big windows. Paula was easy to contact and even left a small bottle of port for us in the apartment. The location itself is excellent, making walking into the centre of town very easy and quick. We had a great time and would definitely return.
Paula was very friendly and welcoming. The apartment was great, very modern and an excellent location.

L'appartement de Paula, tout près du cœur touristique de Porto mais dans un quartier calme, ressemble en fait à un mini-loft : petit mais ultra-fonctionnel, c'est parfait pour passer une nuit ou plus à Porto seul ou en couple. Très propre, très lumineux. La décoration sobre apporte beaucoup de charme à l'ensemble. Le petit balcon sans vis-à-vis fait la différence. Accueil très efficace par la maman de Paula. Bonne adresse.

O apartamento da Paula era tudo o que eu precisava para minha rápida estadia, perto dos principais pontos da cidade e com fácil acesso aos pontos distantes e o melhor de tudo, charmoso, cheiroso e confortável. Check in e check out feitos facilmente. Super indico e espero voltar outras vezes, me apaixonei por Porto e pelo apartamento... Obrigada pela oportunidade!
Clean, bright, modern apartment!  Good location near a metro station. Paula was very flexible about the check in time.

Our stay was fantastic at Paulas place. Her mum was so kind to bring us the keys at our arrival. The apartement itself was clean and stylish and it was very centrally located. Although it was noisy during the night we enjoyed our stay in Porto.

Perfecte B en B. We waren zeer verrast over hetgeen  zich achter de voordeur (een doorsnee voordeur) bevond.
Heerlijke kamer ( appartement H) op 1e verdieping aan achterzijde met balkon, dat uitkeek op parkeerplaatsje.
Gezellig ingericht en  schoon. Schone badkamer, prima douche.
Keukenblokje, koelkast , kortom alles wat er hoort te zijn.
Prettige ontvangst met duidelijke uitleg omtrent sleutel etc.
Als welkom een klein flesje Port ( hoe kan het ook anders in Porto)
Ligging prima: 10-15 minuten lopen naar centrum van de stad.
Eigen parkeergelegenheid, al vereist in-uitrijden wel even stuurkunst.
Verder kan er in de straat tegen betaling geparkeerd worden.
De straat is  gemiddeld druk. Genoeg restaurantjes en winkels in de buurt.
Als we nog eens in Porto zijn, is deze B en B voor herhaling vatbaar.
Prijs- kwaliteit: goed

Muy bien situado el apartamento para conocer a pie todo Oporto. Ideal el parking, que te permite dejar el coche al pie de la terraza del apartamento que, como es pequeño, el maletero del coche te sirve para dejar algunos enseres casi al alcance de la mano. Limpio y recomendable

El apartamento de Paula es genial, muy bien situado al lado de una boca de metro (directa al aeropuerto) y a unos minutos andando de la zona turistica (20 min andando al rio seria lo mas alejado) 
El apartamento esta limpisimo y tiene todas las comodidades necesarias. 
Paula es una anfitriona perfecta y la comunicacion con ella fue excelente.
A very nice place to stay !

Super nice and clean apartment on a perfect location. Due to timing it was Paula's mother who gave me the keys and friendly explained me how it all worked. Communication was very good and helpful.

Next time when I visit Porto I would definitely go back.
The studio is nice and clean. The location was great!

We had a great few days staying at Paula's apartment. The apartment was really well kept - very clean, very modern with tonnes of natural light thanks to the double French doors onto the balcony. The place is well equipped enough to cook a basic meal. The location was great - very close to the main shopping Street, cafes, a great fruit /veg/produce market and the historic city centre. Porto left a great impression on us, thanks in part to Paula's hospitality and her apartment and would happily return to stay here again.

El apartamento H de Paula es un lugar ideal para una pareja, pequeño pero muy acogedor, y estupendamente localizado, en un barrio tranquilo y cerca de "todo" caminando. No pudimos conocer a Paula, pero sí a su madre, que fue muy amable con nosotras, aunque no fue fácil comunicarnos ya que ella no habla español ni nosotras portugués. Con Paula estuvimos en contacto durante nuestra estancia, y estuvo receptiva y muy dispuesta a ayudarnos en todo momento.
El apartamento dispone de parking de coche, que nos vino de maravilla.
El único "pero" que tenemos que señalar es que la puerta del apartamento es muy fina, y todos los suelos en el edificio son de madera, y el resto de inquilinos del edificio no fueron muy considerados con el descanso de los demás, y las tres noches que nos alojamos hicieron muchísimo ruido, subiendo y bajando las escaleras corriendo, cantando, arrastrando las maletas por las escaleras... Así que no se puede decir que durmiéramos demasiado bien, si bien esto no es responsabilidad directa de la anfitriona. 
Recomendaría el apartamento de Paula a cualquier persona que quiera ir a pasar unos días a Porto :D.
Heel fijn appartement midden in Porto. Paula heette ons welkom midden in de nacht (onze vlucht was laat en had vertraging). Super!
Great hotel vibe from the apartment.  Clean and tidy with enough space for two people. Paula was very friendly.  Will definitely stay here again if I revisit Porto.

Encore un grand merci à Paula, pour ces conseils. Première fois avec Airbn et c'était parfait. Super logement, bien situé près des rues commercantes, mais à l'écart du bruit. Très accéssible depuis la gare. Appartement bien équipé et bien propre, petit mais parfait pour un couple, pas besoin de plus.

La casa muy bien situada, facil de llegar y el parking un punto positivo mas. La casa es tal cual las fotos muy mona. Por poner una pega... Falta de sitio para colgar la ropa de la maleta, el resto de 10.

Beautiful appartment. Very clean. The appartment is also very central. You can walk nearly everywhere or take the metro.

We had a wonderful time in Porto. Thank you Paula!
Paula's mother met us at the flat at the appointed time to hand over the keys. The flat was immaculate. It took us awhile to orient ourselves to the area using maps to brought with us.

- Accueil chaleureux par la mère de Paula. Une petite bouteille de Porto de bienvenue nous attendait.
- Très bel appartement, bien placé, très propre, très design, tellement design qu'il y manque certainement un minimum de mobilier qui faciliterait la gestion des affaires. A l'heure du repas, déménagement des affaires sur le lit. A l'heure du coucher, déménagement des affaires sur la table. Pas top.
- Nous avons eu la très bonne surprise de nous voir proposer une place de parking parfaitement sécurisé dans la cour intérieure.

The apartment and are stay was wonderful! It looks exactly like the photos and was very clean and welcoming when we arrived. Paula and her mother met us and left a helpful map and small port wine for us. They were so sweet and accommodated our early arrival on late notice. Great location, modern and clean apartment, and nice hosts, overall we had a great experience with Paula.

Lovely aparment, clean, bright and spacious.

Great location near Balhoa metro and the 'old district'

Paua was great helping us when we could not connect to the internet and worked perfectly after.

would reccomend!!

Une hôte très sympa qui nous a accueilli avec sa maman. Seuls deux serviettes ont été déposés, manque de serviette de main et surtout du savon dans les toilettes, je pense que c'est la moindre des choses.
Elle a été sympa de revenir déposer des serviettes de bain.
La nuit, un froid glacial souffle dans le studio qui ne dispose pas de chauffage... En ce novembre froid, il me paraît primoridial surtout qu'il ya q'une petite couverture ...
La situation géographique reste le plus gros point positif

Grâce à Paula, nous avons passé un agréable sejour a Porto. Nous avons été accueillis chaleureusement par Paula qui nous a offert une petite bouteille de Porto à notre arrivée. L'appartement, coquet, fonctionnel et très propre, est idéalement situé près des rues commerçantes. Paula s'est montrée tres disponible. Je recommande vivement ce logement. Nous reviendrons. Merci Paula.

O apartamento é ótimo, tudo novo e arrumado. 
Fica bem perto do metrô, numa região central da cidade, de acesso muito fácil para o aeroporto ou a estação de trem.
A Paula nos atendeu muito bem, e cumpriu todo o combinado. Fez a gentileza de nos receber com uma pequena garrafa de vinho do Porto.

A minha primeira experiência AIrbnb não poderia ter sido melhor! A casa era fantástica, situada numa zona calma e próxima de tudo. Não só correspondeu como superou as expectativas! Quando voltar ao Porto sem dúvida que esta vai ser a minha primeira escolha :)

El apto es muy cómodo. Tal cual se ve en las fotos. La ubicación te permite ir tanto caminando como en metro a recorrer la ciudad. Buena conexión wifi.
Paula es muy servicial y simpática. Totalmente recomendable.

El apartamento era chico pero justo lo que una pareja precisa. Estaba muy limpio, muy bien ubicado, cerca del subte que va a la estación de trenes y al aeropuerto, y tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días muy lindo en oporto!! Muy recomendable!
We had a lovely stay in Porto. The apartment is very nice and tidy and on a perfect walking distance to the city center and the metro. We could only recommend this place!

A localização do apartamento é excelente e tem todas as comodidades necessárias para uma curta estadia. O lugar de estacionamento é uma clara mais valia e a Paula foi uma anfitriã muito acessível e simpática.
Muy centrico, junto a la Rua Santa Catarina! Un pequeño apartamento con todo lo necesario para pasar unos dias en oporto! La descripcion del piso es tal cual! Muy recomendado, sin duda volvere!
Es war eine große Überraschung und sehr schön. Wir kommen sicher wieder. Vielen Dank dafür.

The host met us at the door with a smile. The apartment was well stocked and beautiful. Downtown, the water front, and other major sites of Porto were all within a 5-15 minute walk. We really got a sense for the true life in Porto. We loved it! Highly recommended!
Everything was good. Good location of apartment. Metro Bolhao and Rua de Santa Catarina in 3 minutes walk. The apartment is clean, bright and comfortable. Perfect for 2-3 night stay.

Totalmente recomendado!
Comodo, limpio, lindo, ubicación ideal y una hôte muy simpatica. Un lugar perfecto para disfrutar la bella ciudad de Porto.

Paula nous a très bien accueilli à Porto avec le sourire, une petite bouteille de Porto et un plan de la ville. L'appartement est très agréable, fonctionnel propre et bien situé dans la ville. Merci beaucoup !
The reservation was canceled 118 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice flat, good accommodation near the center.  You will find everything you need. Paula, we would like to thank you for good rest!
Everything perfect. Thanks a lot! Cozy appartment with a nice balcony in the centre of Porto!

I totally recommend Paula's apartment. it is well located and a lovely place. I was welcome by Paula's mother when i arrived, she was very nice and helpful. It made our experience at Porto delightful.  Thanks Paula and until next time.

We loved staying at Paula's apartment! For a simple weekend trip to Porto, it was perfectly located and a great base for exploring the city. The apartment is bright, well-renovated, modern, clean and comfortable. It was easy to communicate with Paula and we had no problems at all with check-in or check-out. As it was chilly the weekend we arrived, Paula even made sure to include a space heater for us in the apartment. I would certainly stay here again when I visit Porto!

Superbe séjour à Porto!L'appartement est idéalement situé et parfaitement équipé.
L'accueil est impeccable, merci beaucoup!
Todo muy bien, tal y como aparece en la foto. Atención muy amable. Muy contentos.

Tudo conforme descrito e combinado, adorei tudo Paula.
Os meus sinceros Parabéns.

Estúdio muito simpático, boas instalações, decoração moderna e uma grande foto da Ribeira do Porto lindíssima sobre uma das paredes! Super bem localizado à beira de umas das ruas mais conhecidas,a Santa Catarina, no entanto é virado para o interior das casa portanto não há barulho! Uma linda varanda com mesa virada p o sol basicamente todo o dia! Grande vantagem para quem tem carro, parque privado para estacionar! Em época de inverno está um bocadinho frio mas tem um aquecedor! Voltarei a ficar aqui numa próxima vez! Podem sempre contar com a Paula, muito simpática e disponível ;)

Paula's apartment was perfect for us! If you are a couple or two good friends it is absolutely ideal - small but very tidy and decorated with love. There is also a cute little balcony where you could sit outside and enjoy the evening sun.
It is directly in the center and takes you about 3 minutes to walk to the Via Catarina - the main shopping street of Porto. We walked everywhere but if you need to get further outside the city you can also take the metro. 
The description is clear and Paula's mother welcomed us when we arrived (although it was almost midnight!).
There was a small bottle of Portwine waiting for us and also the instructions where easy & quick. 
I'd love to come back : )

I stayed 3 nights in Paula's Apartment. 
It was really good experience.
The place has everything what I wanted. 
and I broke a provided mug while I wash dishes, but Paula generously said that It is Ok and dont worry about that. how nice and sweet ~~!!!
I strongly recommend this place. 
I just wished that I could stay longer in this place and Porto city. but I had to leave. what a pitty. 

I really appreciate Paula and her mother. Thank you again ~~

Paula's house was exactly same with the photo - very cozy and clean. And it is located in the calm area and also close to the center.

It was a little cold but there was a small movable heater that was very helpful.

Anyway we are satisfied with this house. 
Thank you Paula.

Cuando llegamos Paula nos estaba esperando en el apartamento. Fue muy atenta explicándonos lo principal ; parking,  clave wifi, hora de salida... 
Nos había dejado en la mesa una botellita de vino de Oporto y un mapa (lo que nos vino perfecto porque cuando llegamos ya estaba cerrado el punto de información)

El edificio esta reformado y la entrada es muy bonita.
El apartamento es pequeñito pero es muy acogedor y perfecto para tu estancia en Oporto. Tiene una cocina pequeña con todo lo necesario para las comidas; vajilla, microondas, cubertería... (Nosotros sólo la utilizamos para desayunar).
Todo estaba muy limpio.
Calefacción no tiene, pero tiene una estufa eléctrica que es más que suficiente para calentar el apartamento.
El parking fue otro punto a favor a la hora de escoger este apartamento, porque no queríamos dejar el coche en la calle... 

El apartamento está bastante céntrico, a unos 15 minutos andando de la torre de los clérigos, a 4 minutos del mercado del Bolhao... 

No dudaré en repetir apartamento para la próxima visita. 
Gracias por todo Paula.

Very nice apartment with great location. We spent two nights there and absolutely enjoyed it. The kitchen is well equipped with everything you need to cook a nice meal. The only little negative thing is that there is no real closet space, which might be inconvenient if you stay longer.

El apartamento muy limpio, bonito y aseado. Muy formales en el cumplimiento de sus condiciones. La localizacion muy buena.  Muy buen trato.
El unico fallo es el ruido interior y a veces exterior.
We really enjoyed our stay at Paula's apartment in Porto. The balcony is amazing and the place is bright and clean. The neighborhood is great and it was easy to walk everywhere.
Great apartment, nothing to complain.

We stayed overnight in Apartment H. The apartment was exactly like described and very central. It was perfect for a short break with parking which was a bonus. Paula and her mother greeted us on time as arranged, with a map and free bottle of Port waiting for us. If you are wanting to explore the city, make sure you bring comfortable shoes! Thank you Paula.

Ik ben samen met een vriendin 4 dagen in het appartement van Paula geweest. Het appartement is modern en netjes ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien, vooral het balkonnetje waar de zon laat in de middag staat was heerlijk om even uit te rusten na een drukke dag sightseeing. De locatie is top! Om de hoek bij een metrostation en vlakbij de winkelstraat en allerlei bezienswaardigheden. We hebben een heerlijke tijd in Porto gehad!

We had a nice stay at Paula's apt in Porto. It is conveniently located within walking distance to the city centre, train station, market, shopping and cafes. The apt. met all our needs for our short stay in this beautiful city.
Paula was very friendly and accommodating. The studio flat is very nice and clean with a sunny balcony, TV and everything you need for a short stay. It is quite centrally located.

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt in Paulas Apartment. Tolle kleine Wohnung..sehr sauber und süß eingerichtet. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
Das Beste: Super zentrale Lage..2 Minuten zur Rua de Santa Catarina und zum Café Majestic. Restaurants, Cafés, Supermarkt und der fantastische Mercado do Bolhão alles nebenan. Zur Metro ebenfalls ein Katzensprung und Busse fahren sowieso an jeder Ecke. Einfach perfekt für einen Städtetrip!
Wir würden immer wieder diese Wohnung buchen. Absolut empfehlenswert!

Great flat in the center ! Nice apartment, very clean. 
The view from the flat is on a parking.
Lovely, cozy apartment in a very good location. Ideal for a weekend trip to Porto.

We were really pleased with this studio, it is a stone throw away from the main sites and attractions, quiet, light and impeccably clean. 
Very easy to communicate with Paula and her mother, everything was perfect! Highly recommended.
Paula was really kind, professional and available for any questions. The place is perfect, clean and very bright. Best location!

We had a wonderful 4 night stay at Paula's apartment in the centre of Porto. The flat is very nicely furnished and is in a great position to get out and explore the city. Paula was really helpful beforehand giving us all the information we needed and we were given a very friendly greeting by her mother on our arrival. They had even left a small bottle of port which was a lovely thought.
It is a compact space and that's the only thing thing I'd say to consider before staying here - if you're a couple like us who want to be out and about during the day then you don't need any more! Would definitely stay here again.
Super logement, très bien entretenu. Bien situé. Je vous le conseille.

L'appartamento è davvero ben arredato, pulito ed ordinato. In zona strategica a due passi dal centro. Utilissimo il pacheggio privato!
